 jayati parāśarasūnuḥ satyavatīhṛdayanandano vyāsaḥ
 yasyāsyakamalakośe vāṅmayam amṛtaṃ pibati lokaḥ
 dharmadṛḍhabaddhamūlo vedaskandhaḥ purāṇaśākhāḍhyaḥ
 kratukusumo mokṣaphalo jayati kalpadrumo viṣṇuḥ
 pitāmahādyaṃ pravadanti ṣaṣṭhaṃ
maharṣim akṣayyavibhūtiyuktam
 nārāyaṇasyāṃśajam ekaputraṃ
dvaipāyanaṃ vedanidhiṃ namāmi
 pārāśaryavacassarojam amalaṃ gītārthagandhotkaṭaṃ
 nānākhyānakakesaraṃ harikathāsaṃbodhanābodhitam
 loke sajjanaṣaṭpadair aharahaḥ pepīyamānaṃ mudā
 bhūyād bhāratapaṅkajaṃ kalimalapradhvaṃsi naḥ śreyase
 yaḥ śvetatvam upāgataḥ kṛtayuge tretāyuge raktatāṃ
 yugme yaḥ kapilaḥ kalau ca bhagavān kṛṣṇatvam āyāga 
        danti munayo yo yogibhir gīyate
 sa brahmā yadi vā haro yadi śivo yaḥ ko 'pi tasmai namaḥ
 vāgīśādyāḥ sumanasaḥ sarvārthānām u   
   tvā kṛtakṛtyāḥ syus taṃ namāmi gajānanam
 vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam
 parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim
 acaturvadano brahmā dvibāhur a    
 abhālalocanaḥ śambhur bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
 śuklāmbaradharaṃ devaṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam
 prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye
 jñānānandamayaṃ devaṃ nirmalaṃ sphaṭikākṛtim
 ādhāraṃ sarvavidyānāṃ hayagrīvam upāsmahe
 vyāsāya viṣṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave
 namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
 namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
 brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtvā dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān
 abhraśyāmaḥ piṅgajaṭābaddhakalāpaḥ
 prāṃśur daṇḍī kṛṣṇamṛgatvakparidhānaḥ
 sākṣāl lokān pāvayamānaḥ kavimukhyaḥ
 pārāśaryaḥ parvasu rūpaṃ vivṛṇotu
 aśubhāni nirācaṣṭe tanoti śubhasaṃtatim
 smṛtamātreṇa yaḥ puṃsāṃ brahma tan maṅgalaṃ viduḥ
 dharmo vivardhati yudhiṣṭhirakīrtanena
 pāpaṃ praṇaśyati vṛkodarakīrtanena
 śatrur vinaśyati dhanaṃjayakīrtanena
 mādrīsutau kathayatāṃ na bhavanti rogāḥ
 sarasvatīpadaṃ vande śriyaḥ patim umāpatim

c devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
A lomaharṣaṇaputra ugraśravāḥ sūtaḥ paurāṇiko naimiṣāraṇye śaunakasya kulapater dvādaśavārṣike satre
a samāsīnān abhyagacchad brahmarṣīn saṃśitavratān
c vinayāvanato bhūtvā kadā cit sūtanandanaḥ
a tam āśramam anuprāptaṃ naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ
b uvāca tān ṛṣīn sarvān dhanyo vo 'smy adya darśanāt
b veda vaiyāsikīḥ sarvāḥ kathā dharmārthasaṃhitāḥ
b vakṣyāmi vo dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ śṛṇvantv adya tapodhanāḥ
b tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ
c citrāḥ śrotuṃ kathās tatra parivavrus tapasvinaḥ
a abhivādya munīṃs tāṃs tu sarvān eva kṛtāñjaliḥ
c apṛcchat sa tapovṛddhiṃ sadbhiś caivābhinanditaḥ
a atha teṣūpaviṣṭeṣu sarveṣv eva tapasviṣu
c nirdiṣṭam āsanaṃ bheje vinayāl lomaharṣaṇiḥ
a sukhāsīnaṃ tatas taṃ tu viśrāntam upalakṣya ca
c athāpṛcchad ṛṣis tatra kaś cit prastāvayan kathāḥ
a kuta āgamyate saute kva cāyaṃ vihṛtas tvayā
c kālaḥ kamalapatrākṣa śaṃsaitat pṛcchato mama
d evaṃ pṛṣṭo 'bravīt samyag yathāval lomaharṣaṇiḥ
d vākyaṃ vacanasaṃpannas teṣāṃ tu caritāśrayam
d tasmin sadasi vistīrṇe munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
 sūta uvāca
a janamejayasya rājarṣeḥ sarpasatre mahātmanaḥ
c samīpe pārthivendrasya samyak pārikṣitasya ca
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaproktāḥ supuṇyā vividhāḥ kathāḥ
c kathitāś cāpi vidhivad yā vaiśaṃpāyanena vai
a śrutvāhaṃ tā vicitrārthā mahābhāratasaṃśritāḥ
c bahūni saṃparikramya tīrthāny āyatanāni ca
a samantapañcakaṃ nāma puṇyaṃ dvijaniṣevitam
c gatavān asmi taṃ deśaṃ yuddhaṃ yatrābhavat purā
e pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitām
a didṛkṣur āgatas tasmāt samīpaṃ bhavatām iha
c āyuṣmantaḥ sarva eva brahmabhūtā hi me matāḥ
a asmin yajñe mahābhāgāḥ sūryapāvakavarcasaḥ
c kṛtābhiṣekāḥ śucayaḥ kṛtajapyā hutāgnayaḥ
e bhavanta āsate svasthā bravīmi kim ahaṃ dvijāḥ
a purāṇasaṃśritāḥ puṇyāḥ kathā vā dharmasaṃśritāḥ
c itivṛttaṃ narendrāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
d śrutaṃ me bhāratākhyānaṃ dharmakāmārthamokṣadam
d janamejayena pṛṣṭaḥ san vaiśaṃpāyana uktavān
d ṛṣīṇām agratas tatra dharmiṣṭhānāṃ mahātmanām
d vyāsadevājñayā tatra yad vaiśaṃpāyanas tadā
d śrutaṃ vai bhāratākhyānaṃ vedārthaiś copabṛṃhitam
d tatra me viditaṃ sarvaṃ bhāratākhyānam āditaḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a dvaipāyanena yat proktaṃ purāṇaṃ paramarṣiṇā
c surair brahmarṣibhiś caiva śrutvā yad abhipūjitam
a tasyākhyānavariṣṭhasya vicitrapadaparvaṇaḥ
c sūkṣmārthanyāyayuktasya vedārthair bhūṣitasya ca
a bhāratasyetihāsasya puṇyāṃ granthārthasaṃyutām
c saṃskāropagatāṃ brāhmīṃ nānāśāstropabṛṃhitām
a janamejayasya yāṃ rājño vaiśaṃpāyana uktavān
c yathāvat sa ṛṣis tuṣṭyā satre dvaipāyanājñayā
a vedaiś caturbhiḥ samitāṃ vyāsasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ
c saṃhitāṃ śrotum icchāmo dharmyāṃ pāpabhayāpahām
 sūta uvāca
a ādyaṃ puruṣam īśānaṃ puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutam
c ṛtam ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyaktāvyaktaṃ sanātanam
a asac ca sac caiva ca yad viśvaṃ sadasataḥ param
c parāvarāṇāṃ sraṣṭāraṃ purāṇaṃ param avyayam
a maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ viṣṇuṃ vareṇyam anaghaṃ śucim
c namaskṛtya hṛṣīkeśaṃ carācaraguruṃ harim
a maharṣeḥ pūjitasyeha sarvaloke mahātmanaḥ
c pravakṣyāmi mataṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ
d namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase
d yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imām
d sarvāśramābhigamanaṃ sarvatīrthāvagāhanam
d na tathā phaladaṃ sūte nārāyaṇakathā yathā
d nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
d etena satyavākyena sarvārthān sādhayāmy aham
a ācakhyuḥ kavayaḥ ke cit saṃpraty ācakṣate pare
c ākhyāsyanti tathaivānye itihāsam imaṃ bhuvi
a idaṃ tu triṣu lokeṣu mahaj jñānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c vistaraiś ca samāsaiś ca dhāryate yad dvijātibhiḥ
a alaṃkṛtaṃ śubhaiḥ śabdaiḥ samayair divyamānuṣaiḥ
c chandovṛttaiś ca vividhair anvitaṃ viduṣāṃ priyam
d puṇye himavataḥ pāde medhye giriguhālaye
d viśodhya dehaṃ dharmātmā darbhasaṃstaram āśritaḥ
d śuciḥ saniyamo vyāsaḥ śāntātmā tapasi sthitaḥ
d bhāratasyetihāsasya dharmeṇānvīkṣya tāṃ gatim
d praviśya yogaṃ jñānena so 'paśyat sarvam antataḥ
a niṣprabhe 'smin nirāloke sarvatas tamasāvṛte
c bṛhad aṇḍam abhūd ekaṃ prajānāṃ bījam akṣayam
a yugasyādau nimittaṃ tan mahad divyaṃ pracakṣate
c yasmiṃs tac chrūyate satyaṃ jyotir brahma sanātanam
a adbhutaṃ cāpy acintyaṃ ca sarvatra samatāṃ gatam
c avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ yat tat sadasadātmakam
a yasmāt pitāmaho jajñe prabhur ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ
c brahmā suraguruḥ sthāṇur manuḥ kaḥ parameṣṭhy atha
a prācetasas tathā dakṣo dakṣaputrāś ca sapta ye
c tataḥ prajānāṃ patayaḥ prābhavann ekaviṃśatiḥ
a puruṣaś cāprameyātmā yaṃ sarvam ṛṣayo viduḥ
c viśvedevās tathādityā vasavo 'thāśvināv api
a yakṣāḥ sādhyāḥ piśācāś ca guhyakāḥ pitaras tathā
c tataḥ prasūtā vidvāṃsaḥ śiṣṭā brahmarṣayo 'malāḥ
a rājarṣayaś ca bahavaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditā guṇaiḥ
c āpo dyauḥ pṛthivī vāyur antarikṣaṃ diśas tathā
a saṃvatsarartavo māsāḥ pakṣāhorātrayaḥ kramāt
b kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca nimeṣā yugaparyayāḥ
c yac cānyad api tat sarvaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ lokasākṣikam
a yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiṃ cid bhūtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
c punaḥ saṃkṣipyate sarvaṃ jagat prāpte yugakṣaye
a yathartāv ṛtuliṅgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye
c dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu
a evam etad anādyantaṃ bhūtasaṃhārakārakam
c anādinidhanaṃ loke cakraṃ saṃparivartate
a trayastriṃśatsahasrāṇi trayastriṃśacchatāni ca
c trayastriṃśac ca devānāṃ sṛṣṭiḥ saṃkṣepalakṣaṇā
a divasputro bṛhadbhānuś cakṣur ātmā vibhāvasuḥ
c savitā ca ṛcīko 'rko bhānur āśāvaho raviḥ
a putrā vivasvataḥ sarve mahyas teṣāṃ tathāvaraḥ
c devabhrāṭ tanayas tasya tasmāt subhrāḍ iti smṛtaḥ
a subhrājas tu trayaḥ putrāḥ prajāvanto bahuśrutāḥ
c daśajyotiḥ śatajyotiḥ sahasrajyotir ātmavān

c tato daśaguṇāś cānye śatajyoter ihātmajāḥ
a bhūyas tato daśaguṇāḥ sahasrajyotiṣaḥ sutāḥ
c tebhyo 'yaṃ kuruvaṃśaś ca yadūnāṃ bharatasya ca
a yayātīkṣvākuvaṃśaś ca rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c saṃbhūtā bahavo vaṃśā bhūtasargāḥ savistarāḥ
a bhūtasthānāni sarvāṇi rahasyaṃ trividhaṃ ca yat
c vedayogaṃ savijñānaṃ dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma eva ca
a dharmakāmārthaśāstrāṇi śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca
c lokayātrāvidhānaṃ ca saṃbhūtaṃ dṛṣṭavān ṛṣiḥ
d nītir bharatavaṃśasya vistaraś caiva sarvaśaḥ
a itihāsāḥ savaiyākhyā vividhāḥ śrutayo 'pi ca
c iha sarvam anukrāntam uktaṃ granthasya lakṣaṇam
d saṃkṣepeṇetihāsasya tato vakṣyāmi vistaram
a vistīryaitan mahaj jñānam ṛṣiḥ saṃkṣepam abravīt
c iṣṭaṃ hi viduṣāṃ loke samāsavyāsadhāraṇam
a manvādi bhārataṃ ke cid āstīkādi tathāpare
c tathoparicarādy anye viprāḥ samyag adhīyate
a vividhaṃ saṃhitājñānaṃ dīpayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c vyākhyātuṃ kuśalāḥ ke cid granthaṃ dhārayituṃ pare
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vyasya vedaṃ sanātanam
c itihāsam imaṃ cakre puṇyaṃ satyavatīsutaḥ
a parāśarātmajo vidvān brahmarṣiḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
b kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
b ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet
b bhāti sarveṣu vedeṣu ratiḥ sarveṣu jantuṣu
b taraṇaṃ sarvalokānāṃ tasmād bhāratam ucyate
c mātur niyogād dharmātmā gāṅgeyasya ca dhīmataḥ
a kṣetre vicitravīryasya kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ purā
c trīn agnīn iva kauravyāñ janayām āsa vīryavān
a utpādya dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ viduram eva ca
c jagāma tapase dhīmān punar evāśramaṃ prati
a teṣu jāteṣu vṛddheṣu gateṣu paramāṃ gatim
b evaṃ vai saṃgrahādhyāyaḥ pūrvam eva maharṣiṇā
b kramaṇaprastarair yuktaḥ kathaṃ cid apy atīva hi
b etadarthaṃ ca vihitaḥ saṃgraho 'yaṃ yathāśrutaḥ
b tac chrutvā sarvam ākhyātaṃ loke jñāsyanti mānavāḥ
c abravīd bhārataṃ loke mānuṣe 'smin mahān ṛṣiḥ
a janamejayena pṛṣṭaḥ san brāhmaṇaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
c śaśāsa śiṣyam āsīnaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam antike
a sa sadasyaiḥ sahāsīnaḥ śrāvayām āsa bhāratam
c karmāntareṣu yajñasya codyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a vistaraṃ kuruvaṃśasya gāndhāryā dharmaśīlatām
c kṣattuḥ prajñāṃ dhṛtiṃ kuntyāḥ samyag dvaipāyano 'bravīt
a vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca satyatām
c durvṛttaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām uktavān bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
d idaṃ śatasahasrākhyaṃ ślokānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
d upākhyānaiḥ saha jñeyaṃ śrāvyaṃ bhāratam uttamam
a caturviṃśatisāhasrīṃ cakre bhāratasaṃhitām
c upākhyānair vinā tāvad bhārataṃ procyate budhaiḥ
a tato 'dhyardhaśataṃ bhūyaḥ saṃkṣepaṃ kṛtavān ṛṣiḥ
c anukramaṇim adhyāyaṃ vṛttāntānāṃ saparvaṇām
d sūtaḥ
d tasyākhyānavariṣṭhasya kṛtvā dvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
d katham adhyāpayānīha śiṣyān ittham acintayat
d tasya cintayataś cāpi ṛṣer dvaipāyanasya ca
d smṛtvājagāma bhagavān brahmā lokaguruḥ svayam
d priyārthaṃ maharṣeś cāpi lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismito bhūtvā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
d āsanaṃ kalpayām āsa sarvadevagaṇair yutam
d hiraṇyagarbham āsīnaṃ tasmiṃs tu paramāsane
d parivṛtyāsanābhyāśe vāsaveyaḥ sthito nataḥ
d anujñāto 'tha kṛṣṇas tu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
d niṣasādāsanābhyāśe prīyamāṇaḥ suvismitaḥ
d uvāca sa mahātejā brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
d kṛtaṃ mayedaṃ bhagavan kāvyaṃ paramapūjitam
d brahman vedarahasyaṃ ca yac cānyat khyāpitaṃ mayā
d sāṅgopaniṣadānāṃ ca vedānāṃ vistarakriyā
d itihāsapurāṇānām unmeṣaṃ nimiṣaṃ ca yat
d bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca trividhaṃ kālasaṃjñitam
d jarāmṛtyubhayavyādhibhāvābhāvaviniścayam
d vividhasya ca dharmasya hy āśramāṇāṃ ca lakṣaṇam
d cāturvarṇyavidhānaṃ ca purāṇārthaṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
d tapaso brahmacaryasya pṛthivyāś candrasūryayoḥ
d grahanakṣatratārāṇāṃ pramāṇaṃ ca yugaiḥ saha
d ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni vedādhyātmaṃ tathaiva ca
d nyāyaḥ śikṣā cikitsā ca jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
d iti naikāśrayaṃ janma divyamānuṣasaṃśritam
d tīrthānāṃ caiva puṇyānāṃ deśānāṃ caiva kīrtanam
d nadīnāṃ parvatānāṃ ca vanānāṃ sāgarasya ca
d purāṇāṃ caiva divyānāṃ kalpānāṃ yuddhakauśalam
d vākyajātiviśeṣāṃś ca lokayātrākramaś ca yaḥ
d yac cāpi sarvagaṃ vastu tat prabho kṣantum arhasi
d tapoviśiṣṭād api vai vasiṣṭhān munipuṃgavāt
d manye śreṣṭhatamaṃ tvādya rahasyajñānavedanāt
d janmaprabhṛti satyāṃ te vidma gāṃ brahmavādinīm
d tvayā ca kāvyam ity uktaṃ tasmāt kāvyaṃ bhaviṣyati
d asya kāvyasya kavayo na samarthā viśeṣaṇe
d viśeṣaṇe gṛhasthasya śeṣās traya ivāśramāḥ
d jaḍāndhabadhironmattaṃ tamobhūtaṃ jagad bhavet
d yadi jñānahutāśena tvayā nojjvalitaṃ bhavet
d tamasāndhasya lokasya veṣṭitasya svakarmabhiḥ
d jñānāñjanaśalākābhir buddhinetrotsavaḥ kṛtaḥ
d dharmārthakāmamokṣārthaiḥ samāsavyāsakīrtanaiḥ
d tvayā bhāratasūryeṇa nṛṇāṃ vinihataṃ tamaḥ
d purāṇapūrṇacandreṇa śrutijyotsnāprakāśinā
d nṛṇāṃ kumudasaumyānāṃ kṛtaṃ buddhiprabodhanam
d itihāsapradīpena mohāvaraṇaghātinā
d lokagarbhagṛhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yathāvat saṃprakāśitam
d saṃgrahādhyāyabījo vai paulomāstīkamūlavān
d saṃbhavaskandhavistāraḥ sabhāraṇyaviṭaṅkavān
d araṇīparvarūpāḍhyo virāṭodyogasāravān
d bhīṣmaparvamahāśākho droṇaparvapalāśavān
d karṇaparvacitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ śalyaparvasugandhibhiḥ
d strīparvaiṣīkaviśrāmaḥ śāntiparvabṛhatphalaḥ
d aśvamedhāmṛtarasas tvāśramasthānasaṃśrayaḥ
d mausalaśrutisaṃkṣepaḥ śiṣṭadvijaniṣevitaḥ
d sarveṣāṃ kavimukhyānām upajīvyo bhaviṣyati
d parjanya iva bhūtānām akṣayo bhāratadrumaḥ
d evam ābhāṣya taṃ brahmā jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
d bhagavān sa jagatsraṣṭā ṛṣidevagaṇaiḥ saha
d tasya vṛkṣasya vakṣyāmi śaśvat puṣpaphalodayam

c satyāṃ nistīrṇāṃ śatrumadhye ca tena
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ śrāntahaye dhanaṃjaye
muktvā hayān pāyayitvopavṛttān
c punar yuktvā vāsudevaṃ prayātaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ vāhaneṣv āśvasatsu
rathopasthe tiṣṭhatā gāṇḍivena
c sarvān yodhān vāritān arjunena
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ nāgabalair durutsahaṃ
droṇānīkaṃ yuyudhānaṃ pramathya
c yātaṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ yatra tau kṛṣṇapārthau
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇam āsādya muktaṃ
vadhād bhīmaṃ kutsayitvā vacobhiḥ
c dhanuṣkoṭyā tudya karṇena vīraṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadā droṇaḥ kṛtavarmā kṛpaś ca
karṇo drauṇir madrarājaś ca śūraḥ
c amarṣayan saindhavaṃ vadhyamānaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ devarājena dattāṃ
divyāṃ śaktiṃ vyaṃsitāṃ mādhavena
c ghaṭotkace rākṣase ghorarūpe
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇaghaṭotkacābhyāṃ
yuddhe muktāṃ sūtaputreṇa śaktim
c yayā vadhyaḥ samare savyasācī
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇam ācāryam ekaṃ
dhṛṣṭadyumnenābhyatikramya dharmam
c rathopasthe prāyagataṃ viśastaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ drauṇinā dvairathasthaṃ
mādrīputraṃ nakulaṃ lokamadhye
c samaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavaṃ yudhyamānaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadā droṇe nihate droṇaputro
nārāyaṇaṃ divyam astraṃ vikurvan
c naiṣām antaṃ gatavān pāṇḍavānāṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
d yadāśrauṣaṃ bhīmasenena pītaṃ
d raktaṃ bhrātur yudhi duḥśāsanasya
d nivāritaṃ nānyatamena bhīmaṃ
d tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
d yadāśrauṣaṃ bhīmakarmāṇam ugraṃ
d raṇe bhīmaṃ śoṇitaṃ pītavantam
d bhittvā vakṣo yuvarājasya sūta
d tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ karṇam atyantaśūraṃ
hataṃ pārthenāhaveṣv apradhṛṣyam
c tasmin bhrātṝṇāṃ vigrahe devaguhye
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputraṃ kṛpaṃ ca
duḥśāsanaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam ugram
c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śūnyam adharṣayantaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ nihataṃ madrarājaṃ
raṇe śūraṃ dharmarājena sūta
c sadā saṃgrāme spardhate yaḥ sa kṛṣṇaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ kalahadyūtamūlaṃ
māyābalaṃ saubalaṃ pāṇḍavena
c hataṃ saṃgrāme sahadevena pāpaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ śrāntam ekaṃ śayānaṃ
hradaṃ gatvā stambhayitvā tad ambhaḥ
c duryodhanaṃ virathaṃ bhagnadarpaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ pāṇḍavāṃs tiṣṭhamānān
gaṅgāhrade vāsudevena sārdham
c amarṣaṇaṃ dharṣayataḥ sutaṃ me
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ vividhāṃs tāta mārgān
gadāyuddhe maṇḍalaṃ saṃcarantam
c mithyā hataṃ vāsudevasya buddhyā
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputrādibhis tair
hatān pāñcālān draupadeyāṃś ca suptān
c kṛtaṃ bībhatsam ayaśasyaṃ ca karma
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ bhīmasenānuyātena
aśvatthāmnā paramāstraṃ prayuktam
c kruddhenaiṣīkam avadhīd yena garbhaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ brahmaśiro 'rjunena
muktaṃ svastīty astram astreṇa śāntam
c aśvatthāmnā maṇiratnaṃ ca dattaṃ
tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
a yadāśrauṣaṃ droṇaputreṇa garbhe
vairāṭyā vai pātyamāne mahāstre
b saṃjīvayāmīti hareḥ pratijñāṃ
b tadā nāśaṃse vijayāya saṃjaya
c dvaipāyanaḥ keśavo droṇaputraṃ
paraspareṇābhiśāpaiḥ śaśāpa
d buddhvā cāhaṃ buddhihīno 'dya sūta
d saṃtapye 'haṃ putrapautraiś ca hīnaḥ
d saṃcintayann adya vihīnabuddhiḥ
d kartavyatāṃ nābhijānāmi sūta
a śocyā gāndhārī putrapautrair vihīnā
tathā vadhvaḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś ca
c kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ duṣkaraṃ pāṇḍaveyaiḥ
prāptaṃ rājyam asapatnaṃ punas taiḥ
a kaṣṭaṃ yuddhe daśa śeṣāḥ śrutā me
trayo 'smākaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sapta
c dvyūnā viṃśatir āhatākṣauhiṇīnāṃ
tasmin saṃgrāme vigrahe kṣatriyāṇām
d kālābhipannā samitir mahātmanāṃ
d niṣūditā hetur āsīt suto me
a tamasā tv abhyavastīrṇo moha āviśatīva mām
c saṃjñāṃ nopalabhe sūta mano vihvalatīva me
a ity uktvā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'tha vilapya bahuduḥkhitaḥ
c mūrcchitaḥ punar āśvastaḥ saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
a saṃjayaivaṃgate prāṇāṃs tyaktum icchāmi māciram
c stokaṃ hy api na paśyāmi phalaṃ jīvitadhāraṇe
a taṃ tathāvādinaṃ dīnaṃ vilapantaṃ mahīpatim
b niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ muhyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
c gāvalgaṇir idaṃ dhīmān mahārthaṃ vākyam abravīt
a śrutavān asi vai rājño mahotsāhān mahābalān
c dvaipāyanasya vadato nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
a mahatsu rājavaṃśeṣu guṇaiḥ samuditeṣu ca
c jātān divyāstraviduṣaḥ śakrapratimatejasaḥ
a dharmeṇa pṛthivīṃ jitvā yajñair iṣṭvāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c asmiṃl loke yaśaḥ prāpya tataḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
a vainyaṃ mahārathaṃ vīraṃ sṛñjayaṃ jayatāṃ varam
c suhotraṃ rantidevaṃ ca kakṣīvantaṃ tathauśijam

c viśvāmitram amitraghnam ambarīṣaṃ mahābalam
a maruttaṃ manum ikṣvākuṃ gayaṃ bharatam eva ca
c rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ caiva śaśabinduṃ bhagīratham
d kṛtavīryaṃ mahābhāgaṃ tathaiva janamejayam
a yayātiṃ śubhakarmāṇaṃ devair yo yājitaḥ svayam

a iti rājñāṃ caturviṃśan nāradena surarṣiṇā
c putraśokābhitaptāya purā śaibyāya kīrtitāḥ
a tebhyaś cānye gatāḥ pūrvaṃ rājāno balavattarāḥ
c mahārathā mahātmānaḥ sarvaiḥ samuditā guṇaiḥ
a pūruḥ kurur yaduḥ śūro viṣvagaśvo mahādhṛtiḥ
c anenā yuvanāśvaś ca kakutstho vikramī raghuḥ
a vijitī vītihotraś ca bhavaḥ śveto bṛhadguruḥ
c uśīnaraḥ śatarathaḥ kaṅko duliduho drumaḥ
a dambhodbhavaḥ paro venaḥ sagaraḥ saṃkṛtir nimiḥ
c ajeyaḥ paraśuḥ puṇḍraḥ śambhur devāvṛdho 'naghaḥ
a devāhvayaḥ supratimaḥ supratīko bṛhadrathaḥ
c mahotsāho vinītātmā sukratur naiṣadho nalaḥ
a satyavrataḥ śāntabhayaḥ sumitraḥ subalaḥ prabhuḥ
c jānujaṅgho 'naraṇyo 'rkaḥ priyabhṛtyaḥ śubhavrataḥ
a balabandhur nirāmardaḥ ketuśṛṅgo bṛhadbalaḥ
c dhṛṣṭaketur bṛhatketur dīptaketur nirāmayaḥ
a avikṣit prabalo dhūrtaḥ kṛtabandhur dṛḍheṣudhiḥ
c mahāpurāṇaḥ saṃbhāvyaḥ pratyaṅgaḥ parahā śrutiḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
c śrūyante 'yutaśaś cānye saṃkhyātāś cāpi padmaśaḥ
a hitvā suvipulān bhogān buddhimanto mahābalāḥ
c rājāno nidhanaṃ prāptās tava putrair mahattamāḥ
a yeṣāṃ divyāni karmāṇi vikramas tyāga eva ca
c māhātmyam api cāstikyaṃ satyatā śaucam ārjavam
a vidvadbhiḥ kathyate loke purāṇaiḥ kavisattamaiḥ
c sarvarddhiguṇasaṃpannās te cāpi nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
a tava putrā durātmānaḥ prataptāś caiva manyunā
c lubdhā durvṛttabhūyiṣṭhā na tāñ śocitum arhasi
a śrutavān asi medhāvī buddhimān prājñasaṃmataḥ
c yeṣāṃ śāstrānugā buddhir na te muhyanti bhārata
a nigrahānugrahau cāpi viditau te narādhipa
c nātyantam evānuvṛttiḥ śrūyate putrarakṣaṇe
a bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca nātaḥ śocitum arhasi
c daivaṃ prajñāviśeṣeṇa ko nivartitum arhati
a vidhātṛvihitaṃ mārgaṃ na kaś cid ativartate
c kālamūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ bhāvābhāvau sukhāsukhe
a kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ
c nirdahantaṃ prajāḥ kālaṃ kālaḥ śamayate punaḥ
a kālo vikurute bhāvān sarvāṃl loke śubhāśubhān
c kālaḥ saṃkṣipate sarvāḥ prajā visṛjate punaḥ
d kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d atītān āgatān vāpi vartamānās tathā budhāḥ
d nānuśocanti rājendra kālo hi jagadantakaḥ
e kālaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu caraty avidhṛtaḥ samaḥ
a atītānāgatā bhāvā ye ca vartanti sāṃpratam
c tān kālanirmitān buddhvā na saṃjñāṃ hātum arhasi
d ity evaṃ putraśokārtaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janeśvaram
d āśvāsya svastham akarot sūto gāvalgaṇis tadā
d evam uktvā ca rājānaṃ saṃjayo virarāma ha
d dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi tac chrutvā dhṛtim eva samāśrayat
d diṣṭyedam āgatam iti matvā sa prājñasattamaḥ
 sūta uvāca
a atropaniṣadaṃ puṇyāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
c bhāratādhyayanāt puṇyād api pādam adhīyataḥ
e śraddadhānasya pūyante sarvapāpāny aśeṣataḥ
f lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya kāruṇyān munisattamaḥ
f bhārataṃ bhānumān indur yadi na syur amī trayaḥ
f ajñānatimirāndhasya kāvasthā jagato bhavet
f matimanthānam āvidhya yena vedamahārṇavāt
f jagaddhitāya janito mahābhāratacandramāḥ
a devarṣayo hy atra puṇyā brahmarājarṣayas tathā
c kīrtyante śubhakarmāṇas tathā yakṣamahoragāḥ
a bhagavān vāsudevaś ca kīrtyate 'tra sanātanaḥ
c sa hi satyam ṛtaṃ caiva pavitraṃ puṇyam eva ca
a śāśvataṃ brahma paramaṃ dhruvaṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam
c yasya divyāni karmāṇi kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a asat sat sad asac caiva yasmād devāt pravartate
c saṃtatiś ca pravṛttiś ca janma mṛtyuḥ punarbhavaḥ
a adhyātmaṃ śrūyate yac ca pañcabhūtaguṇātmakam
c avyaktādi paraṃ yac ca sa eva parigīyate
a yat tad yativarā yuktā dhyānayogabalānvitāḥ
c pratibimbam ivādarśe paśyanty ātmany avasthitam
a śraddadhānaḥ sadodyuktaḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
c āsevann imam adhyāyaṃ naraḥ pāpāt pramucyate
a anukramaṇim adhyāyaṃ bhāratasyemam āditaḥ
c āstikaḥ satataṃ śṛṇvan na kṛcchreṣv avasīdati
a ubhe saṃdhye japan kiṃ cit sadyo mucyeta kilbiṣāt
c anukramaṇyā yāvat syād ahnā rātryā ca saṃcitam
a bhāratasya vapur hy etat satyaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca
b divyā yajñāś ca nikhilā viṣṇuś copaniṣan mahat
b āraṇyakaṃ ca vedebhya oṣadhibhyo 'mṛtaṃ yathā
c navanītaṃ yathā dadhno dvipadāṃ brāhmaṇo yathā
a hradānām udadhiḥ śreṣṭho gaur variṣṭhā catuṣpadām
c yathaitāni variṣṭhāni tathā bhāratam ucyate
a yaś cainaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe brāhmaṇān pādam antataḥ
c akṣayyam annapānaṃ tat pitṝṃs tasyopatiṣṭhati
a itihāsapurāṇābhyāṃ vedaṃ samupabṛṃhayet
c bibhety alpaśrutād vedo mām ayaṃ pratariṣyati
a kārṣṇaṃ vedam imaṃ vidvāñ śrāvayitvārtham aśnute
c bhrūṇahatyākṛtaṃ cāpi pāpaṃ jahyān na saṃśayaḥ
a ya imaṃ śucir adhyāyaṃ paṭhet parvaṇi parvaṇi
c adhītaṃ bhārataṃ tena kṛtsnaṃ syād iti me matiḥ
a yaś cemaṃ śṛṇuyān nityam ārṣaṃ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ
c sa dīrgham āyuḥ kīrtiṃ ca svargatiṃ cāpnuyān naraḥ
a catvāra ekato vedā bhārataṃ caikam ekataḥ
c samāgataiḥ surarṣibhis tulām āropitaṃ purā
d caturbhyaḥ sarahasyebhyo vedebhyo hy adhikaṃ yadā
d tadā prabhṛti loke 'smin mahābhāratam ucyate
e mahattve ca gurutve ca dhriyamāṇaṃ tato 'dhikam
a mahattvād bhāravattvāc ca mahābhāratam ucyate
c niruktam asya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a tapo na kalko 'dhyayanaṃ na kalkaḥ
svābhāviko vedavidhir na kalkaḥ
c prasahya vittāharaṇaṃ na kalkas
tāny eva bhāvopahatāni kalkaḥ
d śrīsūtaḥ
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ vibhum
d ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet
d matimanthānam āvidhya yena vedamahārṇavāt
d jagaddhitāya janito mahābhāratacandramāḥ
d stutyaṃ tasyāsti kiṃ cānyat sarvalokahitaiṣiṇaḥ
d vedā vyastāḥ kṛtaṃ tena mahābhāratam adbhutam
d sarve tarantu durgāṇi sarvo bhadrāṇi paśyatu
d ity uktvā sarvavedārthān bhārate tena darśitāḥ
d śrūyatāṃ siṃhanādo 'yam ṛṣabhasya mahātmanaḥ
d dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca paramarṣabha
d yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kva cit
d eṣa prakṛtyaiva yato lokaḥ sakto 'rthakāmayoḥ
d dharmamokṣaparaṃ tasmāt kariṣye 'haṃ samuccayam
d kāmino varṇayan kāmaṃ lobhaṃ lubdhasya varṇayan
d naraḥ kiṃ phalam āpnoti kūpe 'ndham iva pātayan
d munināpi ca kāmārthau matvā lokamanoharau
d nindyāv api sthitāv etau dharmamokṣavivakṣayā
d anyathā ghorasaṃsārabandhahetū janasya tau
d varṇayeta kathaṃ dhīmān mahākāruṇiko muniḥ
d lokacintāvatārārthaṃ varṇayitvā ca tena tau
d itihāsair vicitrārthaiḥ punar atraiva ninditau
d bhārataṃ bhānumān indur yadi na syur amī trayaḥ
d ajñānatimirāndhe kā vyavasthā jagato bhavet
d etad vijñāya vidvadbhir nityaṃ śraddhāsamanvitaiḥ
d adhyeyo bhāratīyo 'yam itihāsasamuccayaḥ
d ślokā ye bhārate vāpi kva cit ke cid vyavasthitāḥ
d tulyārthās saṃhitāṃ puṇyāṃ yojayiṣye tu tām aham
d tac chlokāṃś ca samuddhartuṃ kaḥ kṛtsnān bhārate kṣamaḥ
d yogataḥ sarvaratnāni samuddhartuṃ mahārṇavāt
d na ca prajñābhimānena yad ayaṃ kartum udyataḥ
d kiṃ tu bhāratabhaktir māṃ vivaśaṃ samacūcudat
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a samantapañcakam iti yad uktaṃ sūtanandana
c etat sarvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmahe vayam
 sūta uvāca
a śuśrūṣā yadi vo viprā bruvataś ca kathāḥ śubhāḥ
c samantapañcakākhyaṃ ca śrotum arhatha sattamāḥ
a tretādvāparayoḥ saṃdhau rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c asakṛt pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ jaghānāmarṣacoditaḥ
a sa sarvaṃ kṣatram utsādya svavīryeṇānaladyutiḥ
c samantapañcake pañca cakāra rudhirahradān
d yojayānām avistīrṇāñ jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
a sa teṣu rudhirāmbhassu hradeṣu krodhamūrcchitaḥ
c pitṝn saṃtarpayām āsa rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam
a atharcīkādayo 'bhyetya pitaro brāhmaṇarṣabham
b rāma uvāca
b rāma rāma mahābhāga prītāḥ sma tava bhārgava
b anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibho
b varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kim icchasi mahādyute
b yadi me pitaraḥ prītā yady anugrāhyatā mayi
b yac ca roṣābhibhūtena kṣatram utsāditaṃ mayā
b ataś ca pāpān mucyeham eṣa me prārthito varaḥ
b hradāś ca tīrthabhūtā me bhaveyur bhuvi viśrutāḥ
b evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āhuḥ pitaro brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ
c taṃ kṣamasveti siṣidhus tataḥ sa virarāma ha
a teṣāṃ samīpe yo deśo hradānāṃ rudhirāmbhasām
c samantapañcakam iti puṇyaṃ tatparikīrtitam
a yena liṅgena yo deśo yuktaḥ samupalakṣyate
c tenaiva nāmnā taṃ deśaṃ vācyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a antare caiva saṃprāpte kalidvāparayor abhūt
c samantapañcake yuddhaṃ kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥ
a tasmin paramadharmiṣṭhe deśe bhūdoṣavarjite
c aṣṭādaśa samājagmur akṣauhiṇyo yuyutsayā
d sametya taṃ dvijās tāś ca tatraiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
a evaṃ nāmābhinirvṛttaṃ tasya deśasya vai dvijāḥ
c puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca sa deśo vaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
a tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ mayā vo munisattamāḥ
c yathā deśaḥ sa vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a akṣauhiṇya iti proktaṃ yat tvayā sūtanandana
c etad icchāmahe śrotuṃ sarvam eva yathātatham
a akṣauhiṇyāḥ parīmāṇaṃ rathāśvanaradantinām
c yathāvac caiva no brūhi sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava
 sūta uvāca
a eko ratho gajaś caiko narāḥ pañca padātayaḥ
c trayaś ca turagās tajjñaiḥ pattir ity abhidhīyate
a pattiṃ tu triguṇām etām āhuḥ senāmukhaṃ budhāḥ
c trīṇi senāmukhāny eko gulma ity abhidhīyate
a trayo gulmā gaṇo nāma vāhinī tu gaṇās trayaḥ
c smṛtās tisras tu vāhinyaḥ pṛtaneti vicakṣaṇaiḥ
a camūs tu pṛtanās tisras tisraś camvas tv anīkinī
c anīkinīṃ daśaguṇāṃ prāhur akṣauhiṇīṃ budhāḥ
a akṣauhiṇyāḥ prasaṃkhyānaṃ rathānāṃ dvijasattamāḥ
c saṃkhyāgaṇitatattvajñaiḥ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ
a śatāny upari caivāṣṭau tathā bhūyaś ca saptatiḥ
c gajānāṃ tu parīmāṇam etad evātra nirdiśet
a jñeyaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu sahasrāṇi tathā nava
c narāṇām api pañcāśac chatāni trīṇi cānaghāḥ
a pañcaṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi tathāśvānāṃ śatāni ca
c daśottarāṇi ṣaṭ prāhur yathāvad iha saṃkhyayā
a etām akṣauhiṇīṃ prāhuḥ saṃkhyātattvavido janāḥ
c yāṃ vaḥ kathitavān asmi vistareṇa dvijottamāḥ
a etayā saṃkhyayā hy āsan kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥ
c akṣauhiṇyo dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ piṇḍenāṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ
a sametās tatra vai deśe tatraiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
c kauravān kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā kālenādbhutakarmaṇā
a ahāni yuyudhe bhīṣmo daśaiva paramāstravit
c ahāni pañca droṇas tu rarakṣa kuruvāhinīm
a ahanī yuyudhe dve tu karṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
c śalyo 'rdhadivasaṃ tv āsīd gadāyuddham ataḥ param
d duryodhanasya bhīmasya dinārdham abhavat tayoḥ
a tasyaiva tu dinasyānte hārdikyadrauṇigautamāḥ
c prasuptaṃ niśi viśvastaṃ jaghnur yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ balam
a yat tu śaunakasatre te bhāratākhyānavistaram
b janamejayasya tatsatre vyāsaśiṣyeṇa dhīmatā
b kathitaṃ vistarārthaṃ ca yaśo vīryaṃ mahīkṣitām
b ākhyānaṃ kathitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ mahābhāratam uttamam
c ākhyāsye tatra paulomam ākhyānaṃ cāditaḥ param
a vicitrārthapadākhyānam anekasamayānvitam
c abhipannaṃ naraiḥ prājñair vairāgyam iva mokṣibhiḥ
a ātmeva veditavyeṣu priyeṣv iva ca jīvitam
c itihāsaḥ pradhānārthaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvāgameṣv ayam
a itihāsottame hy asminn arpitā buddhir uttamā
c svaravyañjanayoḥ kṛtsnā lokavedāśrayeva vāk
a asya prajñābhipannasya vicitrapadaparvaṇaḥ
c bhāratasyetihāsasya śrūyatāṃ parvasaṃgrahaḥ
d ādiparva purā proktaṃ pārāśaryeṇa dhīmatā
a parvānukramaṇī pūrvaṃ dvitīyaṃ parvasaṃgrahaḥ
c pauṣyaṃ paulomam āstīkam ādivaṃśāvatāraṇam
a tataḥ saṃbhavaparvoktam adbhutaṃ devanirmitam
c dāho jatugṛhasyātra haiḍimbaṃ parva cocyate
a tato bakavadhaḥ parva parva caitrarathaṃ tataḥ

a kṣatradharmeṇa nirjitya tato vaivāhikaṃ smṛtam
c vidurāgamanaṃ parva rājyalambhas tathaiva ca
a arjunasya vane vāsaḥ subhadrāharaṇaṃ tataḥ
c subhadrāharaṇād ūrdhvaṃ jñeyaṃ haraṇahārikam
a tataḥ khāṇḍavadāhākhyaṃ tatraiva mayadarśanam
c sabhāparva tataḥ proktaṃ mantraparva tataḥ param
a jarāsaṃdhavadhaḥ parva parva digvijayas tathā
c parva digvijayād ūrdhvaṃ rājasūyikam ucyate

c dyūtaparva tataḥ proktam anudyūtam ataḥ param
a tata āraṇyakaṃ parva kirmīravadha eva ca
b arjunasyābhigamanaṃ parva jñeyam ataḥ param
c īśvarārjunayor yuddhaṃ parva kairātasaṃjñitam
a indralokābhigamanaṃ parva jñeyam ataḥ param
c tīrthayātrā tataḥ parva kururājasya dhīmataḥ
a jaṭāsuravadhaḥ parva yakṣayuddham ataḥ param
b arjunasyāstrasaṃprāptir arjunāgamanaṃ tataḥ
b nivātakavacair yuddhaṃ parva cājagaraṃ tataḥ
c tathaivājagaraṃ parva vijñeyaṃ tadanantaram
a mārkaṇḍeyasamasyā ca parvoktaṃ tadanantaram
c saṃvādaś ca tataḥ parva draupadīsatyabhāmayoḥ
a ghoṣayātrā tataḥ parva mṛgasvapnabhayaṃ tataḥ
b rāmākhyānaṃ tataḥ parva sāvitryākhyānam eva ca
b pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ sāvitryāś caivam adbhutam
b rāmopākhyānam atraiva parva jñeyam ataḥ param
c vrīhidrauṇikam ākhyānaṃ tato 'nantaram ucyate
d mantrasya niścayaṃ kṛtvā kāryasyāpi vicintayan
d nalākhyānam ataḥ parva mṛgasvapnam ataḥ param
d tato nahuṣam ākhyānaṃ tato 'nantaram ucyate
a draupadīharaṇaṃ parva saindhavena vanāt tataḥ
c kuṇḍalāharaṇaṃ parva tataḥ param ihocyate
a āraṇeyaṃ tataḥ parva vairāṭaṃ tadanantaram
b pāṇḍavānāṃ praveśaś ca samayasya ca pālanam
c kīcakānāṃ vadhaḥ parva parva gograhaṇaṃ tataḥ
a abhimanyunā ca vairāṭyāḥ parva vaivāhikaṃ smṛtam
c udyogaparva vijñeyam ata ūrdhvaṃ mahādbhutam
a tataḥ saṃjayayānākhyaṃ parva jñeyam ataḥ param
c prajāgaraṃ tataḥ parva dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cintayā
a parva sānatsujātaṃ ca guhyam adhyātmadarśanam
c yānasaṃdhis tataḥ parva bhagavad yānam eva ca
d mātalīyam upākhyānaṃ caritaṃ gālavasya ca

d udyogaḥ sainyaniryāṇaṃ śvetopākhyānam eva ca
a jñeyaṃ vivādaparvātra karṇasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
b mantrasya niścayaṃ kṛtvā kāryaṃ samabhicintatam
b kīrtyate cāpy upākhyānaṃ saināpatye 'bhiṣecanam
b śvetasya vāsudevena citraṃ bahukathāśrayam
c niryāṇaṃ parva ca tataḥ kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥ
a rathātirathasaṃkhyā ca parvoktaṃ tadanantaram
c ulūkadūtāgamanaṃ parvāmarṣavivardhanam
a ambopākhyānam api ca parva jñeyam ataḥ param
b divyaṃ cakṣur dadau yatra saṃjayāya mahān ṛṣiḥ
c bhīṣmābhiṣecanaṃ parva jñeyam adbhutakāraṇam
a jambūkhaṇḍavinirmāṇaṃ parvoktaṃ tadanantaram
c bhūmiparva tato jñeyaṃ dvīpavistarakīrtanam
a parvoktaṃ bhagavadgītā parva bhīṣmavadhas tataḥ
c droṇābhiṣekaḥ parvoktaṃ saṃśaptakavadhas tataḥ
a abhimanyuvadhaḥ parva pratijñāparva cocyate

c hradapraveśanaṃ parva gadāyuddham ataḥ param

a aiṣīkaṃ parva nirdiṣṭam ata ūrdhvaṃ sudāruṇam
c jalapradānikaṃ parva strīparva ca tataḥ param
a śrāddhaparva tato jñeyaṃ kurūṇām aurdhvadehikam
c ābhiṣecanikaṃ parva dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
a cārvākanigrahaḥ parva rakṣaso brahmarūpiṇaḥ
c pravibhāgo gṛhāṇāṃ ca parvoktaṃ tadanantaram
a śāntiparva tato yatra rājadharmānukīrtanam
c āpaddharmaś ca parvoktaṃ mokṣadharmas tataḥ param
d śukapraśnābhigamanaṃ brahmapraśnānuśāsanam
d prādurbhāvaś ca durvāsaḥ saṃvādaś caiva māyayā

d svargārohaṇikaṃ parva tato jñeyam ataḥ param
a harivaṃśas tataḥ parva purāṇaṃ khilasaṃjñitam
b viṣṇuparva śiśoś caryā viṣṇoḥ kaṃsavadhas tathā
b saubhasya ca vadhaḥ parva bāṇasya narakasya ca
b janamejayasya yajñe tu nakulākhyānam eva ca

c samāso bhāratasyāyaṃ tatroktaḥ parvasaṃgrahaḥ

d saṃbhavo jatuveśmākhyaṃ hiḍimbabakayor vadhaḥ
d tathā caitrarathaṃ devyāḥ pāñcālyāś ca svayaṃvaraḥ

c paulome bhṛguvaṃśasya vistāraḥ parikīrtitaḥ
d ślokānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca pañcāśac chatam eva ca
d adhyāyānāṃ tathāṣṭau ca parvaṇy asmin prakīrtitāḥ
a āstīke sarvanāgānāṃ garuḍasya ca saṃbhavaḥ

d ślokāgraṃ ca sahasraṃ ca triśataṃ cottaraṃ tathā
d ślokāś ca caturāśītiḥ parvaṇy asmiṃs tathaiva ca
d adhyāyānāṃ tataḥ proktaṃ catvāriṃśan maharṣiṇā
a vividhāḥ saṃbhavā rājñām uktāḥ saṃbhavaparvaṇi

c anyeṣāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ vividhānāṃ samudbhavaḥ
d maharṣer āśramapade kaṇvasya ca tapasvinaḥ
d śakuntalāyāṃ duṣyantād bharataś cāpi jajñivān

a vasūnāṃ punar utpattir bhāgīrathyāṃ mahātmanām
c śaṃtanor veśmani punas teṣāṃ cārohaṇaṃ divi
a tejoṃśānāṃ ca saṃghātād bhīṣmasyāpy atra saṃbhavaḥ
c rājyān nivartanaṃ caiva brahmacaryavrate sthitiḥ
a pratijñāpālanaṃ caiva rakṣā citrāṅgadasya ca

a vicitravīryasya tathā rājye saṃpratipādanam
c dharmasya nṛṣu saṃbhūtir aṇīmāṇḍavyaśāpajā
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva prasūtir varadānajā
c dhṛtarāṣṭrasya pāṇḍoś ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ
a vāraṇāvatayātrā ca mantro duryodhanasya ca
b hitopadeśaś ca pathi dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
b vidureṇa kṛto yatra hitārthaṃ mlecchabhāṣayā

d niṣādyāḥ pañcaputrāyāḥ suptāyā jatuveśmani

b svayaṃvaraṃ ca pāñcālyā rārāyantraprabhedanam
b nṛpāṇāṃ saha saṃgrāmaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahādbhutam

d śāpād grāhatvam āpannā brāhmaṇasya tapasvinaḥ
d prabhāsatīrthe pārthasya kṛṣṇena ca samāgamaḥ
a dvārakāyāṃ subhadrā ca kāmayānena kāminī

a haraṇaṃ gṛhya saṃprāpte kṛṣṇe devakinandane

c sabhākriyā pāṇḍavānāṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ ca darśanam

c rājasūyasya cārambho jarāsaṃdhavadhas tathā

b tathā digvijayo 'traiva pāṇḍavānāṃ prakīrtitaḥ
b rājñām āgamanaṃ caiva sārhaṇānāṃ mahākratau
c rājasūye 'rghasaṃvāde śiśupālavadhas tathā
a yajñe vibhūtiṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhāmarṣānvitasya ca
c duryodhanasyāvahāso bhīmena ca sabhātale
a yatrāsya manyur udbhūto yena dyūtam akārayat

b dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāprājñaḥ snuṣāṃ paramaduḥkhitām
c tārayām āsa tāṃs tīrṇāñ jñātvā duryodhano nṛpaḥ
e punar eva tato dyūte samāhvayata pāṇḍavān
f jitvā ca vanavāsāya preṣayām āsa tāṃs tataḥ
a etat sarvaṃ sabhāparva samākhyātaṃ mahātmanā

d ślokānāṃ viṃśatiś caiva saṃkhyātā tattvadarśinā

c yatra rājyaṃ parityajya pāṇḍavāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
e draupadyā sahitā devyā siddhiṃ paramikāṃ gatāḥ

b nideśe vartamānānāṃ deśe tatraiva vartatām
b anudarśitaś ca dharmeṇa devarājñā ca pāṇḍavaḥ
b āplutyākāśagaṅgāyāṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā sa mānuṣam

b svāni sthānāni ca prāptā yatra te puruṣarṣabhāḥ
