b devānāṃ vacanād yatra tanuṃ tyaktvā mahārathaḥ
b svargaṃ nityaṃ mahātejāḥ svasthānam agamad vanam
c adhyāyāḥ pañca saṃkhyātāḥ parvaitad abhisaṃkhyayā
e ślokānāṃ dve śate caiva prasaṃkhyāte tapodhanāḥ
f nava ślokās tathaivānye saṃkhyātāḥ paramarṣiṇā
a aṣṭādaśaivam etāni parvāṇy uktāny aśeṣataḥ
b harivaṃśas tataḥ parva purāṇaṃ khilasaṃjñitam
b viṣṇuparva śiśoś caryā viṣṇoḥ kaṃsavadhas tathā
b bhaviṣyaṃ parva cāpy uktaṃ khileṣv evādbhutaṃ mahat
b tataḥ paraṃ viṣṇuparva mahat parvety udāhṛtam
b janma yatra tu devasya padmanābhasya mānuṣam
b vasudevakule jāto nandagopakule dhṛtaḥ
b yatra bālye svakarmāṇi ramaṇāny adbhutāni ca
b yatra kaṃsavadhaṃ kṛtvā raṅgamadhye cakarṣa ha
b anekaiḥ saṃśrayaiś cāpi jarāsaṃdhavadhena ha
b vikramād rukmiṇīṃ devīm āhṛtya paravīrahā
b parīkṣya ca nivāsārthaṃ dvārakāṃ viniveśayat
b kaliṅgaṃ dantavakraṃ ca raṇe vikramya jaghnivān
b rājaśulkāṃ ca vai kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām athodvahat
b tayoditaḥ satyabhāmayā gatvā divam adhokṣajaḥ
b jitvāmarādhipaṃ yatra pārijātam athānayat
b jaghne yatra mahābāhur dhenukaṃ raṇamūrdhani
b narakāsurakālīyahayagrīvaṃ ca dānavam
b keśiṃ sakāliyadamaṃ kālaneminam eva ca
b doṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ ciccheda bāṇasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ
b naptāraṃ bhāryayā sārdhaṃ mumocad yatra saṃyuge
b bhāratīyā kathā yatra vṛṣṇivaṃśaś ca kīrtyate
b bhaviṣyad dharivaṃśasya khilānām iti kathyate
b vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ pauṣkaraṃ tathā
b jitvā nṛpān rathāṃs tyaktvā bhīmasena bhavatprabhuḥ
b daśaślokasahasrāṇi viṃśacchlokaśatāni ca
b khileṣu harivaṃśe ca saṃkhyātāni maharṣiṇā
b atrāpi parisaṃkhyātā kathitā tattvabuddhinā
b adhyāyānāṃ sahasraṃ tu kīrtitaṃ vai dvijottamāḥ
b aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi ślokānāṃ kīrtitāni vai
b aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi ślokānāṃ ca śataṃ tathā
b ślokāś ca caturāśītir harivaṃśe prakīrtitāḥ
c khileṣu harivaṃśaś ca bhaviṣyac ca prakīrtitam
d khileṣu harivaṃśasya vyākhyātāḥ paramarṣiṇā
d yatra divyāḥ kathāḥ puṇyāḥ kīrtitāḥ pāpanāśanāḥ
d devāsurakathāś caiva vicitrāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
d bhaviṣyad api cākhyānaṃ vicitraṃ puṇyavardhanam
d yatra kṛṣṇasya karmāṇi śrūyante janmanā saha
d adhyāyās tv ekam ekānāṃ saptāśītir udāhṛtā
d ślokānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi daśa trīṇi śatāni ca
d paulomādīni sarvāṇi daśāṣṭau ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
d uktavān sapurāṇāni rahasyaṃ cāvasānikam
d evam aṣṭādaśaitāni parvāṇy uktāni dhīmatā
d adhyāyānāṃ sahasre dve parvaṇāṃ śatam eva ca
d ślokānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi navatir daśa eva ca
d eṣā vai parvaṇāṃ saṃkhyā ślokā granthe yathākramam
d yad uktam ṛṣiṇā tena vyāsenottamatejasā
d janamejayasyāśvamedhaṃ draṣṭukāmasya dhīmataḥ
d saṃpravṛtto 'śvamedhaś ca yatra śakreṇa dharṣitaḥ
d virodhaś cābhavad rājño brāhmaṇais tasya ṛtvijaiḥ
d viśvāvasupurānīto rājā rājyam acīkarat
d eṣā vai parvaṇāṃ saṃkhyā khilāny āha tataḥ param
a etad akhilam ākhyātaṃ bhārataṃ parvasaṃgrahāt
c aṣṭādaśa samājagmur akṣauhiṇyo yuyutsayā
e tan mahad dāruṇaṃ yuddham ahāny aṣṭādaśābhavat
a yo vidyāc caturo vedān sāṅgopaniṣadān dvijaḥ
c na cākhyānam idaṃ vidyān naiva sa syād vicakṣaṇaḥ
d arthaśāstram idaṃ proktaṃ dharmaśāstram idaṃ mahat
d kāmaśāstram idaṃ proktaṃ vyāsenāmitabuddhinā
a śrutvā tv idam upākhyānaṃ śrāvyam anyan na rocate
c puṃskokilarutaṃ śrutvā rūkṣā dhvāṅkṣasya vāg iva
d dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha
d yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kva cit
d evaṃ vijñāya tattvajñāḥ kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
d bharatānāṃ mahaj janma mahābhāratam ity uta
d niruktam asya yo veda sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
d bhāratādhyayanāt puṇyād api pādam adhīyataḥ
d śraddadhānasya pūyante sarvapāpāny asaṃśayaḥ
d tribhir varṣair mahābhāgaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ śubhaḥ
d prabandhaṃ bhāratasyemaṃ cakāra bhagavān prabhuḥ
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ putraṃ pūrvam adhyāpayac chukam
d sumantuṃ jaiminiṃ pailaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam eva ca
d taiś cāpy ananyabuddhibhyo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prakāśitam
d yā kriyā kriyate kā cid yaś ca kaś cit kriyāvidhiḥ
d idaṃ pravartate sarvaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ prītaye kṣitau
d adhīyīta yathānyāyaṃ vedajño vedabhṛd dvijaḥ
d vedaiś caturbhiḥ samitam idam ākhyānam uttamam
d bhaviṣyaty upajīvyaṃ ca kavīnām idam annavat
d na cāsya kavayaḥ ke cid bhaviṣyanti viśeṣaṇe
d viśeṣaṇe gṛhasthasya traya evāśramā yathā
d dhanyam ārogyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ satkarmasādhakam
d bubhūṣate mahākhyānam abhimantavyam āditaḥ
d yad adhītaṃ tadā samyag dvijaśreṣṭhair dvijottamāt
d vaiśaṃpāyanaviprādyais taiś cāpi kathitaṃ tadā
a itihāsottamād asmāj jāyante kavibuddhayaḥ
c pañcabhya iva bhūtebhyo lokasaṃvidhayas trayaḥ
a asyākhyānasya viṣaye purāṇaṃ vartate dvijāḥ
c antarikṣasya viṣaye prajā iva caturvidhāḥ
a kriyāguṇānāṃ sarveṣām idam ākhyānam āśrayaḥ
c indriyāṇāṃ samastānāṃ citrā iva manaḥkriyāḥ
a anāśrityaitad ākhyānaṃ kathā bhuvi na vidyate
c āhāram anapāśritya śarīrasyeva dhāraṇam
a idaṃ sarvaiḥ kavivarair ākhyānam upajīvyate
c udayaprepsubhir bhṛtyair abhijāta iveśvaraḥ
d asya kāvyasya kavayo na samarthā viśeṣaṇe
d sādhor iva gṛhasthasya śeṣās traya ivāśramāḥ
d dharme matir bhavatu vaḥ satatotthitānāṃ
d sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ
d arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā
d naivātmabhāvam upayānti na ca sthiratvam
a dvaipāyanauṣṭhapuṭaniḥsṛtam aprameyaṃ
puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
c yo bhārataṃ samadhigacchati vācyamānaṃ
kiṃ tasya puṣkarajalair abhiṣecanena
d yad ahnā kurute pāpaṃ brāhmaṇas tv indriyaiś caran
d mahābhāratam ākhyāya saṃdhyāṃ mucyati paścimām
d yad rātrau kurute pāpaṃ karmaṇā manasā girā
d mahābhāratam ākhyāya pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ pramucyate
d yo gośataṃ kanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadāti
d viprāya vedaviduṣe ca bahuśrutāya
d puṇyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāc ca nityaṃ
d tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caiva
a ākhyānaṃ tad idam anuttamaṃ mahārthaṃ
vinyastaṃ mahad iha parvasaṃgraheṇa
c śrutvādau bhavati nṛṇāṃ sukhāvagāhaṃ
vistīrṇaṃ lavaṇajalaṃ yathā plavena
 sūta uvāca
A janamejayaḥ pārikṣitaḥ saha bhrātṛbhiḥ kurukṣetre dīrghasatram upāste
B tasya bhrātaras trayaḥ śrutasena ugraseno bhīmasena iti
A teṣu tat satram upāsīneṣu tatra śvābhyāgacchat sārameyaḥ
B sa janamejayasya bhrātṛbhir abhihato rorūyamāṇo mātuḥ samīpam upāgacchat
A taṃ mātā rorūyamāṇam uvāca
B kiṃ rodiṣi
C kenāsy abhihata iti
A sa evam ukto mātaraṃ pratyuvāca
B janamejayasya bhrātṛbhir abhihato 'smīti
A taṃ mātā pratyuvāca
B vyaktaṃ tvayā tatrāparāddhaṃ yenāsy abhihata iti
A sa tāṃ punar uvāca
B nāparādhyāmi kiṃ cit
C nāvekṣe havīṃṣi nāvaliha iti
A tac chrutvā tasya mātā saramā putraśokārtā tat satram upāgacchad yatra sa janamejayaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir dīrghasatram upāste
 na kiṃ cid uktavantas te 
sā tān uvāca 
A sa tayā kruddhayā tatroktaḥ
B ayaṃ me putro na kiṃ cid aparādhyati
C kimartham abhihata iti
D yasmāc cāyam abhihato 'napakārī tasmād adṛṣṭaṃ tvāṃ bhayam āgamiṣyatīti
A sa janamejaya evam ukto devaśunyā saramayā dṛḍhaṃ saṃbhrānto viṣaṇṇaś cāsīt
 A sa tasmin satre samāpte hāstinapuraṃ pratyetya purohitam anurūpam anvicchamānaḥ paraṃ yatnam akarod yo me pāpakṛtyāṃ śamayed iti 
A sa kadā cin mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ pārikṣito janamejayaḥ kasmiṃś cit svaviṣayoddeśe āśramam apaśyat
A tatra kaś cid ṛṣir āsāṃ cakre śrutaśravā nāma
B tasyābhimataḥ putra āste somaśravā nāma
A tasya taṃ putram abhigamya janamejayaḥ pārikṣitaḥ paurohityāya vavre
A sa namaskṛtya tam ṛṣim uvāca
B bhagavann ayaṃ tava putro mama purohito 'stv iti
A sa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca
B bho janamejaya putro 'yaṃ mama sarpyāṃ jātaḥ
C mahātapasvī svādhyāyasaṃpanno mattapovīryasaṃbhṛto macchukraṃ pītavatyās tasyāḥ kukṣau saṃvṛddhaḥ
D samartho 'yaṃ bhavataḥ sarvāḥ pāpakṛtyāḥ śamayitum antareṇa mahādevakṛtyām
E asya tv ekam upāṃśuvratam
F yad enaṃ kaś cid brāhmaṇaḥ kaṃ cid artham abhiyācet taṃ tasmai dadyād ayam
G yady etad utsahase tato nayasvainam iti
A tenaivam utko janamejayas taṃ pratyuvāca
B bhagavaṃs tathā bhaviṣyatīti
A sa taṃ purohitam upādāyopāvṛtto bhrātṝn uvāca
B mayāyaṃ vṛta upādhyāyaḥ
C yad ayaṃ brūyāt tat kāryam avicārayadbhir iti
A tenaivam uktā bhrātaras tasya tathā cakruḥ
B sa tathā bhrātṝn saṃdiśya takṣaśilāṃ pratyabhipratasthe
C taṃ ca deśaṃ vaśe sthāpayām āsa
A etasminn antare kaś cid ṛṣir dhaumyo nāmāyodaḥ
B tasya śiṣyās trayo babhūvur upamanyur āruṇir vedaś ceti
A sa ekaṃ śiṣyam āruṇiṃ pāñcālyaṃ preṣayām āsa
B gaccha kedārakhaṇḍaṃ badhāneti
A sa upādhyāyena saṃdiṣṭa āruṇiḥ pāñcālyas tatra gatvā tat kedārakhaṇḍaṃ baddhuṃ nāśaknot
A sa kliśyamāno 'paśyad upāyam
B bhavatv evaṃ kariṣyāmīti
A sa tatra saṃviveśa kedārakhaṇḍe
B śayāne tasmiṃs tad udakaṃ tasthau
A tataḥ kadā cid upādhyāya āyodo dhaumyaḥ śiṣyān apṛcchat
B kva āruṇiḥ pāñcālyo gata iti
A te pratyūcuḥ
B bhagavataiva preṣito gaccha kedārakhaṇḍaṃ badhāneti
A sa evam uktas tāñ śiṣyān pratyuvāca
B tasmāt sarve tatra gacchāmo yatra sa iti
A sa tatra gatvā tasyāhvānāya śabdaṃ cakāra
B bho āruṇe pāñcālya kvāsi
C vatsaihīti
A sa tac chrutvā āruṇir upādhyāyavākyaṃ tasmāt kedārakhaṇḍāt sahasotthāya tam upādhyāyam upatasthe
B provāca cainam
 C ayam asmy atra kedārakhaṇḍe niḥsaramāṇam udakam avāraṇīyaṃ saṃroddhuṃ saṃviṣṭo bhagavacchabdaṃ śrutvaiva sahasā vidārya kedārakhaṇḍaṃ  
bhavantam upasthitaḥ 
D tad abhivādaye bhagavantam
E ājñāpayatu bhavān
F kiṃ karavāṇīti
A tam upādhyāyo 'bravīt
B yasmād bhavān kedārakhaṇḍam avadāryotthitas tasmād bhavān uddālaka eva nāmnā bhaviṣyatīti
A sa upādhyāyenānugṛhītaḥ
B yasmāt tvayā madvaco 'nuṣṭhitaṃ tasmāc chreyo 'vāpsyasīti
C sarve ca te vedāḥ pratibhāsyanti sarvāṇi ca dharmaśāstrāṇīti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyeneṣṭaṃ deśaṃ jagāma
A athāparaḥ śiṣyas tasyaivāyodasya dhaumyasyopamanyur nāma
A tam upādhyāyaḥ preṣayām āsa
B vatsopamanyo gā rakṣasveti
A sa upādhyāyavacanād arakṣad gāḥ
B sa cāhani gā rakṣitvā divasakṣaye 'bhyāgamyopādhyāyasyāgrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pīvānam apaśyat
B uvāca cainam
C vatsopamanyo kena vṛttiṃ kalpayasi
D pīvān asi dṛḍham iti
A sa upādhyāyaṃ pratyuvāca
B bhaikṣeṇa vṛttiṃ kalpayāmīti
 sa tathety uktvā bhaikṣaṃ caritvopādhyāyāya nyavedayat 
 sa tasmād upādhyāyaḥ sarvam eva bhaikṣam agṛhṇāt 
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B mamānivedya bhaikṣaṃ nopayoktavyam iti
A sa tathety uktvā punar arakṣad gāḥ
B rakṣitvā cāgamya tathaivopādhyāyasyāgrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
A tam upādhyāyas tathāpi pīvānam eva dṛṣṭvovāca
B vatsopamanyo sarvam aśeṣatas te bhaikṣaṃ gṛhṇāmi
C kenedānīṃ vṛttiṃ kalpayasīti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyena pratyuvāca
B bhagavate nivedya pūrvam aparaṃ carāmi
C tena vṛttiṃ kalpayāmīti
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B naiṣā nyāyyā guruvṛttiḥ
C anyeṣām api vṛttyuparodhaṃ karoṣy evaṃ vartamānaḥ
D lubdho 'sīti
A sa tathety uktvā gā arakṣat
B rakṣitvā ca punar upādhyāyagṛham āgamyopādhyāyasyāgrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
A tam upādhyāyas tathāpi pīvānam eva dṛṣṭvā punar uvāca
B ahaṃ te sarvaṃ bhaikṣaṃ gṛhṇāmi na cānyac carasi
C pīvān asi
D kena vṛttiṃ kalpayasīti
A sa upādhyāyaṃ pratyuvāca
B bho etāsāṃ gavāṃ payasā vṛttiṃ kalpayāmīti
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B naitan nyāyyaṃ paya upayoktuṃ bhavato mayānanujñātam iti
A sa tatheti pratijñāya gā rakṣitvā punar upādhyāyagṛhān etya guror agrataḥ sthitvā namaścakre
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pīvānam evāpaśyat
B uvāca cainam
C bhaikṣaṃ nāśnāsi na cānyac carasi
D payo na pibasi
E pīvān asi
F kena vṛttiṃ kalpayasīti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyaṃ pratyuvāca
B bhoḥ phenaṃ pibāmi yam ime vatsā mātṝṇāṃ stanaṃ pibanta udgirantīti
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B ete tvadanukampayā guṇavanto vatsāḥ prabhūtataraṃ phenam udgiranti
C tad evam api vatsānāṃ vṛttyuparodhaṃ karoṣy evaṃ vartamānaḥ
D phenam api bhavān na pātum arhatīti
A sa tatheti pratijñāya nirāhāras tā gā arakṣat
B tathā pratiṣiddho bhaikṣaṃ nāśnāti na cānyac carati
C payo na pibati
D phenaṃ nopayuṅkte
A sa kadā cid araṇye kṣudhārto 'rkapatrāṇy abhakṣayat
A sa tair arkapatrair bhakṣitaiḥ kṣārakaṭūṣṇavipākibhiś cakṣuṣy upahato 'ndho 'bhavat
B so 'ndho 'pi caṅkramyamāṇaḥ kūpe 'patat
 nāyāty upamanyuḥ 
ta ūcuḥ 
vanaṃ gato gā rakṣitum iti 
 tān āha upādhyāyaḥ 
A atha tasminn anāgacchaty upādhyāyaḥ śiṣyān avocat
B mayopamanyuḥ sarvataḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ
C sa niyataṃ kupitaḥ
D tato nāgacchati ciragataś ceti
A sa evam uktvā gatvāraṇyam upamanyor āhvānaṃ cakre
B bho upamanyo kvāsi
C vatsaihīti
A sa tadāhvānam upādhyāyāc chrutvā pratyuvācoccaiḥ
B ayam asmi bho upādhyāya kūpe patita iti
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B katham asi kūpe patita iti
A sa taṃ pratyuvāca
B arkapatrāṇi bhakṣayitvāndhībhūto 'smi
C ataḥ kūpe patita iti
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B aśvinau stuhi
C tau tvāṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ kariṣyato devabhiṣajāv iti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyena stotuṃ pracakrame devāv aśvinau vāgbhir ṛgbhiḥ
a pra pūrvagau pūrvajau citrabhānū
girā vā śaṃsāmi tapanāv anantau
c divyau suparṇau virajau vimānāv
adhikṣiyantau bhuvanāni viśvā
a hiraṇmayau śakunī sāṃparāyau
nāsatyadasrau sunasau vaijayantau
c śukraṃ vayantau tarasā suvemāv
abhi vyayantāv asitaṃ vivasvat
a grastāṃ suparṇasya balena vartikām
amuñcatām aśvinau saubhagāya
c tāvat suvṛttāv anamanta māyayā
sattamā gā aruṇā udāvahan
a ṣaṣṭiś ca gāvas triśatāś ca dhenava
ekaṃ vatsaṃ suvate taṃ duhanti
c nānāgoṣṭhā vihitā ekadohanās
tāv aśvinau duhato gharmam ukthyam
a ekāṃ nābhiṃ saptaśatā arāḥ śritāḥ
pradhiṣv anyā viṃśatir arpitā arāḥ
c anemi cakraṃ parivartate 'jaraṃ
māyāśvinau samanakti carṣaṇī
a ekaṃ cakraṃ vartate dvādaśāraṃ pradhi
ṣaṇṇābhim ekākṣam amṛtasya dhāraṇam
c yasmin devā adhi viśve viṣaktās
tāv aśvinau muñcato mā viṣīdatam
 idaṃ vṛttam api varṣāsu bhūyas
 tirodhattām aśvinau dāsapatnīḥ
 bhittvā meghān aśivam udācarantaṃ
 yad vṛṣṭikarma prathitau balasya
a aśvināv indram amṛtaṃ vṛttabhūyau
tirodhattām aśvinau dāsapatnī
c bhittvā girim aśvinau gām udācarantau
tadvṛṣṭamahnā prathitā valasya
a yuvāṃ diśo janayatho daśāgre
samānaṃ mūrdhni rathayā viyanti
c tāsāṃ yātam ṛṣayo 'nuprayānti
devā manuṣyāḥ kṣitim ācaranti
a yuvāṃ varṇān vikurutho viśvarūpāṃs
te 'dhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā
c te bhānavo 'py anusṛtāś caranti
devā manuṣyāḥ kṣitim ācaranti
a tau nāsatyāv aśvināv āmahe vāṃ
srajaṃ ca yāṃ bibhṛthaḥ puṣkarasya
c tau nāsatyāv amṛtāvṛtāvṛdhāv
ṛte devās tat prapadena sūte
 stotuṃ na śaknomi guṇair bhavantau
 cakṣurvihīnaḥ pathi saṃpramūḍhaḥ
 durge 'ham asmin patito 'smi kūpe
 yuvāṃ śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ prapadye
a mukhena garbhaṃ labhatāṃ yuvānau
gatāsur etat prapadena sūte
c sadyo jāto mātaram atti garbhas
tāv aśvinau muñcatho jīvase gāḥ
A evaṃ tenābhiṣṭutāv aśvināv ājagmatuḥ
B āhatuś cainam
C prītau svaḥ
D eṣa te 'pūpaḥ
E aśānainam iti
A sa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca
B nānṛtam ūcatur bhavantau
C na tv aham etam apūpam upayoktum utsahe anivedya gurava iti
A tatas tam aśvināv ūcatuḥ
B āvābhyāṃ purastād bhavata upādhyāyenaivam evābhiṣṭutābhyām apūpaḥ prītābhyāṃ dattaḥ
C upayuktaś ca sa tenānivedya gurave
D tvam api tathaiva kuruṣva yathā kṛtam upādhyāyeneti
A sa evam uktaḥ punar eva pratyuvācaitau
B pratyanunaye bhavantāv aśvinau
C notsahe 'ham anivedyopādhyāyāyopayoktum iti
A tam aśvināv āhatuḥ
B prītau svas tavānayā guruvṛttyā
C upādhyāyasya te kārṣṇāyasā dantāḥ
D bhavato hiraṇmayā bhaviṣyanti
E cakṣuṣmāṃś ca bhaviṣyasi
F śreyaś cāvāpsyasīti
A sa evam ukto 'śvibhyāṃ labdhacakṣur upādhyāyasakāśam āgamyopādhyāyam abhivādyācacakṣe
B sa cāsya prītimān abhūt
A āha cainam
B yathāśvināv āhatus tathā tvaṃ śreyo 'vāpsyasīti
C sarve ca te vedāḥ pratibhāsyantīti
A eṣā tasyāpi parīkṣopamanyoḥ
A athāparaḥ śiṣyas tasyaivāyodasya dhaumyasya vedo nāma
A tam upādhyāyaḥ saṃdideśa
B vatsa veda ihāsyatām
C bhavatā madgṛhe kaṃ cit kālaṃ śuśrūṣamāṇena bhavitavyam
D śreyas te bhaviṣyatīti
A sa tathety uktvā gurukule dīrghakālaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇaparo 'vasat
B gaur iva nityaṃ guruṣu dhūrṣu niyujyamānaḥ śītoṣṇakṣuttṛṣṇāduḥkhasahaḥ sarvatrāpratikūlaḥ
A tasya mahatā kālena guruḥ paritoṣaṃ jagāma
B tatparitoṣāc ca śreyaḥ sarvajñatāṃ cāvāpa
C eṣā tasyāpi parīkṣā vedasya
A sa upādhyāyenānujñātaḥ samāvṛttas tasmād gurukulavāsād gṛhāśramaṃ pratyapadyata
B tasyāpi svagṛhe vasatas trayaḥ śiṣyā babhūvuḥ
A sa śiṣyān na kiṃ cid uvāca
B karma vā kriyatāṃ guruśuśrūṣā veti
C duḥkhābhijño hi gurukulavāsasya śiṣyān parikleśena yojayituṃ neyeṣa
A atha kasya cit kālasya vedaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ janamejayaḥ pauṣyaś ca kṣatriyāv upetyopādhyāyaṃ varayāṃ cakratuḥ
A sa kadā cid yājyakāryeṇābhiprasthita uttaṅkaṃ nāma śiṣyaṃ niyojayām āsa
B bho uttaṅka yat kiṃ cid asmadgṛhe parihīyate tad icchāmy aham aparihīṇaṃ bhavatā kriyamāṇam iti
A sa evaṃ pratisamādiśyottaṅkaṃ vedaḥ pravāsaṃ jagāma
A athottaṅko guruśuśrūṣur guruniyogam anutiṣṭhamānas tatra gurukule vasati sma
A sa vasaṃs tatropādhyāyastrībhiḥ sahitābhir āhūyoktaḥ
B upādhyāyinī te ṛtumatī
C upādhyāyaś ca proṣitaḥ
D asyā yathāyam ṛtur vandhyo na bhavati tathā kriyatām
E etad viṣīdatīti
 tasya strīvākyaṃ na kāryam iti dharmalopabhayād evam avadat 
A sa evam uktas tāḥ striyaḥ pratyuvāca
B na mayā strīṇāṃ vacanād idam akāryaṃ kāryam
C na hy aham upādhyāyena saṃdiṣṭaḥ
D akāryam api tvayā kāryam iti
A tasya punar upādhyāyaḥ kālāntareṇa gṛhān upajagāma tasmāt pravāsāt
B sa tadvṛttaṃ tasyāśeṣam upalabhya prītimān abhūt
 sa uvāca  sarvaṃ kṛtam iti 
upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca 
A uvāca cainam
B vatsottaṅka kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti
C dharmato hi śuśrūṣito 'smi bhavatā
D tena prītiḥ paraspareṇa nau saṃvṛddhā
E tad anujāne bhavantam
F sarvām eva siddhiṃ prāpsyasi
G gamyatām iti
A sa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca
B kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti
C evaṃ hy āhuḥ
A yaś cādharmeṇa vibrūyād yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati
A tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ cādhigacchati
B so 'ham anujñāto bhavatā icchāmīṣṭaṃ te gurvartham upahartum iti
A tenaivam ukta upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B vatsottaṅka uṣyatāṃ tāvad iti
A sa kadā cit tam upādhyāyam āhottaṅkaḥ
B ājñāpayatu bhavān
C kiṃ te priyam upaharāmi gurvartham iti
 tenaivam ukta upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca 
kimartham upahareyam iti 
A tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B vatsottaṅka bahuśo māṃ codayasi gurvartham upahareyam iti
C tad gaccha
D enāṃ praviśyopādhyāyinīṃ pṛccha kim upaharāmīti
E eṣā yad bravīti tad upaharasveti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyenopādhyāyinīm apṛcchat
B bhavaty upādhyāyenāsmy anujñāto gṛhaṃ gantum
C tad icchāmīṣṭaṃ te gurvartham upahṛtyānṛṇo gantum
D tad ājñāpayatu bhavatī
E kim upaharāmi gurvartham iti
A saivam uktopādhyāyiny uttaṅkaṃ pratyuvāca
B gaccha pauṣyaṃ rājānam
C bhikṣasva tasya kṣatriyayā pinaddhe kuṇḍale
D te ānayasva
E itaś caturthe 'hani puṇyakaṃ bhavitā
F tābhyām ābaddhābhyāṃ brāhmaṇān pariveṣṭum icchāmi
G śobhamānā yathā tābhyāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tasminn ahani saṃpādayasva
H śreyo hi te syāt kṣaṇaṃ kurvata iti
A sa evam ukta upādhyāyinyā prātiṣṭhatottaṅkaḥ
B sa pathi gacchann apaśyad ṛṣabham atipramāṇaṃ tam adhirūḍhaṃ ca puruṣam atipramāṇam eva
A sa puruṣa uttaṅkam abhyabhāṣata
B uttaṅkaitat purīṣam asya ṛṣabhasya bhakṣayasveti
A sa evam ukto naicchat
A tam āha puruṣo bhūyaḥ
B bhakṣayasvottaṅka
C mā vicāraya
D upādhyāyenāpi te bhakṣitaṃ pūrvam iti
A sa evam ukto bāḍham ity uktvā tadā tad ṛṣabhasya purīṣaṃ mūtraṃ ca bhakṣayitvottaṅkaḥ pratasthe yatra sa kṣatriyaḥ pauṣyaḥ
A tam upetyāpaśyad uttaṅka āsīnam
B sa tam upetyāśīrbhir abhinandyovāca
C arthī bhavantam upagato 'smīti
A sa enam abhivādyovāca
B bhagavan pauṣyaḥ khalv aham
C kiṃ karavāṇīti
A tam uvācottaṅkaḥ
B gurvarthe kuṇḍalābhyām arthy āgato 'smīti ye te kṣatriyayā pinaddhe kuṇḍale te bhavān dātum arhatīti
 tasyās tat strīdhanaṃ iṃdreṇa yajñe tuṣṭena dattam āsīt 
A taṃ pauṣyaḥ pratyuvāca
B praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ kṣatriyā yācyatām iti
A sa tenaivam uktaḥ praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ kṣatriyāṃ nāpaśyat
A sa pauṣyaṃ punar uvāca
B na yuktaṃ bhavatā vayam anṛtenopacaritum
C na hi te kṣatriyāntaḥpure saṃnihitā
D naināṃ paśyāmīti
A sa evam uktaḥ pauṣyas taṃ pratyuvāca
B saṃprati bhavān ucchiṣṭaḥ
C smara tāvat
D na hi sā kṣatriyā ucchiṣṭenāśucinā vā śakyā draṣṭum
E pativratātvād eṣā nāśucer darśanam upaitīti
A athaivam ukta uttaṅkaḥ smṛtvovāca
B asti khalu mayocchiṣṭenopaspṛṣṭaṃ śīghraṃ gacchatā ceti
A taṃ pauṣyaḥ pratyuvāca
B etat tad evaṃ hi
C na gacchatopaspṛṣṭaṃ bhavati na sthiteneti
A athottaṅkas tathety uktvā prāṅmukha upaviśya suprakṣālitapāṇipādavadano
'śabdābhir hṛdayaṃgamābhir adbhir upaspṛśya triḥ pītvā dviḥ parimṛjya khāny adbhir
upaspṛśyāntaḥpuraṃ praviśya tāṃ kṣatriyām apaśyat
A sā ca dṛṣṭvaivottaṅkam abhyutthāyābhivādyovāca
B svāgataṃ te bhagavan
C ājñāpaya kiṃ karavāṇīti
A sa tām uvāca
B ete kuṇḍale gurvarthaṃ me bhikṣite dātum arhasīti
A sā prītā tena tasya sadbhāvena pātram ayam anatikramaṇīyaś ceti matvā te kuṇḍale avamucyāsmai prāyacchat
A āha cainam
B ete kuṇḍale takṣako nāgarājaḥ prārthayati
C apramatto netum arhasīti
A sa evam uktas tāṃ kṣatriyāṃ pratyuvāca
B bhavati sunirvṛtā bhava
C na māṃ śaktas takṣako nāgarājo dharṣayitum iti
A sa evam uktvā tāṃ kṣatriyām āmantrya pauṣyasakāśam āgacchat
A sa taṃ dṛṣṭvovāca
B bhoḥ pauṣya prīto 'smīti
A taṃ pauṣyaḥ pratyuvāca
B bhagavaṃś cirasya pātram āsādyate
C bhavāṃś ca guṇavān atithiḥ
D tat kariṣye śrāddham
E kṣaṇaḥ kriyatām iti
A tam uttaṅkaḥ pratyuvāca
B kṛtakṣaṇa evāsmi
C śīghram icchāmi yathopapannam annam upahṛtaṃ bhavateti
A sa tathety uktvā yathopapannenānnenainaṃ bhojayām āsa
A athottaṅkaḥ śītam annaṃ sakeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā aśucy etad iti matvā pauṣyam uvāca
B yasmān me aśucy annaṃ dadāsi tasmad andho bhaviṣyasīti
 tam uttaṅkaḥ pratyuvāca 
na yuktaṃ bhavatānnam aśuci dattvā
 pratiśāpaṃ dātum 
tasmād annam eva pratyakṣīkuru 
A taṃ pauṣyaḥ pratyuvāca
B yasmāt tvam apy aduṣṭam annaṃ dūṣayasi tasmād anapatyo bhaviṣyasīti
A so 'tha pauṣyas tasyāśucibhāvam annasyāgamayām āsa
A atha tadannaṃ muktakeśyā striyopahṛtaṃ sakeśam aśuci matvottaṅkaṃ prasādayām āsa
B bhagavann ajñānād etad annaṃ sakeśam upahṛtaṃ śītaṃ ca
C tat kṣāmaye bhavantam
D na bhaveyam andha iti
A tam uttaṅkaḥ pratyuvāca
B na mṛṣā bravīmi
C bhūtvā tvam andho nacirād anandho bhaviṣyasīti
D mamāpi śāpo na bhaved bhavatā datta iti
A taṃ pauṣyaḥ pratyuvāca
B nāhaṃ śaktaḥ śāpaṃ pratyādātum
C na hi me manyur adyāpy upaśamaṃ gacchati
D kiṃ caitad bhavatā na jñāyate yathā
a nāvanītaṃ hṛdayaṃ brāhmaṇasya
vāci kṣuro nihitas tīkṣṇadhāraḥ
c viparītam etad ubhayaṃ kṣatriyasya
vāṅ nāvanītī hṛdayaṃ tīkṣṇadhāram
 mama śāpo bhaviṣyatīti 
A iti
B tad evaṃ gate na śakto 'haṃ tīkṣṇahṛdayatvāt taṃ śāpam anyathā kartum
C gamyatām iti
A tam uttaṅkaḥ pratyuvāca
B bhavatāham annasyāśucibhāvam āgamayya pratyanunītaḥ
C prāk ca te 'bhihitam
D yasmād aduṣṭam annaṃ dūṣayasi tasmād anapatyo bhaviṣyasīti
E duṣṭe cānne naiṣa mama śāpo bhaviṣyatīti
A sādhayāmas tāvad ity uktvā prātiṣṭhatottaṅkas te kuṇḍale gṛhītvā
A so 'paśyat pathi nagnaṃ śramaṇam āgacchantaṃ muhur muhur dṛśyamānam adṛśyamānaṃ ca
B athottaṅkas te kuṇḍale bhūmau nikṣipyodakārthaṃ pracakrame
 kṛtodakakāryaḥ śuciḥ prayato namo devebhyo gurubhyaś ca
 kṛtvā mahatā javena tam anvayāt 
tasya takṣako dṛḍham āsannaḥ 
 sa taṃ jagrāha 
A etasminn antare sa śramaṇas tvaramāṇa upasṛtya te kuṇḍale gṛhītvā prādravat
B tam uttaṅko 'bhisṛtya jagrāha
C sa tad rūpaṃ vihāya takṣakarūpaṃ kṛtvā sahasā dharaṇyāṃ vivṛtaṃ mahābilaṃ viveśa
 athottaṅkas tasyāḥ kṣatriyāyā vacaḥ smṛtvā taṃ takṣakam anvagacchat 
 sa tadbilaṃ daṇḍakāṣṭhena cakhāna 
na cāśakat  taṃ
 kliśyamānam indro 'paśyat 
sa vajraṃ preṣayām āsa  gacchāsya
 brāhmaṇasya sāhāyyaṃ kuruṣveti 
atha vajro daṇḍakāṣṭham anupraviśya
 tadbilam adārayat 
 taṃ nāgalokam aparyantam anekavidhaprāsādaharmyavalabhīniryūhaśatasaṃkulam
 uccāvacakrīḍāścaryasthānāvakīrṇam apaśyat  sa tatra 
A praviśya ca nāgalokaṃ svabhavanam agacchat
B tam uttaṅko 'nvāviveśa tenaiva bilena
C praviśya ca nāgān astuvad ebhiḥ ślokaiḥ
a ya airāvatarājānaḥ sarpāḥ samitiśobhanāḥ
c varṣanta iva jīmūtāḥ savidyutpavaneritāḥ
a surūpāś ca virūpāś ca tathā kalmāṣakuṇḍalāḥ
c ādityavan nākapṛṣṭhe rejur airāvatodbhavāḥ
 tatrasthān api saṃstaumi mahataḥ pannagān aham 
a bahūni nāgavartmāni gaṅgāyās tīra uttare
c icchet ko 'rkāṃśusenāyāṃ cartum airāvataṃ vinā
a śatāny aśītir aṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
c sarpāṇāṃ pragrahā yānti dhṛtarāṣṭro yad ejati
a ye cainam upasarpanti ye ca dūraṃ paraṃ gatāḥ
c aham airāvatajyeṣṭhabhrātṛbhyo 'karavaṃ namaḥ
a yasya vāsaḥ kurukṣetre khāṇḍave cābhavat sadā
c taṃ kādraveyam astauṣaṃ kuṇḍalārthāya takṣakam
 nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ prasannasalilām anu 
a takṣakaś cāśvasenaś ca nityaṃ sahacarāv ubhau
c kurukṣetre nivasatāṃ nadīm ikṣumatīm anu
 evaṃ stutvā sa viprarṣir uttaṅko bhujagottamān
 naiva te kuṇḍale lebhe tataś cintām upāgamat
 nāgarājāya mukhyāya kuṇḍale āpnuyāṃ yathā
a jaghanyajas takṣakasya śrutaseneti yaḥ śrutaḥ
c avasadyo mahad dyumni prārthayan nāgamukhyatām
e karavāṇi sadā cāhaṃ namas tasmai mahātmane
 tadā vai cintayām āsa upādhyāyyā yad īritam
 kāle ca samatikrānte śāpaṃ dāsyati manyunā
A evaṃ stuvann api nāgān yadā te kuṇḍale nālabhad athāpaśyat striyau tantre adhiropya paṭaṃ vayantyau
A tasmiṃś ca tantre kṛṣṇāḥ sitāś ca tantavaḥ
B cakraṃ cāpaśyat ṣaḍbhiḥ kumāraiḥ parivartyamānam
C puruṣaṃ cāpaśyad darśanīyam
A sa tān sarvāṃs tuṣṭāva ebhir mantravādaślokaiḥ
a trīṇy arpitāny atra śatāni madhye
ṣaṣṭiś ca nityaṃ carati dhruve 'smin
c cakre caturviṃśatiparvayoge
ṣaḍ yat kumārāḥ parivartayanti
a tantraṃ cedaṃ viśvarūpaṃ yuvatyau
vayatas tantūn satataṃ vartayantyau
c kṛṣṇān sitāṃś caiva vivartayantyau
bhūtāny ajasraṃ bhuvanāni caiva
a vajrasya bhartā bhuvanasya goptā
vṛtrasya hantā namucer nihantā
c kṛṣṇe vasāno vasane mahātmā
satyānṛte yo vivinakti loke
a yo vājinaṃ garbham apāṃ purāṇaṃ
vaiśvānaraṃ vāhanam abhyupetaḥ
c namaḥ sadāsmai jagadīśvarāya
lokatrayeśāya puraṃdarāya
A tataḥ sa enaṃ puruṣaḥ prāha
B prīto 'smi te 'ham anena stotreṇa
C kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti
A sa tam uvāca
B nāgā me vaśam īyur iti
A sa enaṃ puruṣaḥ punar uvāca
B etam aśvam apāne dhamasveti
A sa tam aśvam apāne 'dhamat
B athāśvād dhamyamānāt sarvasrotobhyaḥ sadhūmā arciṣo 'gner niṣpetuḥ
A tābhir nāgaloko dhūpitaḥ
A atha sasaṃbhramas takṣako 'gnitejobhayaviṣaṇṇas te kuṇḍale gṛhītvā sahasā svabhavanān niṣkramyottaṅkam uvāca
B ete kuṇḍale pratigṛhṇātu bhavān iti
A sa te pratijagrāhottaṅkaḥ
B kuṇḍale pratigṛhyācintayat
C adya tat puṇyakam upādhyāyinyāḥ
D dūraṃ cāham abhyāgataḥ
E kathaṃ nu khalu saṃbhāvayeyam iti
A tata enaṃ cintayānam eva sa puruṣa uvāca
B uttaṅka enam aśvam adhiroha
C eṣa tvāṃ kṣaṇād evopādhyāyakulaṃ prāpayiṣyatīti
A sa tathety uktvā tam aśvam adhiruhya pratyājagāmopādhyāyakulam
B upādhyāyinī ca snātā keśān āvapayanty upaviṣṭottaṅko nāgacchatīti śāpāyāsya mano dadhe
A athottaṅkaḥ praviśya upādhyāyinīm abhyavādayat
B te cāsyai kuṇḍale prāyacchat
A sā cainaṃ pratyuvāca
B uttaṅka deśe kāle 'bhyāgataḥ
C svāgataṃ te vatsa
D manāg asi mayā na śaptaḥ
E śreyas tavopasthitam
F siddhim āpnuhīti
A athottaṅka upādhyāyam abhyavādayat
B tam upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
C vatsottaṅka svāgataṃ te
D kiṃ ciraṃ kṛtam iti
A tam uttaṅka upādhyāyaṃ pratyuvāca
B bhos takṣakeṇa nāgarājena vighnaḥ kṛto 'smin karmaṇi
C tenāsmi nāgalokaṃ nītaḥ
A tatra ca mayā dṛṣṭe striyau tantre 'dhiropya paṭaṃ vayantyau
B tasmiṃś ca tantre kṛṣṇāḥ sitāś ca tantavaḥ
C kiṃ tat
A tatra ca mayā cakraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśāram
B ṣaṭ cainaṃ kumārāḥ parivartayanti
C tad api kim
A puruṣaś cāpi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ
B sa punaḥ kaḥ
A aśvaś cātipramāṇayuktaḥ
B sa cāpi kaḥ
A pathi gacchatā mayā ṛṣabho dṛṣṭaḥ
B taṃ ca puruṣo 'dhirūḍhaḥ
C tenāsmi sopacāram uktaḥ
D uttaṅkāsya ṛṣabhasya purīṣaṃ bhakṣaya
E upādhyāyenāpi te bhakṣitam iti
F tatas tadvacanān mayā tadṛṣabhasya purīṣam upayuktam
G tad icchāmi bhavatopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃ tad iti
A tenaivam ukta upādhyāyaḥ pratyuvāca
B ye te striyau dhātā vidhātā ca
C ye ca te kṛṣṇāḥ sitāś ca tantavas te rātryahanī
 dvādaśāraṃ dvādaśa māsāḥ 
A yad api tac cakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ ṣaṭ kumārāḥ parivartayanti te ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ saṃvatsaraś cakram
B yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa parjanyaḥ
C yo 'śvaḥ so 'gniḥ
A ya ṛṣabhas tvayā pathi gacchatā dṛṣṭaḥ sa airāvato nāgarājaḥ
B yaś cainam adhirūḍhaḥ sa indraḥ
C yad api te purīṣaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tasya ṛṣabhasya tad amṛtam
A tena khalv asi na vyāpannas tasmin nāgabhavane
B sa cāpi mama sakhā indraḥ
A tadanugrahāt kuṇḍale gṛhītvā punar abhyāgato 'si
B tat saumya gamyatām
C anujāne bhavantam
D śreyo 'vāpsyasīti
A sa upādhyāyenānujñāta uttaṅkaḥ kruddhas takṣakasya praticikīrṣamāṇo hāstinapuraṃ pratasthe
a sa hāstinapuraṃ prāpya nacirād dvijasattamaḥ
c samāgacchata rājānam uttaṅko janamejayam
a purā takṣaśilātas taṃ nivṛttam aparājitam
c samyag vijayinaṃ dṛṣṭvā samantān mantribhir vṛtam
a tasmai jayāśiṣaḥ pūrvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ prayujya saḥ
c uvācainaṃ vacaḥ kāle śabdasaṃpannayā girā
a anyasmin karaṇīye tvaṃ kārye pārthivasattama
c bālyād ivānyad eva tvaṃ kuruṣe nṛpasattama
a evam uktas tu vipreṇa sa rājā pratyuvāca ha
c janamejayaḥ prasannātmā samyak saṃpūjya taṃ munim
a āsāṃ prajānāṃ paripālanena
svaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ paripālayāmi
c prabrūhi vā kiṃ kriyatāṃ dvijendra
śuśrūṣur asmy adya vacas tvadīyam
a sa evam uktas tu nṛpottamena
dvijottamaḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
c uvāca rājānam adīnasattvaṃ
svam eva kāryaṃ nṛpateś ca yat tat
a takṣakeṇa narendrendra yena te hiṃsitaḥ pitā
c tasmai pratikuruṣva tvaṃ pannagāya durātmane
a kāryakālaṃ ca manye 'haṃ vidhidṛṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ
c tad gacchāpacitiṃ rājan pitus tasya mahātmanaḥ
a tena hy anaparādhī sa daṣṭo duṣṭāntarātmanā
c pañcatvam agamad rājā vajrāhata iva drumaḥ
a baladarpasamutsiktas takṣakaḥ pannagādhamaḥ
c akāryaṃ kṛtavān pāpo yo 'daśat pitaraṃ tava
a rājarṣivaṃśagoptāram amarapratimaṃ nṛpam
c jaghāna kāśyapaṃ caiva nyavartayata pāpakṛt
a dagdhum arhasi taṃ pāpaṃ jvalite havyavāhane
c sarpasatre mahārāja tvayi tad dhi vidhīyate
a evaṃ pituś cāpacitiṃ gatavāṃs tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
c mama priyaṃ ca sumahat kṛtaṃ rājan bhaviṣyati
a karmaṇaḥ pṛthivīpāla mama yena durātmanā
c vighnaḥ kṛto mahārāja gurvarthaṃ carato 'nagha
a etac chrutvā tu nṛpatis takṣakasya cukopa ha
c uttaṅkavākyahaviṣā dīpto 'gnir haviṣā yathā
a apṛcchac ca tadā rājā mantriṇaḥ svān suduḥkhitaḥ
c uttaṅkasyaiva sāṃnidhye pituḥ svargagatiṃ prati
 pauṣye parvaṇi rājendra svasti vācya dvijān atha
 samāpte parvaṇi tadā svaśaktyā tarpayed dvijān
a tadaiva hi sa rājendro duḥkhaśokāpluto 'bhavat
c yadaiva pitaraṃ vṛttam uttaṅkād aśṛṇot tadā
A lomaharṣaṇaputra ugraśravāḥ sūtaḥ paurāṇiko naimiṣāraṇye śaunakasya kulapater dvādaśavārṣike satre ṛṣīn abhyāgatān upatasthe
 mayodaṅkasya caritam aśeṣam uktam 
janamejayasya sarpasatrasya
 nimittāntaram idam api 
A paurāṇikaḥ purāṇe kṛtaśramaḥ sa tān kṛtāñjalir uvāca
B kiṃ bhavantaḥ śrotum icchanti
C kim ahaṃ bruvāṇīti
A tam ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
B paramaṃ lomaharṣaṇe prakṣyāmas tvāṃ vakṣyasi ca naḥ śuśrūṣatāṃ kathāyogam
C tad bhagavāṃs tu tāvac chaunako 'gniśaraṇam adhyāste
a yo 'sau divyāḥ kathā veda devatāsurasaṃkathāḥ
c manuṣyoragagandharvakathā veda ca sarvaśaḥ
a sa cāpy asmin makhe saute vidvān kulapatir dvijaḥ
c dakṣo dhṛtavrato dhīmāñ śāstre cāraṇyake guruḥ
a satyavādī śamaparas tapasvī niyatavrataḥ
c sarveṣām eva no mānyaḥ sa tāvat pratipālyatām
a tasminn adhyāsati gurāv āsanaṃ paramārcitam
c tato vakṣyasi yat tvāṃ sa prakṣyati dvijasattamaḥ
 sūta uvāca
a evam astu gurau tasminn upaviṣṭe mahātmani
c tena pṛṣṭaḥ kathāḥ puṇyā vakṣyāmi vividhāśrayāḥ
a so 'tha viprarṣabhaḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathākramam
c devān vāgbhiḥ pitṝn adbhis tarpayitvājagāma ha
a yatra brahmarṣayaḥ siddhās ta āsīnā yatavratāḥ
c yajñāyatanam āśritya sūtaputrapuraḥsarāḥ
a ṛtvikṣv atha sadasyeṣu sa vai gṛhapatis tataḥ
c upaviṣṭeṣūpaviṣṭaḥ śaunako 'thābravīd idam
 śaunaka uvāca
a purāṇam akhilaṃ tāta pitā te 'dhītavān purā
b bhāratādhyayanaṃ sarvaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāt tadā
c kaccit tvam api tat sarvam adhīṣe lomaharṣaṇe
a purāṇe hi kathā divyā ādivaṃśāś ca dhīmatām
c kathyante tāḥ purāsmābhiḥ śrutāḥ pūrvaṃ pitus tava
a tatra vaṃśam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārgavam
c kathayasva kathām etāṃ kalyāḥ sma śravaṇe tava
 sūta uvāca
a yad adhītaṃ purā samyag dvijaśreṣṭha mahātmabhiḥ
c vaiśaṃpāyanaviprādyais taiś cāpi kathitaṃ purā
a yad adhītaṃ ca pitrā me samyak caiva tato mayā
c tat tāvac chṛṇu yo devaiḥ sendraiḥ sāgnimarudgaṇaiḥ
e pūjitaḥ pravaro vaṃśo bhṛgūṇāṃ bhṛgunandana
a imaṃ vaṃśam ahaṃ brahman bhārgavaṃ te mahāmune
c nigadāmi kathāyuktaṃ purāṇāśrayasaṃyutam
d śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman purāṇe yac chrutaṃ mayā
d bhṛgur maharṣir bhagavān brahmaṇā vai svayaṃbhuvā
d varuṇasya kratau jātaḥ pāvakād iti naḥ śrutam
d bhṛgor babhūvuḥ ṣaṭ putrās tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ
d kaviś ca cyavanaś caiva śaṅkhalaś ca mahātapāḥ
d suraśmiḥ saptaraśmiś ca vitathaś ca mahātapāḥ
d vītahavyasya tanayaḥ smṛto gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ
d gṛtsasyāpi sutas tv asya brahman sāvedaso 'bhavat
d sāvedasya tu putro 'bhūd ūrvaḥ śrutavatāṃ varaḥ
d ūrvasya tu vihavyo 'bhūd brahmasūnur mahātmanaḥ
d vihavyasya tu dāyādo viharaḥ kīrtimān smṛtaḥ
d viharasyātmavān putro vatsaś cādhirathaḥ smṛtaḥ
d vatsasyāpi vinindas tu sūnur āsīn mahātapāḥ
d bhṛgor vinindasya sutaḥ sadyo nāma babhūva ha
d sadyasyāpy ātmajo brahman vitto nāma suvīryavān
d vittasya tu mahātejā babhūva ca śrutaśravāḥ
d śrutaśravasas tu sūnur babhūva tapavān prabho
d tapasas tu mahātejāḥ prakāśas tanayo 'bhavat
d ūrdhvaḥ prakāśasya suto brahmarṣir brahmavittamaḥ
d brahmasṛṣṭo mato yena yena pūrvaṃ mahātmanā
d ūrdhvasya caiva vāgindro vāgindro brahmavādinaḥ
d ṛcīkas tasya tanayo brahmasūnur mahātapāḥ
d jamadagniḥ sutas tasya jajñe janakasaṃnibhaḥ
d jamadagnes tu vai pañca āsan putrā mahātmanaḥ
d rumaṇvāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vasur viśvāvasus tathā
d rāmas tasya jaghanyo 'bhūn mahāstro reṇukāsutaḥ
d triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī yena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā
a bhṛgoḥ sudayitaḥ putraś cyavano nāma bhārgavaḥ
c cyavanasyāpi dāyādaḥ pramatir nāma dhārmikaḥ
e pramater apy abhūt putro ghṛtācyāṃ rurur ity uta
a ruror api suto jajñe śunako vedapāragaḥ
c pramadvarāyāṃ dharmātmā tava pūrvapitāmahāt
a tapasvī ca yaśasvī ca śrutavān brahmavittamaḥ
c dharmiṣṭhaḥ satyavādī ca niyato niyatendriyaḥ
 śaunaka uvāca
a sūtaputra yathā tasya bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
c cyavanatvaṃ parikhyātaṃ tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
 sūta uvāca
a bhṛgoḥ sudayitā bhāryā pulomety abhiviśrutā
c tasyāṃ garbhaḥ samabhavad bhṛgor vīryasamudbhavaḥ
a tasmin garbhe saṃbhṛte 'tha pulomāyāṃ bhṛgūdvaha
c samaye samaśīlinyāṃ dharmapatnyāṃ yaśasvinaḥ
a abhiṣekāya niṣkrānte bhṛgau dharmabhṛtāṃ vare
c āśramaṃ tasya rakṣo 'tha pulomābhyājagāma ha
a taṃ praviśyāśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛgor bhāryām aninditām
c hṛcchayena samāviṣṭo vicetāḥ samapadyata
a abhyāgataṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ pulomā cārudarśanā
c nyamantrayata vanyena phalamūlādinā tadā
a tāṃ tu rakṣas tato brahman hṛcchayenābhipīḍitam
c dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭam abhūt tatra jihīrṣus tām aninditām
d jātam ity abravīt kāryaṃ jihīrṣur muditaḥ śubhām
d sā hi pūrvaṃ vṛtā tena pulomnā tu śucismitā
d tāṃ tu prādāt pitā paścād bhṛgave śāstravat tadā
d tasya tat kilbiṣaṃ nityaṃ hṛdi vartati bhārgava
d idam antaram ity evaṃ hartuṃ cakre manas tadā
a athāgniśaraṇe 'paśyaj jvalitaṃ jātavedasam
c tam apṛcchat tato rakṣaḥ pāvakaṃ jvalitaṃ tadā
a śaṃsa me kasya bhāryeyam agne pṛṣṭa ṛtena vai
c satyas tvam asi satyaṃ me vada pāvaka pṛcchate
a mayā hīyaṃ pūrvavṛtā bhāryārthe varavarṇinī
c paścāt tv imāṃ pitā prādād bhṛgave 'nṛtakāriṇe
a seyaṃ yadi varārohā bhṛgor bhāryā rahogatā
c tathā satyaṃ samākhyāhi jihīrṣāmy āśramād imām
a manyur hi hṛdayaṃ me 'dya pradahann iva tiṣṭhati
c matpurvabhāryāṃ yad imāṃ bhṛguḥ prāpa sumadhyamām
d asaṃmataṃ kṛtaṃ me 'dya hariṣyāmy āśramād imām
a tad rakṣa evam āmantrya jvalitaṃ jātavedasam
c śaṅkamāno bhṛgor bhāryāṃ punaḥ punar apṛcchata
a tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi nityadā
c sākṣivat puṇyapāpeṣu satyaṃ brūhi kave vacaḥ
a matpūrvabhāryāpahṛtā bhṛguṇānṛtakāriṇā
c seyaṃ yadi tathā me tvaṃ satyam ākhyātum arhasi
a śrutvā tvatto bhṛgor bhāryāṃ hariṣyāmy aham āśramāt
c jātavedaḥ paśyatas te vada satyāṃ giraṃ mama
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saptārcir duḥkhito bhṛśam
b satyaṃ vadāmi yadi me śāpaḥ syād brahmavittamāt
b asatyaṃ ced ahaṃ brūve patiṣye narakān kramāt
c bhīto 'nṛtāc ca śāpāc ca bhṛgor ity abravīc chanaiḥ
d agnir uvāca
d tvayā vṛtā pulomeyaṃ pūrvaṃ dānavanandana
d kiṃ tv iyaṃ vidhinā pūrvaṃ mantravan na vṛtā tvayā
d pitrā tu bhṛgave dattā pulomeyaṃ yaśasvinī
d dadāti na pitā tubhyaṃ varalobhān mahāyaśāḥ
d athemāṃ vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā vidhipūrvakam
d bhāryām ṛṣir bhṛguḥ prāpa māṃ puraskṛtya dānava
d seyam ity avagacchāmi nānṛtaṃ vaktum utsahe
d nānṛtaṃ hi sadā loke pūjyate dānavottama
 sūta uvāca
a agner atha vacaḥ śrutvā tad rakṣaḥ prajahāra tām
c brahman varāharūpeṇa manomārutaraṃhasā
a tataḥ sa garbho nivasan kukṣau bhṛgukulodvaha
c roṣān mātuś cyutaḥ kukṣeś cyavanas tena so 'bhavat
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mātur udarāc cyutam ādityavarcasam
c tad rakṣo bhasmasād bhūtaṃ papāta parimucya tām
a sā tam ādāya suśroṇī sasāra bhṛgunandanam
c cyavanaṃ bhārgavaṃ brahman pulomā duḥkhamūrcchitā
a tāṃ dadarśa svayaṃ brahmā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c rudatīṃ bāṣpapūrṇākṣīṃ bhṛgor bhāryām aninditām
e sāntvayām āsa bhagavān vadhūṃ brahmā pitāmahaḥ
a aśrubindūdbhavā tasyāḥ prāvartata mahānadī
c anuvartatī sṛtiṃ tasyā bhṛgoḥ patnyā yaśasvinaḥ
a tasyā mārgaṃ sṛtavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tu saritaṃ tadā
c nāma tasyās tadā nadyāś cakre lokapitāmahaḥ
e vadhūsareti bhagavāṃś cyavanasyāśramaṃ prati
a sa evaṃ cyavano jajñe bhṛgoḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
c taṃ dadarśa pitā tatra cyavanaṃ tāṃ ca bhāminīm
a sa pulomāṃ tato bhāryāṃ papraccha kupito bhṛguḥ
c kenāsi rakṣase tasmai kathiteha jihīrṣave
e na hi tvāṃ veda tad rakṣo madbhāryāṃ cāruhāsinīm
a tat tvam ākhyāhi taṃ hy adya śaptum icchāmy ahaṃ ruṣā
c bibheti ko na śāpān me kasya cāyaṃ vyatikramaḥ
 pulomovāca
a agninā bhagavaṃs tasmai rakṣase 'haṃ niveditā
c tato mām anayad rakṣaḥ krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
a sāhaṃ tava sutasyāsya tejasā parimokṣitā
c bhasmībhūtaṃ ca tad rakṣo mām utsṛjya papāta vai
 sūta uvāca
a iti śrutvā pulomāyā bhṛguḥ paramamanyumān
c śaśāpāgnim abhikruddhaḥ sarvabhakṣo bhaviṣyasi
 sūta uvāca
a śaptas tu bhṛguṇā vahniḥ kruddho vākyam athābravīt
c kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ brahman kṛtavān asi sāṃpratam
a dharme prayatamānasya satyaṃ ca vadataḥ samam
c pṛṣṭo yad abruvaṃ satyaṃ vyabhicāro 'tra ko mama
a pṛṣṭo hi sākṣī yaḥ sākṣyaṃ jānamāno 'nyathā vadet
c sa pūrvān ātmanaḥ sapta kule hanyāt tathā parān
a yaś ca kāryārthatattvajño jānamāno na bhāṣate
c so 'pi tenaiva pāpena lipyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
a śakto 'ham api śaptuṃ tvāṃ mānyās tu brāhmaṇā mama
c jānato 'pi ca te vyaktaṃ kathayiṣye nibodha tat
a yogena bahudhātmānaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmi mūrtiṣu
c agnihotreṣu satreṣu kriyāsv atha makheṣu ca
a vedoktena vidhānena mayi yad dhūyate haviḥ
c devatāḥ pitaraś caiva tena tṛptā bhavanti vai
a āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve āpaḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
c darśaś ca paurṇamāsaś ca devānāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha
a devatāḥ pitaras tasmāt pitaraś cāpi devatāḥ
c ekībhūtāś ca pūjyante pṛthaktvena ca parvasu
a devatāḥ pitaraś caiva juhvate mayi yat sadā
c tridaśānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mukham evam ahaṃ smṛtaḥ
a amāvāsyāṃ ca pitaraḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca devatāḥ
c manmukhenaiva hūyante bhuñjate ca hutaṃ haviḥ
e sarvabhakṣaḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhaviṣyāmi mukhaṃ tv aham
a cintayitvā tato vahniś cakre saṃhāram ātmanaḥ
c dvijānām agnihotreṣu yajñasatrakriyāsu ca
a niroṃkāravaṣaṭkārāḥ svadhāsvāhāvivarjitāḥ
c vināgninā prajāḥ sarvās tata āsan suduḥkhitāḥ
a atharṣayaḥ samudvignā devān gatvābruvan vacaḥ
c agnināśāt kriyābhraṃśād bhrāntā lokās trayo 'naghāḥ
e vidhadhvam atra yat kāryaṃ na syāt kālātyayo yathā
a atharṣayaś ca devāś ca brahmāṇam upagamya tu
c agner āvedayañ śāpaṃ kriyāsaṃhāram eva ca
a bhṛguṇā vai mahābhāga śapto 'gniḥ kāraṇāntare
c kathaṃ devamukho bhūtvā yajñabhāgāgrabhuk tathā
e hutabhuk sarvalokeṣu sarvabhakṣatvam eṣyati
a śrutvā tu tad vacas teṣām agnim āhūya lokakṛt
c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ bhūtabhāvanam avyayam
a lokānām iha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ kartā cānta eva ca
c tvaṃ dhārayasi lokāṃs trīn kriyāṇāṃ ca pravartakaḥ
e sa tathā kuru lokeśa nocchidyeran kriyā yathā
a kasmād evaṃ vimūḍhas tvam īśvaraḥ san hutāśanaḥ
c tvaṃ pavitraṃ yadā loke sarvabhūtagataś ca ha
a na tvaṃ sarvaśarīreṇa sarvabhakṣatvam eṣyasi
c upādāne 'rciṣo yās te sarvaṃ dhakṣyanti tāḥ śikhin
d kravyādā ca tanur yā te sā sarvaṃ bhakṣayiṣyati
a yathā sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ śuci vibhāvyate
c tathā tvadarcirnirdagdhaṃ sarvaṃ śuci bhaviṣyati
a tad agne tvaṃ mahat tejaḥ svaprabhāvād vinirgatam
c svatejasaiva taṃ śāpaṃ kuru satyam ṛṣer vibho
e devānāṃ cātmano bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mukhe hutam
a evam astv iti taṃ vahniḥ pratyuvāca pitāmaham
c jagāma śāsanaṃ kartuṃ devasya parameṣṭhinaḥ
a devarṣayaś ca muditās tato jagmur yathāgatam
c ṛṣayaś ca yathāpūrvaṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pracakrire
a divi devā mumudire bhūtasaṃghāś ca laukikāḥ
c agniś ca paramāṃ prītim avāpa hatakalmaṣaḥ
d evaṃ sa bhagavāñ śāpaṃ lebhe 'gnir bhṛgutaḥ purā
a evam eṣa purāvṛtta itihāso 'gniśāpajaḥ
c pulomasya vināśaś ca cyavanasya ca saṃbhavaḥ
 sūta uvāca
a sa cāpi cyavano brahman bhārgavo 'janayat sutam
c sukanyāyāṃ mahātmānaṃ pramatiṃ dīptatejasam
a pramatis tu ruruṃ nāma ghṛtācyāṃ samajījanat
c ruruḥ pramadvarāyāṃ tu śunakaṃ samajījanat
d śaunakas tu mahābhāgaḥ śunakasya suto 'bhavat
d śaunakas tu mahāsattvaḥ sarvabhārgavanandanaḥ
d jātas tapasi tīvre ca sthitaḥ sthirayaśās tataḥ
a tasya brahman ruroḥ sarvaṃ caritaṃ bhūritejasaḥ
c vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu tvam aśeṣataḥ
a ṛṣir āsīn mahān pūrvaṃ tapovidyāsamanvitaḥ
c sthūlakeśa iti khyātaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu menakāyāṃ prajajñivān
c gandharvarājo viprarṣe viśvāvasur iti śrutaḥ
a athāpsarā menakā sā taṃ garbhaṃ bhṛgunandana
c utsasarja yathākālaṃ sthūlakeśāśramaṃ prati
a utsṛjya caiva taṃ garbhaṃ nadyās tīre jagāma ha
b apsarā menakā brahman nirdayā nirapatrapā
c kanyām amaragarbhābhāṃ jvalantīm iva ca śriyā
a tāṃ dadarśa samutsṛṣṭāṃ nadītīre mahān ṛṣiḥ
c sthūlakeśaḥ sa tejasvī vijane bandhuvarjitām
a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā kanyāṃ sthūlakeśo dvijottamaḥ
c jagrāhātha muniśreṣṭhaḥ kṛpāviṣṭaḥ pupoṣa ca
e vavṛdhe sā varārohā tasyāśramapade śubhā
f jātakarma kriyāś cāsyā vidhipūrvaṃ yathākramam
f sthūlakeśo mahābhāgaś cakāra sumahān ṛṣiḥ
a pramadābhyo varā sā tu sarvarūpaguṇānvitā
c tataḥ pramadvarety asyā nāma cakre mahān ṛṣiḥ
a tām āśramapade tasya rurur dṛṣṭvā pramadvarām
c babhūva kila dharmātmā madanānugatātmavān
a pitaraṃ sakhibhiḥ so 'tha vācayām āsa bhārgavaḥ
c pramatiś cābhyayāc chrutvā sthūlakeśaṃ yaśasvinam
d yācayām āsa tāṃ kanyāṃ putrārthe varavarṇinīm
a tataḥ prādāt pitā kanyāṃ rurave tāṃ pramadvarām
c vivāhaṃ sthāpayitvāgre nakṣatre bhagadaivate
a tataḥ katipayāhasya vivāhe samupasthite
c sakhībhiḥ krīḍatī sārdhaṃ sā kanyā varavarṇinī
a nāpaśyata prasuptaṃ vai bhujagaṃ tiryag āyatam
c padā cainaṃ samākrāman mumūrṣuḥ kālacoditā
a sa tasyāḥ saṃpramattāyāś coditaḥ kāladharmaṇā
c viṣopaliptān daśanān bhṛśam aṅge nyapātayat
a sā daṣṭā sahasā bhūmau patitā gatacetanā
b vivarṇā vigataśrīkā bhraṣṭābharaṇacetanā
b nirānandakarī teṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ muktamūrdhajā
c vyasur aprekṣaṇīyāpi prekṣaṇīyatamākṛtiḥ
a prasuptevābhavac cāpi bhuvi sarpaviṣārditā
c bhūyo manoharatarā babhūva tanumadhyamā
a dadarśa tāṃ pitā caiva te caivānye tapasvinaḥ
c viceṣṭamānāṃ patitāṃ bhūtale padmavarcasam
a tataḥ sarve dvijavarāḥ samājagmuḥ kṛpānvitāḥ
c svastyātreyo mahājānuḥ kuśikaḥ śaṅkhamekhalaḥ
d uddālakaḥ kaṭhaś caiva śvetaketus tathaiva ca
a bhāradvājaḥ kauṇakutsa ārṣṭiṣeṇo 'tha gautamaḥ
c pramatiḥ saha putreṇa tathānye vanavāsinaḥ
a tāṃ te kanyāṃ vyasuṃ dṛṣṭvā bhujagasya viṣārditām
c ruruduḥ kṛpayāviṣṭā rurus tv ārto bahir yayau
d te ca sarve dvijaśreṣṭhās tatraivopāviśaṃs tadā
 sūta uvāca
a teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu samantataḥ
c ruruś cukrośa gahanaṃ vanaṃ gatvā suduḥkhitaḥ
a śokenābhihataḥ so 'tha vilapan karuṇaṃ bahu
c abravīd vacanaṃ śocan priyāṃ cintya pramadvarām
a śete sā bhuvi tanvaṅgī mama śokavivardhinī
b prāṇān apaharantīva pūrṇacandranibhānanā
b yadi pīnāyataśroṇī padmapatranibhekṣaṇā
b mumūrṣur api me prāṇān ādāyāśu gamiṣyati
b pitṛmātṛsakhīnāṃ ca luptapiṇḍasya tasya me
c bāndhavānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
a yadi dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ guravo vā mayā yadi
c samyag ārādhitās tena saṃjīvatu mama priyā
a yathā janmaprabhṛti vai yatātmāhaṃ dhṛtavrataḥ
c pramadvarā tathādyaiva samuttiṣṭhatu bhāminī
d evaṃ lālapyatas tasya bhāryārthe duḥkhitasya ca
d devadūtas tadābhyetya vākyam āha ruruṃ vane
d kṛṣṇe viṣṇau hṛṣīkeśe lokeśe 'suravidviṣi
d yadi me niścalā bhaktir mama jīvatu sā priyā
d vilapyamāne tu rurau sarve devāḥ kṛpānvitāḥ
d dūtaṃ prasthāpayām āsuḥ saṃdiśyāsya hitaṃ vacaḥ
d sa dūtas tvarito 'bhyetya devānāṃ priyakṛc chuciḥ
d uvāca devavacanaṃ rurum ābhāṣya duḥkhitam
d devaiḥ sarvair ahaṃ brahman preṣito 'smi tavāntikam
d tvaddhitaṃ tvaddhitair uktaṃ śṛṇu vākyaṃ dvijottama
d pralapantam atīvārtaṃ ruruṃ dīnataraṃ tadā
d devadūtaḥ samāgamya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
 devadūta uvāca
a abhidhatse ha yad vācā ruro duḥkhena tan mṛṣā
c na tu martyasya dharmātmann āyur asti gatāyuṣaḥ
a gatāyur eṣā kṛpaṇā gandharvāpsarasoḥ sutā
c tasmāc choke manas tāta mā kṛthās tvaṃ kathaṃ cana
a upāyaś cātra vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ devair mahātmabhiḥ
c taṃ yadīcchasi kartuṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasīmāṃ pramadvarām
 rurur uvāca
a ka upāyaḥ kṛto devair brūhi tattvena khecara
c kariṣye taṃ tathā śrutvā trātum arhati māṃ bhavān
 devadūta uvāca
a āyuṣo 'rdhaṃ prayacchasva kanyāyai bhṛgunandana
c evam utthāsyati ruro tava bhāryā pramadvarā
 rurur uvāca
a āyuṣo 'rdhaṃ prayacchāmi kanyāyai khecarottama
c śṛṅgārarūpābharaṇā uttiṣṭhatu mama priyā
d saṃlāpaguṇasaṃpannā pūrṇacandranibhānanā
d macchokaṃ vākyatoyena vyapanītaṃ kariṣyati
 sūta uvāca
a tato gandharvarājaś ca devadūtaś ca sattamau
c dharmarājam upetyedaṃ vacanaṃ pratyabhāṣatām
a dharmarājāyuṣo 'rdhena ruror bhāryā pramadvarā
c samuttiṣṭhatu kalyāṇī mṛtaiva yadi manyase
 dharmarāja uvāca
a pramadvarā ruror bhāryā devadūta yadīcchasi
c uttiṣṭhatv āyuṣo 'rdhena ruror eva samanvitā
 sūta uvāca
a evam ukte tataḥ kanyā sodatiṣṭhat pramadvarā
c ruros tasyāyuṣo 'rdhena supteva varavarṇinī
a etad dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣye hi ruror uttamatejasaḥ
c āyuṣo 'tipravṛddhasya bhāryārthe 'rdhaṃ hrasatv iti
a tata iṣṭe 'hani tayoḥ pitarau cakratur mudā
c vivāhaṃ tau ca remāte parasparahitaiṣiṇau
a sa labdhvā durlabhāṃ bhāryāṃ padmakiñjalkasaprabhām
c vrataṃ cakre vināśāya jihmagānāṃ dhṛtavrataḥ
a sa dṛṣṭvā jihmagān sarvāṃs tīvrakopasamanvitaḥ
c abhihanti yathāsannaṃ gṛhya praharaṇaṃ sadā
a sa kadā cid vanaṃ vipro rurur abhyāgaman mahat
c śayānaṃ tatra cāpaśyaḍ ḍuṇḍubhaṃ vayasānvitam
a tata udyamya daṇḍaṃ sa kāladaṇḍopamaṃ tadā
c abhyaghnad ruṣito vipras tam uvācātha ḍuṇḍubhaḥ
a nāparādhyāmi te kiṃ cid aham adya tapodhana
c saṃrambhāt tat kimarthaṃ mām abhihaṃsi ruṣānvitaḥ
 rurur uvāca
a mama prāṇasamā bhāryā daṣṭāsīd bhujagena ha
c tatra me samayo ghora ātmanoraga vai kṛtaḥ
a hanyāṃ sadaiva bhujagaṃ yaṃ yaṃ paśyeyam ity uta
c tato 'haṃ tvāṃ jighāṃsāmi jīvitena vimokṣyase
 ḍuṇḍubha uvāca
a anye te bhujagā vipra ye daśantīha mānavān
c ḍuṇḍubhān ahigandhena na tvaṃ hiṃsitum arhasi
a ekānarthān pṛthagarthān ekaduḥkhān pṛthaksukhān
c ḍuṇḍubhān dharmavid bhūtvā na tvaṃ hiṃsitum arhasi
 sūta uvāca
a iti śrutvā vacas tasya bhujagasya rurus tadā
c nāvadhīd bhayasaṃvigna ṛṣiṃ matvātha ḍuṇḍubham
a uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān ruruḥ saṃśamayann iva
b kena karmavipākena bhujagatvam upāgataḥ
c kāmayā bhujaga brūhi ko 'sīmāṃ vikriyāṃ gataḥ
 ḍuṇḍubha uvāca
a ahaṃ purā ruro nāmnā ṛṣir āsaṃ sahasrapāt
c so 'haṃ śāpena viprasya bhujagatvam upāgataḥ
d brāhmaṇasya tu śāpena prāpto 'haṃ vikriyām imām
d sadā samupayuktasya vedādhyāyaratasya ca
 rurur uvāca
a kimarthaṃ śaptavān kruddho dvijas tvāṃ bhujagottama
c kiyantaṃ caiva kālaṃ te vapur etad bhaviṣyati
 ḍuṇḍubha uvāca
a sakhā babhūva me pūrvaṃ khagamo nāma vai dvijaḥ
c bhṛśaṃ saṃśitavāk tāta tapobalasamanvitaḥ
a sa mayā krīḍatā bālye kṛtvā tārṇam athoragam
c agnihotre prasaktaḥ san bhīṣitaḥ pramumoha vai
a labdhvā ca sa punaḥ saṃjñāṃ mām uvāca tapodhanaḥ
b maivaṃ sarpeṇa bādhethāḥ sakhe bhīr āviśan mama
b śaptaś ca tvaṃ mayā vipra na nandāmi kadācana
b tenaiva bahuśokto 'haṃ sarpake tv ātmaṇai sic dvija
b agnihotre samāsīnaṃ veṣayāmi samohitaḥ
c nirdahann iva kopena satyavāk saṃśitavrataḥ
a yathāvīryas tvayā sarpaḥ kṛto 'yaṃ madbibhīṣayā
c tathāvīryo bhujaṃgas tvaṃ mama kopād bhaviṣyasi
a tasyāhaṃ tapaso vīryaṃ jānamānas tapodhana
b muhur uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya susaṃbhrāntas tapodhanaḥ
c bhṛśam udvignahṛdayas tam avocaṃ vanaukasam
a prayataḥ saṃbhramāc caiva prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
c sakheti hasatedaṃ te narmārthaṃ vai kṛtaṃ mayā
a kṣantum arhasi me brahmañ śāpo 'yaṃ vinivartyatām
c so 'tha mām abravīd dṛṣṭvā bhṛśam udvignacetasam
a muhur uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya susaṃbhrāntas tapodhanaḥ
c nānṛtaṃ vai mayā proktaṃ bhavitedaṃ kathaṃ cana
a yat tu vakṣyāmi te vākyaṃ śṛṇu tan me dhṛtavrata
c śrutvā ca hṛdi te vākyam idam astu tapodhana
d yaṃ samābhāṣya dṛṣṭvā ca śāpād asmād vimokṣyase
a utpatsyati rurur nāma pramater ātmajaḥ śuciḥ
c taṃ dṛṣṭvā śāpamokṣas te bhavitā nacirād iva
d evam uktas tu tenāham uragatvam avāptavān
a sa tvaṃ rurur iti khyātaḥ pramater ātmajaḥ śuciḥ
ba śāpamokṣaś ca bhavitā na cirād dvijasattama
c svarūpaṃ pratilabhyāham adya vakṣyāmi te hitam
d sa ḍauṇḍubhaṃ parityajya rūpaṃ viprarṣabhas tadā
d svarūpaṃ bhāsvaraṃ bhūyaḥ pratipede mahāyaśāḥ
d idaṃ covāca vacanaṃ rurum apratimaujasam
d sūtaḥ
d iti svarūpaṃ gṛhyāśu tam ṛṣiṃ vākyam abravīt
a ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ smṛtaḥ
c tasmāt prāṇabhṛtaḥ sarvān na hiṃsyād brāhmaṇaḥ kva cit
a brāhmaṇaḥ saumya eveha jāyateti parā śrutiḥ
c vedavedāṅgavit tāta sarvabhūtābhayapradaḥ
a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ kṣamā ceti viniścitam
c brāhmaṇasya paro dharmo vedānāṃ dharaṇād api
a kṣatriyasya tu yo dharmaḥ sa neheṣyati vai tava
b kṣatriyasya tu yo dharmaḥ sa te nārhati vai dvija
c daṇḍadhāraṇam ugratvaṃ prajānāṃ paripālanam
a tad idaṃ kṣatriyasyāsīt karma vai śṛṇu me ruro
c janamejayasya dharmātman sarpāṇāṃ hiṃsanaṃ purā
a paritrāṇaṃ ca bhītānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ brāhmaṇād api
c tapovīryabalopetād vedavedāṅgapāragāt
e āstīkād dvijamukhyād vai sarpasatre dvijottama
 rurur uvāca
a kathaṃ hiṃsitavān sarpān kṣatriyo janamejayaḥ
c sarpā vā hiṃsitās tāta kimarthaṃ dvijasattama
a kimarthaṃ mokṣitāś caiva pannagās tena śaṃsa me
c āstīkena tad ācakṣva śrotum icchāmy aśeṣataḥ
 ṛṣir uvāca
 ity uktvāntarhite yogāt tasminn ṛṣivare prabho
 saṃbhramāviṣṭahṛdaya ṛṣir mene tad adbhutam
a śroṣyasi tvaṃ ruro sarvam āstīkacaritaṃ mahat
c brāhmaṇānāṃ kathayatām ity uktvāntaradhīyata
 sūta uvāca
a ruruś cāpi vanaṃ sarvaṃ paryadhāvat samantataḥ
c tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭum anvicchan saṃśrānto nyapatad bhuvi
d sa mohaṃ paramaṃ gatvā naṣṭasaṃjña ivābhavat
d tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ tathyaṃ cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a labdhasaṃjño ruruś cāyāt tac cācakhyau pitus tadā
b nyavedayata tat sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ pitur dvijaḥ
b pitre tu sarvam ākhyāya ḍuṇḍubhasya vaco 'rthavat
b apṛcchat pitaraṃ bhūyaḥ so 'stikasya vacas tadā
b yat tad ākhyānam akhilaṃ ḍuṇḍubhenātha kīrtitam
b tat kīrtyamānaṃ bhagavañ chrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
c pitā cāsya tad ākhyānaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ nyavedayat
d kimarthaṃ rājaśārdūla rājā sa janamejayaḥ
d sarpasatreṇa sarpāṇāṃ gato 'ntaṃ tad vadasva me
d iti śrīrāmāya namaḥ 
śrīgurubhyo namaḥ 
śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ 
d akṣaraṃ yat paribhraṣṭaṃ mātrāhīnaṃ tu yad bhavet
d kṣantum arhanti vidvāṃsaḥ kasya na syād vyatikramaḥ
d śiva śiva  kapardi samartha bhūteśa bhaganetranipātana
d vyatikramaṃ me bhagavan kṣantum arhasi śaṃkara
d nārāyaṇāya namaḥ 
śrīvedavyāsāya namaḥ 
gaṇapataye namaḥ 
d avighnam astu 
 śaunaka uvāca
a kimarthaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ sa rājā janamejayaḥ
c sarpasatreṇa sarpāṇāṃ gato 'ntaṃ tad vadasva me
d nikhilena yathātattvaṃ saute sarvam aśeṣataḥ
a āstīkaś ca dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ kimarthaṃ japatāṃ varaḥ
c mokṣayām āsa bhujagān dīptāt tasmād dhutāśanāt
a kasya putraḥ sa rājāsīt sarpasatraṃ ya āharat
c sa ca dvijātipravaraḥ kasya putro vadasva me
 sūta uvāca
a mahad ākhyānam āstīkaṃ yatraitat procyate dvija
c sarvam etad aśeṣeṇa śṛṇu me vadatāṃ vara
 śaunaka uvāca
a śrotum icchāmy aśeṣeṇa kathām etāṃ manoramām
c āstīkasya purāṇasya brāhmaṇasya yaśasvinaḥ
 sūta uvāca
a itihāsam imaṃ vṛddhāḥ purāṇaṃ paricakṣate
c kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaproktaṃ naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ
a pūrvaṃ pracoditaḥ sūtaḥ pitā me lomaharṣaṇaḥ
c śiṣyo vyāsasya medhāvī brāhmaṇair idam uktavān
a tasmād aham upaśrutya pravakṣyāmi yathātatham
c idam āstīkam ākhyānaṃ tubhyaṃ śaunaka pṛcchate
d kathayiṣyāmy aśeṣeṇa sarvapāpapraṇāśanam
a āstīkasya pitā hy āsīt prajāpatisamaḥ prabhuḥ
c brahmacārī yatāhāras tapasy ugre rataḥ sadā
a jaratkārur iti khyāta ūrdhvaretā mahān ṛṣiḥ
c yāyāvarāṇāṃ dharmajñaḥ pravaraḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
d sa kadā cin mahābhāgas tapobalasamanvitaḥ
d cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ
d tīrtheṣu ca samāplāvaṃ kurvann aṭati sarvaśaḥ
d caran dīkṣāṃ mahātejā duścarām akṛtātmabhiḥ
d vāyubhakṣo nirāhāraḥ śuṣyann animiṣo muniḥ
d itas tataḥ paricaran dīptapāvakasaprabhaḥ
a aṭamānaḥ kadā cit sa svān dadarśa pitāmahān
c lambamānān mahāgarte pādair ūrdhvair adhomukhān
a tān abravīt sa dṛṣṭvaiva jaratkāruḥ pitāmahān
c ke bhavanto 'valambante garte 'smin vā adhomukhāḥ
a vīraṇastambake lagnāḥ sarvataḥ paribhakṣite
c mūṣakena nigūḍhena garte 'smin nityavāsinā
 pitara ūcuḥ
a yāyāvarā nāma vayam ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
c saṃtānaprakṣayād brahmann adho gacchāma medinīm
d yeṣāṃ tu saṃtatir nāsti martyaloke sukhāvahā
d na te labhante vasatiṃ svarge puṇyavratā api
a asmākaṃ saṃtatis tv eko jaratkārur iti śrutaḥ
c mandabhāgyo 'lpabhāgyānāṃ tapa eva samāsthitaḥ
a na sa putrāñ janayituṃ dārān mūḍhaś cikīrṣati
c tena lambāmahe garte saṃtānaprakṣayād iha
a anāthās tena nāthena yathā duṣkṛtinas tathā
c kas tvaṃ bandhur ivāsmākam anuśocasi sattama
a jñātum icchāmahe brahman ko bhavān iha dhiṣṭhitaḥ
c kimarthaṃ caiva naḥ śocyān anukampitum arhasi
 jaratkārur uvāca
a mama pūrve bhavanto vai pitaraḥ sapitāmahāḥ
c brūta kiṃ karavāṇy adya jaratkārur ahaṃ svayam
 pitara ūcuḥ
 pitaras te vayaṃ tāta saṃtāraya kulaṃ svayam
a yatasva yatnavāṃs tāta saṃtānāya kulasya naḥ
c ātmano 'rthe 'smadarthe ca dharma ity eva cābhibho
a na hi dharmaphalais tāta na tapobhiḥ susaṃcitaiḥ
c tāṃ gatiṃ prāpnuvantīha putriṇo yāṃ vrajanti ha
a tad dāragrahaṇe yatnaṃ saṃtatyāṃ ca manaḥ kuru
c putrakāsmanniyogāt tvam etan naḥ paramaṃ hitam
 jaratkārur uvāca
a na dārān vai kariṣyāmi sadā me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ
c bhavatāṃ tu hitārthāya kariṣye dārasaṃgraham
a samayena ca kartāham anena vidhipūrvakam
c tathā yady upalapsyāmi kariṣye nānyathā tv aham
a sanāmnī yā bhavitrī me ditsitā caiva bandhubhiḥ
c bhaikṣavat tām ahaṃ kanyām upayaṃsye vidhānataḥ
a daridrāya hi me bhāryāṃ ko dāsyati viśeṣataḥ
c pratigrahīṣye bhikṣāṃ tu yadi kaś cit pradāsyati
a evaṃ dārakriyāhetoḥ prayatiṣye pitāmahāḥ
c anena vidhinā śaśvan na kariṣye 'ham anyathā
a tatra cotpatsyate jantur bhavatāṃ tāraṇāya vai
c śāśvataṃ sthānam āsādya modantāṃ pitaro mama
 sūta uvāca
 ity uktamātre vacane tathety uktvā pitāmahāḥ
 antardhānaṃ gatāḥ sarve vismayaṃ sa yayau muniḥ
a tato niveśāya tadā sa vipraḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
c mahīṃ cacāra dārārthī na ca dārān avindata
a sa kadā cid vanaṃ gatvā vipraḥ pitṛvacaḥ smaran
c cukrośa kanyābhikṣārthī tisro vācaḥ śanair iva
a taṃ vāsukiḥ pratyagṛhṇād udyamya bhaginīṃ tadā
c na sa tāṃ pratijagrāha na sanāmnīti cintayan
a sanāmnīm udyatāṃ bhāryāṃ gṛhṇīyām iti tasya hi
c mano niviṣṭam abhavaj jaratkāror mahātmanaḥ
a tam uvāca mahāprājño jaratkārur mahātapāḥ
c kiṃnāmnī bhaginīyaṃ te brūhi satyaṃ bhujaṃgama
 vāsukir uvāca
a jaratkāro jaratkāruḥ svaseyam anujā mama
b pratigṛhṇīṣva bhāryārthe mayā dattāṃ sumadhyamām
c tvadarthaṃ rakṣitā pūrvaṃ pratīcchemāṃ dvijottama
d evam uktvā tataḥ prādād bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm
 sūta uvāca
a mātrā hi bhujagāḥ śaptāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmavidāṃ vara
c janamejayasya vo yajñe dhakṣyaty anilasārathiḥ
a tasya śāpasya śāntyarthaṃ pradadau pannagottamaḥ
c svasāram ṛṣaye tasmai suvratāya tapasvine
a sa ca tāṃ pratijagrāha vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c āstīko nāma putraś ca tasyāṃ jajñe mahātmanaḥ
a tapasvī ca mahātmā ca vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ
c samaḥ sarvasya lokasya pitṛmātṛbhayāpahaḥ
a atha kālasya mahataḥ pāṇḍaveyo narādhipaḥ
c ājahāra mahāyajñaṃ sarpasatram iti śrutiḥ
a tasmin pravṛtte satre tu sarpāṇām antakāya vai
c mocayām āsa taṃ śāpam āstīkaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
a nāgāṃś ca mātulāṃś caiva tathā cānyān sa bāndhavān
c pitṝṃś ca tārayām āsa saṃtatyā tapasā tathā
e vrataiś ca vividhair brahman svādhyāyaiś cānṛṇo 'bhavat
a devāṃś ca tarpayām āsa yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
c ṛṣīṃś ca brahmacaryeṇa saṃtatyā ca pitāmahān
a apahṛtya guruṃ bhāraṃ pitṝṇāṃ saṃśitavrataḥ
c jaratkārur gataḥ svargaṃ sahitaḥ svaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
a āstīkaṃ ca sutaṃ prāpya dharmaṃ cānuttamaṃ muniḥ
c jaratkāruḥ sumahatā kālena svargam īyivān
a etad ākhyānam āstīkaṃ yathāvat kīrtitaṃ mayā
c prabrūhi bhṛguśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathyatām iti
 śaunaka uvāca
a saute kathaya tām etāṃ vistareṇa kathāṃ punaḥ
c āstīkasya kaveḥ sādhoḥ śuśrūṣā paramā hi naḥ
a madhuraṃ kathyate saumya ślakṣṇākṣarapadaṃ tvayā
c prīyāmahe bhṛśaṃ tāta pitevedaṃ prabhāṣase
a asmacchuśrūṣaṇe nityaṃ pitā hi niratas tava
c ācaṣṭaitad yathākhyānaṃ pitā te tvaṃ tathā vada
 sūta uvāca
a āyuṣyam idam ākhyānam āstīkaṃ kathayāmi te
c yathā śrutaṃ kathayataḥ sakāśād vai pitur mayā
a purā devayuge brahman prajāpatisute śubhe
c āstāṃ bhaginyau rūpeṇa samupete 'dbhute 'naghe
a te bhārye kaśyapasyāstāṃ kadrūś ca vinatā ca ha
c prādāt tābhyāṃ varaṃ prītaḥ prajāpatisamaḥ patiḥ
e kaśyapo dharmapatnībhyāṃ mudā paramayā yutaḥ
a varātisargaṃ śrutvaiva kaśyapād uttamaṃ ca te
c harṣād apratimāṃ prītiṃ prāpatuḥ sma varastriyau
a vavre kadrūḥ sutān nāgān sahasraṃ tulyatejasaḥ
c dvau putrau vinatā vavre kadrūputrādhikau bale
e ojasā tejasā caiva vikrameṇādhikau sutau
f bhavato bhavato yuktau prasādāt tanayau mama
a tasyai bhartā varaṃ prādād adhyardhaṃ putram īpsitam
c evam astv iti taṃ cāha kaśyapaṃ vinatā tadā
d ukte samāhite garbhāv etau dhārayatas tadā
d yathāvat prārthitaṃ labdhvā varaṃ tuṣṭābhavat tadā
a kṛtakṛtyā tu vinatā labdhvā vīryādhikau sutau
c kadrūś ca labdhvā putrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ tulyatejasām
a dhāryau prayatnato garbhāv ity uktvā sa mahātapāḥ
c te bhārye varasaṃhṛṣṭe kaśyapo vanam āviśat
a kālena mahatā kadrūr aṇḍānāṃ daśatīr daśa
c janayām āsa viprendra dve aṇḍe vinatā tadā
a tayor aṇḍāni nidadhuḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paricārikāḥ
c sopasvedeṣu bhāṇḍeṣu pañca varṣaśatāni ca
a tataḥ pañcaśate kāle kadrūputrā viniḥsṛtāḥ
c aṇḍābhyāṃ vinatāyās tu mithunaṃ na vyadṛśyata
a tataḥ putrārthiṇī devī vrīḍitā sā tapasvinī
c aṇḍaṃ bibheda vinatā tatra putram adṛkṣata
a pūrvārdhakāyasaṃpannam itareṇāprakāśatā
c sa putro roṣasaṃpannaḥ śaśāpainām iti śrutiḥ
a yo 'ham evaṃ kṛto mātas tvayā lobhaparītayā
c śarīreṇāsamagro 'dya tasmād dāsī bhaviṣyasi
a pañca varṣaśatāny asyā yayā vispardhase saha
c eṣa ca tvāṃ suto mātar dāsyatvān mokṣayiṣyati
a yady enam api mātas tvaṃ mām ivāṇḍavibhedanāt
c na kariṣyasy adehaṃ vā vyaṅgaṃ vāpi tapasvinam
a pratipālayitavyas te janmakālo 'sya dhīrayā
c viśiṣṭabalam īpsantyā pañcavarṣaśatāt paraḥ
a evaṃ śaptvā tataḥ putro vinatām antarikṣagaḥ
c aruṇo dṛśyate brahman prabhātasamaye sadā
d ādityarathamadhyās te sārathyaṃ samakalpayat
d udyann atha sahasrāṃśur dṛṣṭvā tam aruṇaṃ prabhuḥ
d svatejasā prajvalantam ātmanaḥ samatejasam
d sārathye kalpayām āsa prīyamāṇas tamonudaḥ
d so 'pi taṃ ratham āruhya bhānor amitatejasaḥ
d sarvalokapradīpasya hy aruṇo 'py amaro 'bhavat
a garuḍo 'pi yathākālaṃ jajñe pannagasūdanaḥ
c sa jātamātro vinatāṃ parityajya kham āviśat
a ādāsyann ātmano bhojyam annaṃ vihitam asya yat
c vidhātrā bhṛguśārdūla kṣudhitasya bubhukṣataḥ
 sūta uvāca
a etasminn eva kāle tu bhaginyau te tapodhana
c apaśyatāṃ samāyāntam uccaiḥśravasam antikāt
a yaṃ taṃ devagaṇāḥ sarve hṛṣṭarūpā apūjayan
c mathyamāne 'mṛte jātam aśvaratnam anuttamam
a mahaughabalam aśvānām uttamaṃ javatāṃ varam
c śrīmantam ajaraṃ divyaṃ sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam
 śaunaka uvāca
a kathaṃ tad amṛtaṃ devair mathitaṃ kva ca śaṃsa me
b kāraṇaṃ cātha mathane kiṃ jātam amṛtāt param
c yatra jajñe mahāvīryaḥ so 'śvarājo mahādyutiḥ
 sūta uvāca
a jvalantam acalaṃ meruṃ tejorāśim anuttamam
b pūrvaṃ suragaṇāḥ sarve tathā daityāś ca sarvaśaḥ
b kṣujjarābhyāṃ samākrāntā brahmāṇam upatasthire
c ākṣipantaṃ prabhāṃ bhānoḥ svaśṛṅgaiḥ kāñcanojjvalaiḥ
a kāñcanābharaṇaṃ citraṃ devagandharvasevitam
c aprameyam anādhṛṣyam adharmabahulair janaiḥ
a vyālair ācaritaṃ ghorair divyauṣadhividīpitam
c nākam āvṛtya tiṣṭhantam ucchrayeṇa mahāgirim
a agamyaṃ manasāpy anyair nadīvṛkṣasamanvitam
c nānāpatagasaṃghaiś ca nāditaṃ sumanoharaiḥ
a tasya pṛṣṭham upāruhya bahuratnācitaṃ śubham
c anantakalpam udviddhaṃ surāḥ sarve mahaujasaḥ
a te mantrayitum ārabdhās tatrāsīnā divaukasaḥ
c amṛtārthe samāgamya taponiyamasaṃsthitāḥ
a tatra nārāyaṇo devo brahmāṇam idam abravīt
c cintayatsu sureṣv evaṃ mantrayatsu ca sarvaśaḥ
a devair asurasaṃghaiś ca mathyatāṃ kalaśodadhiḥ
c bhaviṣyaty amṛtaṃ tatra mathyamāne mahodadhau
a sarvauṣadhīḥ samāvāpya sarvaratnāni caiva hi
c manthadhvam udadhiṃ devā vetsyadhvam amṛtaṃ tataḥ
 sūta uvāca
a tato 'bhraśikharākārair giriśṛṅgair alaṃkṛtam
c mandaraṃ parvatavaraṃ latājālasamāvṛtam
a nānāvihagasaṃghuṣṭaṃ nānādaṃṣṭrisamākulam
c kiṃnarair apsarobhiś ca devair api ca sevitam
a ekādaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ samucchritam
c adho bhūmeḥ sahasreṣu tāvatsv eva pratiṣṭhitam
a tam uddhartuṃ na śaktā vai sarve devagaṇās tadā
c viṣṇum āsīnam abhyetya brahmāṇaṃ cedam abruvan
a bhavantāv atra kurutāṃ buddhiṃ naiḥśreyasīṃ parām
c mandaroddharaṇe yatnaḥ kriyatāṃ ca hitāya naḥ
a tatheti cābravīd viṣṇur brahmaṇā saha bhārgava
b acodayad ameyātmā phaṇīndraṃ padmalocanaḥ
c tato 'nantaḥ samutthāya brahmaṇā paricoditaḥ
e nārāyaṇena cāpy uktas tasmin karmaṇi vīryavān
a atha parvatarājānaṃ tam ananto mahābalaḥ
c ujjahāra balād brahman savanaṃ savanaukasam
c         līlayā madhusūdanaḥ
c siddharṣisevitaṃ divyaṃ
a tatas tena surāḥ sārdhaṃ samudram upatasthire
c tam ūcur amṛtārthāya nirmathiṣyāmahe jalam
a apāṃpatir athovāca mamāpy aṃśo bhavet tataḥ
c soḍhāsmi vipulaṃ mardaṃ mandarabhramaṇād iti
a ūcuś ca kūrmarājānam akūpāraṃ surāsurāḥ
c girer adhiṣṭhānam asya bhavān bhavitum arhati
a kūrmeṇa tu tathety uktvā pṛṣṭham asya samarpitam
c tasya śailasya cāgraṃ vai yantreṇendro 'bhyapīḍayat
a manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā tathā netraṃ ca vāsukim
c devā mathitum ārabdhāḥ samudraṃ nidhim ambhasām
e amṛtārthinas tato brahman sahitā daityadānavāḥ
a ekam antam upāśliṣṭā nāgarājño mahāsurāḥ
c vibudhāḥ sahitāḥ sarve yataḥ pucchaṃ tataḥ sthitāḥ
d vāsuker agram āśliṣṭā nāgarājño mahāsurāḥ
a ananto bhagavān devo yato nārāyaṇas tataḥ
c śira udyamya nāgasya punaḥ punar avākṣipat
a vāsuker atha nāgasya sahasākṣipyataḥ suraiḥ
c sadhūmāḥ sārciṣo vātā niṣpetur asakṛn mukhāt
d sūtaḥ
d vāsuker mathyamānasya niḥsṛtena viṣeṇa ca
d abhavan miśritaṃ toyaṃ tadā bhārgavanandana
d mathanān mandareṇātha devadānavabāhubhiḥ
d viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ samudbhūtaṃ hālāhalam iti śrutam
d devāś ca dānavāś caiva dagdhās tena viṣeṇa ha
d apākrāmaṃs tato bhītā viṣādam agamaṃs tadā
d brahmāṇam abruvan devāḥ sametya munipuṃgavaiḥ
d mathyamāne 'mṛte jātaṃ viṣaṃ kālānalaprabham
d tenaiva tāpitā lokās tasya pratikuruṣva ha
d evam uktas tadā brahmā dadhyau lokeśvaraṃ haram
d tryakṣaṃ triśūlinaṃ rudraṃ devadevam umāpatim
d tadātha cintito devas taj jñātvā drutam āyayau
d tasyātha devas tat sarvam ācacakṣe prajāpatiḥ
d tac chrutvā devadeveśo lokasyāsya hitepsayā
d apibat tad viṣaṃ rudraḥ kālānalasamaprabham
d kaṇṭhe sthāpitavān devo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d yasmāt tu nīlatā kaṇṭhe nīlakaṇṭhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
d pītamātre viṣe tatra rudreṇāmitatejasā
d devāḥ prītāḥ punar jagmuś cakrur vai karma tat tathā
d mathyamāne 'mṛtasyārthe bhūyo vai devadānavaiḥ 
a te dhūmasaṃghāḥ saṃbhūtā meghasaṃghāḥ savidyutaḥ
c abhyavarṣan suragaṇāñ śramasaṃtāpakarśitān
a tasmāc ca girikūṭāgrāt pracyutāḥ puṣpavṛṣṭayaḥ
c surāsuragaṇān mālyaiḥ sarvataḥ samavākiran
a babhūvātra mahāghoṣo mahāmegharavopamaḥ
c udadher mathyamānasya mandareṇa surāsuraiḥ
a tatra nānājalacarā viniṣpiṣṭā mahādriṇā
c vilayaṃ samupājagmuḥ śataśo lavaṇāmbhasi
a vāruṇāni ca bhūtāni vividhāni mahīdharaḥ
c pātālatalavāsīni vilayaṃ samupānayat
a tasmiṃś ca bhrāmyamāṇe 'drau saṃghṛṣyantaḥ parasparam
c nyapatan patagopetāḥ parvatāgrān mahādrumāḥ
a teṣāṃ saṃgharṣajaś cāgnir arcirbhiḥ prajvalan muhuḥ
c vidyudbhir iva nīlābhram āvṛṇon mandaraṃ girim
a dadāha kuñjarāṃś caiva siṃhāṃś caiva viniḥsṛtān
c vigatāsūni sarvāṇi sattvāni vividhāni ca
a tam agnim amaraśreṣṭhaḥ pradahantaṃ tatas tataḥ
c vāriṇā meghajenendraḥ śamayām āsa sarvataḥ
a tato nānāvidhās tatra susruvuḥ sāgarāmbhasi
c mahādrumāṇāṃ niryāsā bahavaś cauṣadhīrasāḥ
a teṣām amṛtavīryāṇāṃ rasānāṃ payasaiva ca
c amaratvaṃ surā jagmuḥ kāñcanasya ca niḥsravāt
a atha tasya samudrasya taj jātam udakaṃ payaḥ
c rasottamair vimiśraṃ ca tataḥ kṣīrād abhūd ghṛtam
d etasmin nantare jātaṃ vāsuker mukhaniḥsravāt
d kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaram
d tasmin samutthite ghore viṣe kālānalaprabhe
d saṃtrastāsuradevaughā diśaḥ sarvāḥ prapedire
d yena viṣṇuḥ kṛtaḥ kṛṣṇo viṣeṇa mahatā tadā
d yatra hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad āsīc carācaram
d tatas tu brahmaṇo vākyād devadevo maheśvaraḥ
d apibat tad viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pratyakṣaṃ daivateṣu vai
d tasmin viṣe pīyamāne hareṇāmitatejasā
d vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur devāś ca munidānavāḥ
d tataḥ kaṇṭham anuprāptaṃ viṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā harasya ca
d brahmā provāca deveśaṃ kaṇṭhe dhāraya vai prabho
d svayaṃbhuvacanāc chaṃbhur dadhāra viṣam uttamam
d kaṇṭhe hālāhalaṃ ghoraṃ nīlakaṇṭhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a tato brahmāṇam āsīnaṃ devā varadam abruvan
c śrāntāḥ sma subhṛśaṃ brahman nodbhavaty amṛtaṃ ca tat
a ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ daityā nāgottamās tathā
c cirārabdham idaṃ cāpi sāgarasyāpi manthanam
d glānir asmān samāviṣṭā na cātrāmṛtam utthitam
d devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
a tato nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmā vacanam abravīt
c vidhatsvaiṣāṃ balaṃ viṣṇo bhavān atra parāyaṇam
 viṣṇur uvāca
a balaṃ dadāmi sarveṣāṃ karmaitad ye samāsthitāḥ
c kṣobhyatāṃ kalaśaḥ sarvair mandaraḥ parivartyatām
 sūta uvāca
a nārāyaṇavacaḥ śrutvā balinas te mahodadheḥ
c tat payaḥ sahitā bhūyaś cakrire bhṛśam ākulam
d tatra pūrvaṃ viṣaṃ jātaṃ tad brahmavacanāc chivaḥ
d prāgrasal lokarakṣārthaṃ tato jyeṣṭhā samutthitā
d kṛṣṇarūpadharā devī sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā
a tataḥ śatasahasrāṃśuḥ samāna iva sāgarāt
c prasannabhāḥ samutpannaḥ somaḥ śītāṃśur ujjvalaḥ
a śrīr anantaram utpannā ghṛtāt pāṇḍuravāsinī
c surā devī samutpannā turagaḥ pāṇḍuras tathā
a kaustubhaś ca maṇir divya utpanno 'mṛtasaṃbhavaḥ
c marīcivikacaḥ śrīmān nārāyaṇarogataḥ
d pārijātaś ca tatraiva surabhiś ca mahāmune
d jajñāte tau tadā brahman sarvakāmaphalapradau
d tato jajñe mahābhāga caturdanto mahāgajaḥ
a śrīḥ surā caiva somaś ca turagaś ca manojavaḥ
b ataḥ paraṃ mahākāyaś caturdaṃṣṭro mahotkaṭaḥ
b airāvaṇas tu nāgendra utthito 'mṛtasaṃbhavaḥ
b viṣaṃ jyeṣṭhā ca somaś ca śrīḥ surā turagas tathā
b kaustubhaś cāpsarāś caiva airāvatamahāgajaḥ
b kapilā kāmavṛkṣaś ca kaustubhaś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
b airāvataḥ sa vai nāgo nāgānāṃ pravaraḥ śubhaḥ
b śvetair dantaiś caturbhis tu mahākāyas tataḥ param
b airāvaṇo mahānāgo 'bhavad vajrabhṛtā dhṛtaḥ
b atinirmathanād eva kālakūṭas tataḥ paraḥ
b jagad āvṛtya sahasā sadhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
b trailokyaṃ mohitaṃ yasya gandham āghrāya tad viṣam
b dadhāra bhagavān kaṇṭhe mantramūrtir maheśvaraḥ
b tadā prabhṛti devas tu nīlakaṇṭha iti śrutiḥ
b etasminn antare daityā devān nirjitya kṛtsnaśaḥ
b jagṛhur amṛtaṃ divyaṃ devā vimanaso 'bhavan

d mātur antikam āgacchat parayā mudayā yutaḥ
d tatrāruṇaḥ sa nikṣiptaḥ diśaṃ pūrvāṃ mahādyutiḥ
d sūryatejovinihatāṃl lokān dagdhuṃ mahārathaḥ
d kimarthaṃ bhagavān sūryo lokān dagdhumanās tadā
d kim asyāpakṛtaṃ devair yenemaṃ manyur āviśat
d candrādityair yadā rāhur ākhyāto hy amṛtaṃ piban
d vairānubandhaṃ kṛtavāṃś candrāditye tadānagha
d vadhyamāne graheṇātha āditye manyur āviśat
d surārthāya samutpanno roṣo rāhos tu māṃ prati
d bahvanarthakaraṃ pāpam eko 'haṃ samavāpnuyām
d sahāya ekaḥ kāryeṣu na me kṛcchreṣu jāyate
d paśyanti grasyamānaṃ māṃ saha devair divaukasaḥ
d tasmāl lokavināśāya hy avatiṣṭhe na saṃśayaḥ
d evaṃ kṛtamatiḥ sūryo hy astam abhyagamad girim
d tato 'rdharātrasamaye sarvalokabhayāvahaḥ
d utpatsyate mahān dāhas trailokyasya vināśanaḥ
d tato devāḥ sarṣigaṇā upagamya pitāmaham
d bhagavan kimidaṃ cādya mahad dāhakṛtaṃ bhayam
d na tāvad dṛśyate sūryaḥ kṣapeyaṃ na prabhāti ca
d udite bhagavan bhānau katham etad bhaviṣyati
d eṣa lokavināśāya ravir udyantum udyataḥ
d dṛśyann eva hi lokān sa bhasmarāśīkariṣyati
d tasya pratividhānaṃ ca vihitaṃ pūrvam eva hi
d kaśyapasya suto vidvān aruṇety abhiviśrutaḥ
d mahākāyo mahātejāḥ sa sthāsyati puro raveḥ
d kariṣyati ca sārathyaṃ tejaś cāsya hariṣyati
d lokānāṃ śāntir evaṃ syād ṛṣīṇāṃ ca divaukasām
d tataḥ pitāmahājñātaḥ sarvaṃ cakre tadāruṇaḥ
d uditaś caiva savitā aruṇena tadāvṛtaḥ
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yat sūryaṃ manyur āviśat
d aruṇaś ca yathaivāsya sārathyam akarot prabhuḥ
d bhūya evāparaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇu pūrvam udāhṛtam
 sūta uvāca
a tataḥ kāmagamaḥ pakṣī mahāvīryo mahābalaḥ
c mātur antikam āgacchat paraṃ tīraṃ mahodadheḥ
a yatra sā vinatā tasmin paṇitena parājitā
c atīva duḥkhasaṃtaptā dāsībhāvam upāgatā
a tataḥ kadā cid vinatāṃ pravaṇāṃ putrasaṃnidhau
c kāla āhūya vacanaṃ kadrūr idam abhāṣata
a nāgānām ālayaṃ bhadre suramyaṃ ramaṇīyakam
c samudrakukṣāv ekānte tatra māṃ vinate vaha
a tataḥ suparṇamātā tām avahat sarpamātaram
c pannagān garuḍaś cāpi mātur vacanacoditaḥ
a sa sūryasyābhito yāti vainateyo vihaṃgamaḥ
c sūryaraśmiparītāś ca mūrcchitāḥ pannagābhavan
e tadavasthān sutān dṛṣṭvā kadrūḥ śakram athāstuvat
a namas te devadeveśa namas te balasūdana
c namucighna namas te 'stu sahasrākṣa śacīpate
a sarpāṇāṃ sūryataptānāṃ vāriṇā tvaṃ plavo bhava

a īśo hy asi payaḥ sraṣṭuṃ tvam analpaṃ puraṃdara
c tvam eva meghas tvaṃ vāyus tvam agnir vaidyuto 'mbare
a tvam abhraghanavikṣeptā tvām evāhuḥ punar ghanam
c tvaṃ vajram atulaṃ ghoraṃ ghoṣavāṃs tvaṃ balāhakaḥ
a sraṣṭā tvam eva lokānāṃ saṃhartā cāparājitaḥ

c tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ sahasrākṣas tvaṃ devas tvaṃ parāyaṇam
a tvaṃ sarvam amṛtaṃ deva tvaṃ somaḥ paramārcitaḥ
c tvaṃ muhūrtas tithiś ca tvaṃ lavas tvaṃ vai punaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
a śuklas tvaṃ bahulaś caiva kalā kāṣṭhā truṭis tathā
c saṃvatsarartavo māsā rajanyaś ca dināni ca
a tvam uttamā sagirivanā vasuṃdharā

c mahodadhiḥ satimitimiṃgilas tathā
mahormimān bahumakaro jhaṣālayaḥ
a mahad yaśas tvam iti sadābhipūjyase
manīṣibhir muditamanā maharṣibhiḥ
c abhiṣṭutaḥ pibasi ca somam adhvare
vaṣaṭkṛtāny api ca havīṃṣi bhūtaye
a tvaṃ vipraiḥ satatam ihejyase phalārthaṃ
vedāṅgeṣv atulabalaugha gīyase ca
c tvaddhetor yajanaparāyaṇā dvijendrā
vedāṅgāny abhigamayanti sarvavedaiḥ
 sūta uvāca
a evaṃ stutas tadā kadrvā bhagavān harivāhanaḥ
b meghān ājñāpayām āsa varṣadhvam udakaṃ śubham

 sūta uvāca

a dāsībhūtāsmy anāryāyā bhaginyāḥ patagottama

 sūta uvāca
a tasmiṃs tu kathite mātrā kāraṇe gaganecaraḥ

 sūta uvāca
a ity ukto garuḍaḥ sarpais tato mātaram abravīt

 vinatovāca
a samudrakukṣāv ekānte niṣādālayam uttamam
b bhavanāni niṣādānāṃ tatra santi dvijottama
b pāpināṃ naṣṭalokānāṃ nirghṛṇānāṃ durātmanām
c sahasrāṇām anekānāṃ tān bhuktvāmṛtam ānaya
a na tu te brāhmaṇaṃ hantuṃ kāryā buddhiḥ kathaṃ cana
c avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brāhmaṇo hy analopamaḥ
a agnir arko viṣaṃ śastraṃ vipro bhavati kopitaḥ
b evamādibhī rūpais tu satāṃ vai brāhmaṇo mataḥ
b sa te tāta na hantavyaḥ saṃkruddhenāpi sarvadā
b brāhmaṇānām abhidroho na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
b na hy evam agnir nādityo bhasma kuryāt tathānagha

b tad etair vividhair liṅgais tvaṃ vidyās taṃ dvijottamam
b gurur hi sarvabhūtānāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
b tarhi vakṣyāmi vispaṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ tan nibodhatha
c bhūtānām agrabhug vipro varṇaśreṣṭhaḥ pitā guruḥ
 garuḍa uvāca
a yathāham abhijānīyāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c tan me kāraṇato mātaḥ pṛcchato vaktum arhasi
d kiṃrūpo brāhmaṇo mātaḥ kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ
d kiṃ svid agninibho bhāti kiṃ svit saumyapradarśanaḥ
 vinatovāca
 mekhalājinadaṇḍena brahmacārīti lakṣayet
 śuklavastraḥ śucir dānto rukmakuṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ
 vaiṇavīṃ dhārayan yaṣṭim upavītaṃ kamaṇḍalum

a yas te kaṇṭham anuprāpto nigīrṇaṃ baḍiśaṃ yathā
c dahed aṅgāravat putra taṃ vidyād brāhmaṇarṣabham
 sūta uvāca
a provāca cainaṃ vinatā putrahārdād idaṃ vacaḥ
b jaṭhare na ca jīryed yas taṃ jānīhi dvijottamam

d putrahārdād uvācainaṃ vinatā garuḍaṃ tadā
d prītā paramaduḥkhārtā nāgair viprakṛtā satī

c śiras tu pātu te vahnir bhāskaraḥ sarvam eva tu

b bhaviṣyati na saṃdeho yāvad āgamanaṃ tava

 sūta uvāca
a tasya kaṇṭham anuprāpto brāhmaṇaḥ saha bhāryayā

d aspṛśyā yājināṃ nityaṃ satyaṃ ca vada me dvija

 sūta uvāca

 kaśyapa uvāca
 idaṃ saro mahāpuṇyaṃ devaloke 'pi viśrutam
 yatra kūrmāgrajaṃ hastī sadā karṣaty avāṅmukhaḥ
 tayor janma tu te kṛtsnaṃ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
 tan me tattvaṃ nibodhasva yatpramāṇau ca tau matau
 śṛṇu tvaṃ vatsa bhadraṃ te kathāṃ vairāgyavardhinīm
 pitror arthavibhāge vai samutpannāṃ purāṇḍaja
a āsīd vibhāvasur nāma maharṣiḥ kopano bhṛśam
c bhrātā tasyānujaś cāsīt supratīko mahātapāḥ
a sa necchati dhanaṃ bhrātrā sahaikasthaṃ mahāmuniḥ
c vibhāgaṃ kīrtayaty eva supratīko 'tha nityaśaḥ
a athābravīc ca taṃ bhrātā supratīkaṃ vibhāvasuḥ
b vibhāge bahavo doṣā bhaviṣyanti mahātapāḥ
c vibhāgaṃ bahavo mohāt kartum icchanti nityadā
e tato vibhaktā anyonyaṃ nādriyante 'rthamohitāḥ
a tataḥ svārthaparān mūḍhān pṛthag bhūtān svakair dhanaiḥ
c viditvā bhedayanty etān amitrā mitrarūpiṇaḥ
a viditvā cāpare bhinnān antareṣu patanty atha
c bhinnānām atulo nāśaḥ kṣipram eva pravartate
a tasmāc caiva vibhāgārthaṃ na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
b evam uktaḥ supratīko bhāgaṃ kīrtayate 'niśam
b evaṃ nirbadhyamānas tu śaśāpainaṃ vibhāvasuḥ
c guruśāstre nibaddhānām anyonyam abhiśaṅkinām
d teṣāṃ madhye tvam apy ekaś chadmakṛc ca mahātmabhiḥ
a niyantuṃ na hi śakyas tvaṃ bhedato dhanam icchasi
c yasmāt tasmāt supratīka hastitvaṃ samavāpsyasi
a śaptas tv evaṃ supratīko vibhāvasum athābravīt
c tvam apy antarjalacaraḥ kacchapaḥ saṃbhaviṣyasi
a evam anyonyaśāpāt tau supratīkavibhāvasū
c gajakacchapatāṃ prāptāv arthārthaṃ mūḍhacetasau
a roṣadoṣānuṣaṅgeṇa tiryagyonigatāv api
c parasparadveṣaratau pramāṇabaladarpitau
a sarasy asmin mahākāyau pūrvavairānusāriṇau
c tayor ekataraḥ śrīmān samupaiti mahāgajaḥ
a tasya bṛṃhitaśabdena kūrmo 'py antarjaleśayaḥ
c utthito 'sau mahākāyaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃkṣobhayan saraḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvāveṣṭitakaraḥ pataty eṣa gajo jalam
c dantahastāgralāṅgūlapādavegena vīryavān
a taṃ vikṣobhayamāṇaṃ tu saro bahujhaṣākulam
c kūrmo 'py abhyudyataśirā yuddhāyābhyeti vīryavān
a ṣaḍ ucchrito yojanāni gajas tad dviguṇāyataḥ
c kūrmas triyojanotsedho daśayojanamaṇḍalaḥ
a tāv etau yuddhasaṃmattau parasparajayaiṣiṇau
c upayujyāśu karmedaṃ sādhayepsitam ātmanaḥ
d mahābhraghanasaṃkāśaṃ taṃ bhuktvāmṛtam ānaya
d mahāgirisamaprakhyaṃ ghorarūpaṃ ca hastinam

 ity uktvā garuḍaṃ sarṣiḥ māṅgalyam akarot tadā
 yudhyataḥ saha devais te yuddhe bhavatu maṅgalam
