 yudhyamānasya saṃgrāme devaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahābala
 ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni pavitrāṇi havīṃṣi ca
 rahasyāni ca sarvāṇi sarve vedāś ca te balam
 ity ukto garuḍaḥ pitrā gatas taṃ hradam antikāt
 apaśyan nirmalajalaṃ nānāpakṣisamākulam
 etasminn eva kāle tu tāv ṛṣī vittalolupau
 gajakacchapatāṃ prāpya yuyudhāte parasparam
a sa tac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ bhīmavego 'ntarikṣagaḥ
c nakhena gajam ekena kūrmam ekena cākṣipat
a samutpapāta cākāśaṃ tata uccair vihaṃgamaḥ
c so 'lambatīrtham āsādya devavṛkṣān upāgamat
a te bhītāḥ samakampanta tasya pakṣānilāhatāḥ
c na no bhañjyād iti tadā divyāḥ kanakaśākhinaḥ
a pracalāṅgān sa tān dṛṣṭvā manorathaphalāṅkurān
c anyān atularūpāṅgān upacakrāma khecaraḥ
a kāñcanai rājataiś caiva phalair vaiḍūryaśākhinaḥ
c sāgarāmbuparikṣiptān bhrājamānān mahādrumān
d teṣāṃ madhye mahān āsīt pādapaḥ sumanoharaḥ
d sahasrayojanotsedho bahuśākhāsamanvitaḥ
d khagānām ālayo divyo nāmnā rohiṇapādapaḥ
d yasya chāyāṃ samāśritya sadyo bhavati nirvṛtaḥ
a tam uvāca khagaśreṣṭhaṃ tatra rohiṇapādapaḥ
c atipravṛddhaḥ sumahān āpatantaṃ manojavam
a yaiṣā mama mahāśākhā śatayojanam āyatā
c etām āsthāya śākhāṃ tvaṃ khādemau gajakacchapau
a tato drumaṃ patagasahasrasevitaṃ
mahīdharapratimavapuḥ prakampayan
c khagottamo drutam abhipatya vegavān
babhañja tām aviralapatrasaṃvṛtām
 sūta uvāca
a spṛṣṭamātrā tu padbhyāṃ sā garuḍena balīyasā
c abhajyata taroḥ śākhā bhagnāṃ cainām adhārayat
a tāṃ bhagnāṃ sa mahāśākhāṃ smayan samavalokayan
c athātra lambato 'paśyad vālakhilyān adhomukhān
d ṛṣayo hy atra lambante na hanyām iti tān ṛṣīn
d taporatāṃl lambamānān brahmarṣīn abhivīkṣya saḥ
d vaikhānasāṃś ca śākhāyāṃ lambamānān adhomukhān
d hanyād etān saṃpatantī śākhety atha vicintya saḥ
d nakhair dṛḍhataraṃ vīraḥ saṃgṛhya gajakacchapau
d tapasyato bhayāviṣṭo vainateyo mahābalaḥ
a sa tadvināśasaṃtrāsād anupatya khagādhipaḥ
c śākhām āsyena jagrāha teṣām evānvavekṣayā
d atidaivaṃ tu tat tasya karma dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ
d vismayotkampahṛdayā nāma cakrur mahākhage
d guruṃ bhāraṃ samāsādyoḍḍīna eṣa vihaṃgamaḥ
d garuḍas tu khagaśreṣṭhas tasmāt pannagabhojanaḥ
e śanaiḥ paryapatat pakṣī parvatān praviśātayan
a evaṃ so 'bhyapatad deśān bahūn sagajakacchapaḥ
c dayārthaṃ vālakhilyānāṃ na ca sthānam avindata
a sa gatvā parvataśreṣṭhaṃ gandhamādanam avyayam
c dadarśa kaśyapaṃ tatra pitaraṃ tapasi sthitam
a dadarśa taṃ pitā cāpi divyarūpaṃ vihaṃgamam
c tejovīryabalopetaṃ manomārutaraṃhasam
a śailaśṛṅgapratīkāśaṃ brahmadaṇḍam ivodyatam
c acintyam anabhijñeyaṃ sarvabhūtabhayaṃkaram
a māyāvīryadharaṃ sākṣād agnim iddham ivodyatam
c apradhṛṣyam ajeyaṃ ca devadānavarākṣasaiḥ
a bhettāraṃ giriśṛṅgāṇāṃ nadījalaviśoṣaṇam
c lokasaṃloḍanaṃ ghoraṃ kṛtāntasamadarśanam
a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhagavān kaśyapas tadā
c viditvā cāsya saṃkalpam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a putra mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mā sadyo lapsyase vyathām
c mā tvā daheyuḥ saṃkruddhā vālakhilyā marīcipāḥ
a prasādayām āsa sa tān kaśyapaḥ putrakāraṇāt
c vālakhilyāṃs tapaḥsiddhān idam uddiśya kāraṇam
a prajāhitārtham ārambho garuḍasya tapodhanāḥ
c cikīrṣati mahat karma tad anujñātum arhatha
a evam uktā bhagavatā munayas te samabhyayuḥ
c muktvā śākhāṃ giriṃ puṇyaṃ himavantaṃ taporthinaḥ
a tatas teṣv apayāteṣu pitaraṃ vinatātmajaḥ
c śākhāvyākṣiptavadanaḥ paryapṛcchata kaśyapam
a bhagavan kva vimuñcāmi taruśākhām imām aham
c varjitaṃ brāhmaṇair deśam ākhyātu bhagavān mama
a tato niṣpuruṣaṃ śailaṃ himasaṃruddhakandaram
c agamyaṃ manasāpy anyais tasyācakhyau sa kaśyapaḥ
a taṃ parvatamahākukṣim āviśya manasā khagaḥ
c javenābhyapatat tārkṣyaḥ saśākhāgajakacchapaḥ
a na tāṃ vadhraḥ pariṇahec chatacarmā mahān aṇuḥ
c śākhino mahatīṃ śākhāṃ yāṃ pragṛhya yayau khagaḥ
a tataḥ sa śatasāhasraṃ yojanāntaram āgataḥ
c kālena nātimahatā garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
a sa taṃ gatvā kṣaṇenaiva parvataṃ vacanāt pituḥ
c amuñcan mahatīṃ śākhāṃ sasvanāṃ tatra khecaraḥ
a pakṣānilahataś cāsya prākampata sa śailarāṭ
c mumoca puṣpavarṣaṃ ca samāgalitapādapaḥ
a śṛṅgāṇi ca vyaśīryanta gires tasya samantataḥ
c maṇikāñcanacitrāṇi śobhayanti mahāgirim
a śākhino bahavaś cāpi śākhayābhihatās tayā
c kāñcanaiḥ kusumair bhānti vidyutvanta ivāmbudāḥ
a te hemavikacā bhūyo yuktāḥ parvatadhātubhiḥ
c vyarājañ śākhinas tatra sūryāṃśupratirañjitāḥ
a tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅgam āsthāya sa khagottamaḥ
c bhakṣayām āsa garuḍas tāv ubhau gajakacchapau
d tāv ubhau bhakṣayitvā tu sa tārkṣyaḥ kūrmakuñjarau
a tataḥ parvatakūṭāgrād utpapāta manojavaḥ
c prāvartantātha devānām utpātā bhayavedinaḥ
a indrasya vajraṃ dayitaṃ prajajvāla vyathānvitam
c sadhūmā cāpatat sārcir divolkā nabhasaś cyutā
a tathā vasūnāṃ rudrāṇām ādityānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c sādhyānāṃ marutāṃ caiva ye cānye devatāgaṇāḥ
e svaṃ svaṃ praharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ parasparam upādravat
a abhūtapūrvaṃ saṃgrāme tadā devāsure 'pi ca
c vavur vātāḥ sanirghātāḥ petur ulkāḥ samantataḥ
a nirabhram api cākāśaṃ prajagarja mahāsvanam
c devānām api yo devaḥ so 'py avarṣad asṛk tadā
a mamlur mālyāni devānāṃ śemus tejāṃsi caiva hi
c utpātameghā raudrāś ca vavarṣuḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu
e rajāṃsi mukuṭāny eṣām utthitāni vyadharṣayan
a tatas trāsasamudvignaḥ saha devaiḥ śatakratuḥ
c utpātān dāruṇān paśyann ity uvāca bṛhaspatim
a kimarthaṃ bhagavan ghorā mahotpātāḥ samutthitāḥ
c na ca śatruṃ prapaśyāmi yudhi yo naḥ pradharṣayet
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a tavāparādhād devendra pramādāc ca śatakrato
c tapasā vālakhilyānāṃ bhūtam utpannam adbhutam
a kaśyapasya muneḥ putro vinatāyāś ca khecaraḥ
c hartuṃ somam anuprāpto balavān kāmarūpavān
a samartho balināṃ śreṣṭho hartuṃ somaṃ vihaṃgamaḥ
c sarvaṃ saṃbhāvayāmy asminn asādhyam api sādhayet
 sūta uvāca
a śrutvaitad vacanaṃ śakraḥ provācāmṛtarakṣiṇaḥ
c mahāvīryabalaḥ pakṣī hartuṃ somam ihodyataḥ
a yuṣmān saṃbodhayāmy eṣa yathā sa na hared balāt
a         gṛhītvā varuṇāyudhān
a parivāryāmṛtaṃ sarve yūyaṃ madvacanād iha
a rakṣadhvaṃ vibudhā vīrā        
c atulaṃ hi balaṃ tasya bṛhaspatir uvāca me
a tac chrutvā vibudhā vākyaṃ vismitā yatnam āsthitāḥ
c parivāryāmṛtaṃ tasthur vajrī cendraḥ śatakratuḥ
a dhārayanto mahārhāṇi kavacāni manasvinaḥ
c kāñcanāni vicitrāṇi vaiḍūryavikṛtāni ca
d carmāṇy api ca gātreṣu bhānumanti dṛḍhāni ca
a vividhāni ca śastrāṇi ghorarūpāṇy anekaśaḥ
c śitatīkṣṇāgradhārāṇi samudyamya sahasraśaḥ
a savisphuliṅgajvālāni sadhūmāni ca sarvaśaḥ
b bhūṣitāni ca anyāni jvalitāny aparāṇi ca
b śitatīkṣṇāgradhārāṇi vajrachedīni sarvaśaḥ
c cakrāṇi parighāṃś caiva triśūlāni paraśvadhān
a śaktīś ca vividhās tīkṣṇāḥ karavālāṃś ca nirmalān
c svadeharūpāṇy ādāya gadāś cograpradarśanāḥ
a taiḥ śastrair bhānumadbhis te divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
c bhānumantaḥ suragaṇās tasthur vigatakalmaṣāḥ
a anupamabalavīryatejaso
dhṛtamanasaḥ parirakṣaṇe 'mṛtasya
c asurapuravidāraṇāḥ surā
jvalanasamiddhavapuḥprakāśinaḥ
a iti samaravaraṃ surāsthitaṃ
parighasahasraśataiḥ samākulam
c vigalitam iva cāmbarāntare
tapanamarīcivibhāsitaṃ babhau
 śaunaka uvāca
a ko 'parādho mahendrasya kaḥ pramādaś ca sūtaja
c tapasā vālakhilyānāṃ saṃbhūto garuḍaḥ katham
a kaśyapasya dvijāteś ca kathaṃ vai pakṣirāṭ sutaḥ
c adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānām avadhyaś cābhavat katham
a kathaṃ ca kāmacārī sa kāmavīryaś ca khecaraḥ
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ purāṇe yadi paṭhyate
 sūta uvāca
a viṣayo 'yaṃ purāṇasya yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c śṛṇu me vadataḥ sarvam etat saṃkṣepato dvija
a yajataḥ putrakāmasya kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ
c sāhāyyam ṛṣayo devā gandharvāś ca daduḥ kila
a tatredhmānayane śakro niyuktaḥ kaśyapena ha
c munayo vālakhilyāś ca ye cānye devatāgaṇāḥ
a śakras tu vīryasadṛśam idhmabhāraṃ giriprabham
c samudyamyānayām āsa nātikṛcchrād iva prabhuḥ
a athāpaśyad ṛṣīn hrasvān aṅguṣṭhodaraparvaṇaḥ
c palāśavṛntikām ekāṃ sahitān vahataḥ pathi
a pralīnān sveṣv ivāṅgeṣu nirāhārāṃs tapodhanān
c kliśyamānān mandabalān goṣpade saṃplutodake
a tāṃś ca sarvān smayāviṣṭo vīryonmattaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c avahasyātyagāc chīghraṃ laṅghayitvāvamanya ca
a te 'tha roṣasamāviṣṭāḥ subhṛśaṃ jātamanyavaḥ
c ārebhire mahat karma tadā śakrabhayaṃkaram
a juhuvus te sutapaso vidhivaj jātavedasam
c mantrair uccāvacair viprā yena kāmena tac chṛṇu
a kāmavīryaḥ kāmagamo devarājabhayapradaḥ
c indro 'nyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ bhaved iti yatavratāḥ
a indrāc chataguṇaḥ śaurye vīrye caiva manojavaḥ
c tapaso naḥ phalenādya dāruṇaḥ saṃbhavatv iti
a tad buddhvā bhṛśasaṃtapto devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
c jagāma śaraṇaṃ tatra kaśyapaṃ saṃśitavratam
a tac chrutvā devarājasya kaśyapo 'tha prajāpatiḥ
c vālakhilyān upāgamya karmasiddhim apṛcchata
d kāśyapaḥ
d vālakhilyāḥ
d kena kāmena cārabdhaṃ bhavadbhir homakarma ca
d yāthātathyena me brūta śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d avajñātāḥ surendreṇa mūḍhenākṛtabuddhinā
d aiśvaryamadamattena sadācārān nirasyatā
d tadvighātārtham ārambho vidhivat tasya kāśyapa
a evam astv iti taṃ cāpi pratyūcuḥ satyavādinaḥ
c tān kaśyapa uvācedaṃ sāntvapūrvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
a ayam indras tribhuvane niyogād brahmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
c indrārthaṃ ca bhavanto 'pi yatnavantas tapodhanāḥ
a na mithyā brahmaṇo vākyaṃ kartum arhatha sattamāḥ
c bhavatāṃ ca na mithyāyaṃ saṃkalpo me cikīrṣitaḥ
a bhavatv eṣa patatrīṇām indro 'tibalasattvavān
c prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ caiva devarājasya yācataḥ
a evam uktāḥ kaśyapena vālakhilyās tapodhanāḥ
c pratyūcur abhisaṃpūjya muniśreṣṭhaṃ prajāpatim
a indrārtho 'yaṃ samārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ prajāpate
c apatyārthaṃ samārambho bhavataś cāyam īpsitaḥ
a tad idaṃ saphalaṃ karma tvayā vai pratigṛhyatām
c tathā caiva vidhatsvātra yathā śreyo 'nupaśyasi
a etasminn eva kāle tu devī dākṣāyaṇī śubhā
c vinatā nāma kalyāṇī putrakāmā yaśasvinī
a tapas taptvā vrataparā snātā puṃsavane śuciḥ
c upacakrāma bhartāraṃ tām uvācātha kaśyapaḥ
a ārambhaḥ saphalo devi bhavitāyaṃ tavepsitaḥ
c janayiṣyasi putrau dvau vīrau tribhuvaneśvarau
a tapasā vālakhilyānāṃ mama saṃkalpajau tathā
c bhaviṣyato mahābhāgau putrau te lokapūjitau
a uvāca caināṃ bhagavān mārīcaḥ punar eva ha
c dhāryatām apramādena garbho 'yaṃ sumahodayaḥ
a ekaḥ sarvapatatrīṇām indratvaṃ kārayiṣyati
c lokasaṃbhāvito vīraḥ kāmavīryo vihaṃgamaḥ
a śatakratum athovāca prīyamāṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
c tvatsahāyau khagāv etau bhrātarau te bhaviṣyataḥ
a naitābhyāṃ bhavitā doṣaḥ sakāśāt te puraṃdara
c vyetu te śakra saṃtāpas tvam evendro bhaviṣyasi
a na cāpy evaṃ tvayā bhūyaḥ kṣeptavyā brahmavādinaḥ
c na cāvamānyā darpāt te vāgviṣā bhṛśakopanāḥ
a evam ukto jagāmendro nirviśaṅkas triviṣṭapam
c vinatā cāpi siddhārthā babhūva muditā tadā
a janayām āsa putrau dvāv aruṇaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā
c aruṇas tayos tu vikala ādityasya puraḥsaraḥ
a patatrīṇāṃ tu garuḍa indratvenābhyaṣicyata
c tasyaitat karma sumahac chrūyatāṃ bhṛgunandana
 sūta uvāca
a tatas tasmin dvijaśreṣṭha samudīrṇe tathāvidhe
c garutmān pakṣirāṭ tūrṇaṃ saṃprāpto vibudhān prati
a taṃ dṛṣṭvātibalaṃ caiva prākampanta samantataḥ
c parasparaṃ ca pratyaghnan sarvapraharaṇāny api
a tatra cāsīd ameyātmā vidyudagnisamaprabhaḥ
c bhauvanaḥ sumahāvīryaḥ somasya parirakṣitā
a sa tena patagendreṇa pakṣatuṇḍanakhaiḥ kṣataḥ
c muhūrtam atulaṃ yuddhaṃ kṛtvā vinihato yudhi
a rajaś coddhūya sumahat pakṣavātena khecaraḥ
c kṛtvā lokān nirālokāṃs tena devān avākirat
a tenāvakīrṇā rajasā devā moham upāgaman
c na cainaṃ dadṛśuś channā rajasāmṛtarakṣiṇaḥ
a evaṃ saṃloḍayām āsa garuḍas tridivālayam
c pakṣatuṇḍaprahāraiś ca devān sa vidadāra ha
a tato devaḥ sahasrākṣas tūrṇaṃ vāyum acodayat
c vikṣipemāṃ rajovṛṣṭiṃ tavaitat karma māruta
a atha vāyur apovāha tad rajas tarasā balī
c tato vitimire jāte devāḥ śakunim ārdayan
a nanāda coccair balavān mahāmegharavaḥ khagaḥ
c vadhyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ sarvabhūtāni bhīṣayan
e utpapāta mahāvīryaḥ pakṣirāṭ paravīrahā
a tam utpatyāntarikṣasthaṃ devānām upari sthitam
c varmiṇo vibudhāḥ sarve nānāśastrair avākiran
a paṭṭiśaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair gadābhiś ca savāsavāḥ
c kṣurāntair jvalitaiś cāpi cakrair ādityarūpibhiḥ
a nānāśastravisargaiś ca vadhyamānaḥ samantataḥ
c kurvan sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ pakṣirāṇ na vyakampata
a vinardann iva cākāśe vainateyaḥ pratāpavān
c pakṣābhyām urasā caiva samantād vyākṣipat surān
a te vikṣiptās tato devāḥ prajagmur garuḍārditāḥ
c nakhatuṇḍakṣatāś caiva susruvuḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu
a sādhyāḥ prācīṃ sagandharvā vasavo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
c prajagmuḥ sahitā rudraiḥ patagendrapradharṣitāḥ
a diśaṃ pratīcīm ādityā nāsatyā uttarāṃ diśam
c muhur muhuḥ prekṣamāṇā yudhyamānā mahaujasam
a aśvakrandena vīreṇa reṇukena ca pakṣiṇā
b balākena ca śūreṇa ghasena praghasena ca
c krathanena ca śūreṇa tapanena ca khecaraḥ
d suparṇena ca śūreṇa śvasanena ca pakṣirāṭ
a ulūkaśvasanābhyāṃ ca nimeṣeṇa ca pakṣiṇā
c prarujena ca saṃyuddhaṃ cakāra pralihena ca
a tān pakṣanakhatuṇḍāgrair abhinad vinatāsutaḥ
c yugāntakāle saṃkruddhaḥ pinākīva mahābalaḥ
a mahāvīryā mahotsāhās tena te bahudhā kṣatāḥ
c rejur abhraghanaprakhyā rudhiraughapravarṣiṇaḥ
a tān kṛtvā patagaśreṣṭhaḥ sarvān utkrāntajīvitān
c atikrānto 'mṛtasyārthe sarvato 'gnim apaśyata
a āvṛṇvānaṃ mahājvālam arcirbhiḥ sarvato 'mbaram
c dahantam iva tīkṣṇāṃśuṃ ghoraṃ vāyusamīritam
d nabhaḥ spṛśantaṃ jvālābhiḥ sarvabhūtabhayaṃkaram
a tato navatyā navatīr mukhānāṃ
kṛtvā tarasvī garuḍo mahātmā
b mukhaṃ sahasraṃ sa cakāra pakṣī
b nadīyutaṃ vahnivināśahetoḥ
b mahāyutais taiḥ sabalair mahātmā
b tam agnim iddhaṃ śamayāṃ cakāra
c nadīḥ samāpīya mukhais tatas taiḥ
suśīghram āgamya punar javena
a jvalantam agniṃ tam amitratāpanaḥ
samāstarat patraratho nadībhiḥ
c tataḥ pracakre vapur anyad alpaṃ
praveṣṭukāmo 'gnim abhipraśāmya
 sūta uvāca
a jāmbūnadamayo bhūtvā marīcivikacojjvalaḥ
c praviveśa balāt pakṣī vārivega ivārṇavam
a sa cakraṃ kṣuraparyantam apaśyad amṛtāntike
c paribhramantam aniśaṃ tīkṣṇadhāram ayasmayam
a jvalanārkaprabhaṃ ghoraṃ chedanaṃ somahāriṇām

a adhaś cakrasya caivātra dīptānalasamadyutī

b katham etau mahāvīryau jetavyau haribhojinau
b iti saṃcintya garuḍas tayos tūrṇaṃ nirākaraḥ
c tayor eko 'pi yaṃ paśyet sa tūrṇaṃ bhasmasād bhavet
a tayoś cakṣūṃṣi rajasā suparṇas tūrṇam āvṛṇot
c adṛṣṭarūpas tau cāpi sarvataḥ paryakālayat
a tayor aṅge samākramya vainateyo 'ntarikṣagaḥ
c ācchinat tarasā madhye somam abhyadravat tataḥ
a samutpāṭyāmṛtaṃ tat tu vainateyas tato balī
c utpapāta javenaiva yantram unmathya vīryavān
a apītvaivāmṛtaṃ pakṣī parigṛhyāśu vīryavān
c agacchad apariśrānta āvāryārkaprabhāṃ khagaḥ
a viṣṇunā tu tadākāśe vainateyaḥ sameyivān
c tasya nārāyaṇas tuṣṭas tenālaulyena karmaṇā

c sa vavre tava tiṣṭheyam uparīty antarikṣagaḥ
a uvāca cainaṃ bhūyo 'pi nārāyaṇam idaṃ vacaḥ
c ajaraś cāmaraś ca syām amṛtena vināpy aham
d evam astv iti taṃ viṣṇur uvāca vinatāsutam
a pratigṛhya varau tau ca garuḍo viṣṇum abravīt
c bhavate 'pi varaṃ dadmi vṛṇītāṃ bhagavān api
a taṃ vavre vāhanaṃ kṛṣṇo garutmantaṃ mahābalam
c dhvajaṃ ca cakre bhagavān upari sthāsyasīti tam
d evam astv iti taṃ devam uktvā nārāyaṇaṃ khagaḥ
d vavrāja tarasā vegād vāyuṃ spardhan mahājavaḥ
d tathety evābravīt pakṣī bhagavantaṃ sanātanam
d etasminn eva kāle tu bhagavān harivāhanaḥ
a anupatya khagaṃ tv indro vajreṇāṅge 'bhyatāḍayat
c vihaṃgamaṃ surāmitraṃ harantam amṛtaṃ balāt
a tam uvācendram ākrande garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
c prahasañ ślakṣṇayā vācā tathā vajrasamāhataḥ
a ṛṣer mānaṃ kariṣyāmi vajraṃ yasyāsthisaṃbhavam
c vajrasya ca kariṣyāmi tava caiva śatakrato
a eṣa patraṃ tyajāmy ekaṃ yasyāntaṃ nopalapsyase
b tasyāgrakhaṇḍād abhavan mayūro
b madhye dvivaktrā bhujagendrarājī
b mūle ca śatrur nakulaḥ phaṇīnāṃ
b te vai trayaḥ sarpaviṣāpahāḥ smṛtāḥ
c na hi vajranipātena rujā me 'sti kadā cana
d evam uktvā tataḥ patram utsasarja sa pakṣirāṭ
d tad utsṛṣṭam abhiprekṣya tasya parṇam anuttamam
d ity evam uktvā garuḍaḥ patraṃ caikaṃ vyasarjayat
a tatra taṃ sarvabhūtāni vismitāny abruvaṃs tadā
c surūpaṃ patram ālakṣya suparṇo 'yaṃ bhavatv iti
d tridhā kṛtvā tadā vajraṃ gataṃ sthānaṃ svam eva hi
a dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutaṃ cāpi sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c khago mahad idaṃ bhūtam iti matvābhyabhāṣata
a balaṃ vijñātum icchāmi yat te param anuttamam
c sakhyaṃ cānantam icchāmi tvayā saha khagottama

 garuḍa uvāca
a sakhyaṃ me 'stu tvayā deva yathecchasi puraṃdara
c balaṃ tu mama jānīhi mahac cāsahyam eva ca
a kāmaṃ naitat praśaṃsanti santaḥ svabalasaṃstavam
b animittaṃ suraśreṣṭha sadyaḥ prāpnoti garhaṇām
c guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ cāpi svayam eva śatakrato
c pṛṣṭenānyena gopate 
vaktavyaṃ na tu vaktavyaṃ
a sakheti kṛtvā tu sakhe pṛṣṭo vakṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
c na hy ātmastavasaṃyuktaṃ vaktavyam animittataḥ
a saparvatavanām urvīṃ sasāgaravanām imām

d paraḥ sahasrān parvatān vaheyaṃ kāmayetha cet
 sūta uvāca
a ity uktavacanaṃ vīraṃ kirīṭī śrīmatāṃ varaḥ
c āha śaunaka devendraḥ sarvabhūtahitaḥ prabhuḥ

c na kāryaṃ tava somena mama somaḥ pradīyatām
e asmāṃs te hi prabādheyur yebhyo dadyād bhavān imam
 garuḍa uvāca
a kiṃ cit kāraṇam uddiśya somo 'yaṃ nīyate mayā

 sūta uvāca
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ kadrūputrān anusmaran

a īśo 'ham api sarvasya kariṣyāmi tu te 'rthitām

a tathety uktvānvagacchat taṃ tato dānavasūdanaḥ
b devadevaṃ mahātmānaṃ yoginām īśvaraṃ harim

b idaṃ bhūyo vacaḥ prāha bhagavāṃs tridaśeśvaraḥ

b garuḍaḥ
b vinatā

b ajaraś cāmaraś caiva devānāṃ supriyo bhava

a idam ānītam amṛtaṃ nikṣepsyāmi kuśeṣu vaḥ
c snātā maṅgalasaṃyuktās tataḥ prāśnīta pannagāḥ
d bhavadbhir idam āsīnair yad uktaṃ tad vacas tadā
a adāsī caiva māteyam adyaprabhṛti cāstu me
c yathoktaṃ bhavatām etad vaco me pratipāditam
a tataḥ snātuṃ gatāḥ sarpāḥ pratyuktvā taṃ tathety uta
c śakro 'py amṛtam ākṣipya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
a athāgatās tam uddeśaṃ sarpāḥ somārthinas tadā
c snātāś ca kṛtajapyāś ca prahṛṣṭāḥ kṛtamaṅgalāḥ
d yatraitad amṛtaṃ cāpi sthāpitaṃ kuśasaṃstare
d parasparakṛtadveṣāḥ somaprāśanakarmaṇi
d ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam ity uktvā te samādravan
a tad vijñāya hṛtaṃ sarpāḥ pratimāyākṛtaṃ ca tat
c somasthānam idaṃ ceti darbhāṃs te lilihus tadā
a tato dvaidhīkṛtā jihvā sarpāṇāṃ tena karmaṇā
c abhavaṃś cāmṛtasparśād darbhās te 'tha pavitriṇaḥ
d evaṃ tad amṛtaṃ tena hṛtam āhṛtam eva ca
d dvijihvāś ca kṛtāḥ sarpā garuḍena mahātmanā
d nāgāś ca vañcitā bhūtvā visṛjya vinatāṃ tadā
d viṣādam agamaṃs tīvraṃ garuḍasya balāt prabho
a tataḥ suparṇaḥ paramaprahṛṣṭavān
vihṛtya mātrā saha tatra kānane
c bhujaṃgabhakṣaḥ paramārcitaḥ khagair
ahīnakīrtir vinatām anandayat
a imāṃ kathāṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyān naraḥ sadā
paṭheta vā dvijajanamukhyasaṃsadi
c asaṃśayaṃ tridivam iyāt sa puṇyabhāṅ
mahātmanaḥ patagapateḥ prakīrtanāt
d na cāgnijaṃ coranṛpāśrayaṃ vā
kṣutsarpavetālapiśācajaṃ vā
d bhayaṃ bhaved yatra gṛhe garutmato
tiṣṭhet katheyaṃ likhitāpi pustake
d yaḥ saṃsmaren nityam atandrito naro
garutmato mūrtim athārcayed gṛhe
d oṃ pakṣirājeti japaṃś ca sarvadā
tasyāśu sarpā vaśagā bhavanti
 śaunaka uvāca
a bhujaṃgamānāṃ śāpasya mātrā caiva sutena ca
c vinatāyās tvayā proktaṃ kāraṇaṃ sūtanandana
a varapradānaṃ bhartrā ca kadrūvinatayos tathā
c nāmanī caiva te prokte pakṣiṇor vainateyayoḥ
a pannagānāṃ tu nāmāni na kīrtayasi sūtaja
c prādhānyenāpi nāmāni śrotum icchāmahe vayam
 sūta uvāca
a bahutvān nāmadheyāni bhujagānāṃ tapodhana
c na kīrtayiṣye sarveṣāṃ prādhānyena tu me śṛṇu
a śeṣaḥ prathamato jāto vāsukis tadanantaram
c airāvatas takṣakaś ca karkoṭakadhanaṃjayau
a kāliyo maṇināgaś ca nāgaś cāpūraṇas tathā
c nāgas tathā piñjaraka elāpatro 'tha vāmanaḥ
a nīlānīlau tathā nāgau kalmāṣaśabalau tathā
c āryakaś cādikaś caiva nāgaś ca śalapotakaḥ
a sumanomukho dadhimukhas tathā vimalapiṇḍakaḥ
c āptaḥ koṭanakaś caiva śaṅkho vālaśikhas tathā
a niṣṭhyūnako hemaguho nahuṣaḥ piṅgalas tathā
c bāhyakarṇo hastipadas tathā mudgarapiṇḍakaḥ
a kambalāśvatarau cāpi nāgaḥ kālīyakas tathā
c vṛttasaṃvartakau nāgau dvau ca padmāv iti śrutau
a nāgaḥ śaṅkhanakaś caiva tathā ca sphaṇḍako 'paraḥ
c kṣemakaś ca mahānāgo nāgaḥ piṇḍārakas tathā
d viprasyāvajñayā śakro mātuḥ sarpā vipadgatāḥ
d suparṇas tūbhayaprītyā harer apy upari sthitaḥ
a karavīraḥ puṣpadaṃṣṭra eḷako bilvapāṇḍukaḥ
c mūṣakādaḥ śaṅkhaśirāḥ pūrṇadaṃṣṭro haridrakaḥ
a aparājito jyotikaś ca pannagaḥ śrīvahas tathā
c kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca puṣkaraḥ śalyakas tathā
a virajāś ca subāhuś ca śālipiṇḍaś ca vīryavān
c hastibhadraḥ piṭharako mukharaḥ koṇavāsanaḥ
a kuñjaraḥ kuraraś caiva tathā nāgaḥ prabhākaraḥ
c kumudaḥ kumudākṣaś ca tittirir halikas tathā
d sumukho vimukhaś caiva vimukho 'simukhas tathā
d kardamaś ca mahānāgo nāgaś ca bahumūlakaḥ
e karkarākarkarau cobhau kuṇḍodaramahodarau
a ete prādhānyato nāgāḥ kīrtitā dvijasattama
c bahutvān nāmadheyānām itare na prakīrtitāḥ
a eteṣāṃ prasavo yaś ca prasavasya ca saṃtatiḥ
c asaṃkhyeyeti matvā tān na bravīmi dvijottama
a bahūnīha sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
c aśakyāny eva saṃkhyātuṃ bhujagānāṃ tapodhana
 śaunaka uvāca
a jātā vai bhujagās tāta vīryavanto durāsadāḥ

d kiṃ vā kāryam akurvanta śāpajaṃ bhujagottamāḥ
d vāsukiś cāpi nāgendro mahāprājñaḥ kim ācarat
 sūta uvāca
a teṣāṃ tu bhagavāñ śeṣas tyaktvā kadrūṃ mahāyaśāḥ
c tapo vipulam ātasthe vāyubhakṣo yatavrataḥ
a gandhamādanam āsādya badaryāṃ ca taporataḥ
c gokarṇe puṣkarāraṇye tathā himavatas taṭe
a teṣu teṣu ca puṇyeṣu tīrtheṣv āyataneṣu ca
c ekāntaśīlī niyataḥ satataṃ vijitendriyaḥ
d śītavātātapasahaḥ parityaktapriyāpriyaḥ
d dharme manaḥ samādhāya snāne triṣavaṇe tathā
a tapyamānaṃ tapo ghoraṃ taṃ dadarśa pitāmahaḥ
c pariśuṣkamāṃsatvaksnāyuṃ jaṭācīradharaṃ prabhum
a tam abravīt satyadhṛtiṃ tapyamānaṃ pitāmahaḥ
c kim idaṃ kuruṣe śeṣa prajānāṃ svasti vai kuru

a sodaryā mama sarve hi bhrātaro mandacetasaḥ

a abhyasūyanti satataṃ parasparam amitravat

a jānāmi śeṣa sarveṣāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ te viceṣṭitam

 sūta uvāca
a adho bhūmer vasaty evaṃ nāgo 'nantaḥ pratāpavān

d abhyaṣicyata nāgais tu daivatair iva vāsavaḥ
 sūta uvāca
a mātuḥ sakāśāt taṃ śāpaṃ śrutvā pannagasattamaḥ

a tataḥ sa mantrayām āsa bhrātṛbhiḥ saha sarvaśaḥ
c airāvataprabhṛtibhir ye sma dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
 vāsukir uvāca
a ayaṃ śāpo yathoddiṣṭo viditaṃ vas tathānaghāḥ
c tasya śāpasya mokṣārthaṃ mantrayitvā yatāmahe
