 arjuna uvāca
a atha vā manyase bhāraṃ tvam imaṃ rākṣasaṃ yudhi
c karomi tava sāhāyyaṃ śīghram eva nihanyatām
a atha vāpy aham evainaṃ haniṣyāmi vṛkodara
c kṛtakarmā pariśrāntaḥ sādhu tāvad upārama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhīmaseno 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
c niṣpiṣyainaṃ balād bhūmau paśumāram amārayat
d athainam ākṣipya balāt paśuvac cāpy amārayat
a sa māryamāṇo bhīmena nanāda vipulaṃ svanam
c pūrayaṃs tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ jalārdra iva dundubhiḥ
a bhujābhyāṃ yoktrayitvā taṃ balavān pāṇḍunandanaḥ
b samudbhrāmya śiraś cāsya sagrīvaṃ tad udāvahat
b madhye bhittvā śiraś cāsya sugrīvaṃ tad upākṣipat
b tasya niṣkarṇanayanaṃ nirjihvaṃ rudhirokṣitam
b praviddhaṃ bhīmasenena śiro vidaśanaṃ babhau
b prasāritabhujoddhṛṣṭo bhinnamāṃsatvagantaraḥ
b kabandhabhūtas tatrāsīd adrir vajrahato yathā
c madhye bhaṅktvā sa balavān harṣayām āsa pāṇḍavān
a hiḍimbaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃhṛṣṭās te tarasvinaḥ
b hiḍimbā caiva saṃprekṣya nihataṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
b adṛśyāś caiva ye svasthāḥ sametā bhūtavādikāḥ
b pūjayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti pāṇḍavam
b bhrātaraś cāpi saṃhṛṣṭā yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥ
c apūjayan naravyāghraṃ bhīmasenam ariṃdamam
a abhipūjya mahātmānaṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam
c punar evārjuno vākyam uvācedaṃ vṛkodaram
a nadūre nagaraṃ manye vanād asmād ahaṃ prabho
c śīghraṃ gacchāma bhadraṃ te na no vidyāt suyodhanaḥ
a tataḥ sarve tathety uktvā saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
c prayayuḥ puruṣavyāghrā hiḍimbā caiva rākṣasī
 vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
 sā tato nyapatat tūrṇaṃ bhaginī tasya rakṣasaḥ
 abruvāṇā hiḍimbā tu rākṣasī pāṇḍavān prati
 abhivādya tataḥ kuntīṃ dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
 abhipūjya ca tān sarvān bhīmasenam abhāṣata
 ahaṃ te darśanād eva manmathasya vaśaṃ gatā
 krūraṃ bhrātṛvaco hitvā sā tvām evānurundhatī
 rākṣase raudrasaṃkāśe tavāpaśyaṃ viceṣṭitam
 ahaṃ śuśrūṣur iccheyaṃ tava gātraṃ niṣevitum
 bhīma uvāca
a smaranti vairaṃ rakṣāṃsi māyām āśritya mohinīm
c hiḍimbe vraja panthānaṃ tvaṃ vai bhrātṛniṣevitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kruddho 'pi puruṣavyāghra bhīma mā sma striyaṃ vadhīḥ
c śarīraguptyābhyadhikaṃ dharmaṃ gopaya pāṇḍava
d śaraṇāgatagūhyā tvaṃ dharmaṃ gopāya pāṇḍava
a vadhābhiprāyam āyāntam avadhīs tvaṃ mahābalam
c rakṣasas tasya bhaginī kiṃ naḥ kruddhā kariṣyati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a hiḍimbā tu tataḥ kuntīm abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kaunteyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a ārye jānāsi yad duḥkham iha strīṇām anaṅgajam
c tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ bhīmasenakṛtaṃ śubhe
a soḍhaṃ tat paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ mayā kālapratīkṣayā
c so 'yam abhyāgataḥ kālo bhavitā me sukhāya vai
a mayā hy utsṛjya suhṛdaḥ svadharmaṃ svajanaṃ tathā
c vṛto 'yaṃ puruṣavyāghras tava putraḥ patiḥ śubhe
a vareṇāpi tathānena tvayā cāpi yaśasvini
b tad arhasi kṛpāṃ kartuṃ mayi tvaṃ varavarṇini
c tathā bruvantī hi tadā pratyākhyātā kriyāṃ prati
d bhūmyāṃ duṣkṛtino lokān gamiṣye 'haṃ na saṃśayaḥ
a tvaṃ māṃ mūḍheti vā matvā bhaktā vānugateti vā
c bhartrānena mahābhāge saṃyojaya sutena te
a tam upādāya gaccheyaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ devarūpiṇam
c punaś caivāgamiṣyāmi viśrambhaṃ kuru me śubhe
d ahaṃ hi samaye lipse prāg bhrātur apavarjanāt
d tataḥ so 'bhyapatad rātrau bhīmasenajighāṃsayā
d yathā yathā vikramate yathā ramati tiṣṭhati
d tathā tathā samādhāya pāṇḍavaṃ kāmamohitā
d na yātudhāny ahaṃ tv ārye na cāsmi rajanīcarī
d īśā rakṣaḥsu sādhvy asmi rājñī sālakaṭaṅkaṭī
d putreṇa tava saṃyuktā yuvatir devavarṇinī
d sarvān vo 'ham upasthāsye puraskṛtya vṛkodaram
d apramattā pramatteṣu śuśrūṣur anahaṃvadā
a ahaṃ hi manasā dhyātā sarvān neṣyāmi vaḥ sadā
c vṛjine tārayiṣyāmi durgeṣu ca nararṣabhān
a pṛṣṭhena vo vahiṣyāmi śīghrāṃ gatim abhīpsataḥ
c yūyaṃ prasādaṃ kuruta bhīmaseno bhajeta mām
d uvāca sā tadā kuntī hiḍimbāṃ nāma rākṣasīm
a āpadas taraṇe prāṇān dhārayed yena yena hi
c sarvam ādṛtya kartavyaṃ tad dharmam anuvartatā
a āpatsu yo dhārayati dharmaṃ dharmavid uttamaḥ
c vyasanaṃ hy eva dharmasya dharmiṇām āpad ucyate
a puṇyaṃ prāṇān dhārayati puṇyaṃ prāṇadam ucyate
c yena yenācared dharmaṃ tasmin garhā na vidyate
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d mahato 'tra striyaṃ kāmād bādhitāṃ trāhi mām api
d dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ
d taṃ tu dharmam iti prāhur munayo dharmavatsalāḥ
d divyajñānena paśyāmi atītānāgatān aham
d tasmād vakṣyāmi vaḥ śreya āsannaṃ sara uttamam
d adyāsādya saraḥ snātvā viśramya ca vanaspatau
d śvaḥ prabhāte mahad bhūtaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ jagatpatim
d vyāsaṃ kamalapatrākṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyatha
d dhṛtarāṣṭrād vivāsaś ca dahanaṃ vāraṇāvate
d trāṇaṃ ca vidurāt tubhyaṃ viditaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
d āvāse śālihotrasya sa vo vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
d varṣavātātapasahaḥ ayaṃ puṇyo vanaspatiḥ
d pītamātre tu pānīye kṣutpipāse vinaśyataḥ
d tapasā śālihotreṇa saro vṛkṣaś ca nirmitaḥ
d kādambāḥ sārasā haṃsāḥ kuraryaḥ kuraraiḥ saha
d ruvanti madhuraṃ gītaṃ gāndharvasvanamiśritam
d tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuntī vacanam abravīt
d yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mahāprājñaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
d tvaṃ hi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha mayoktaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
d rākṣasy eṣā hi vākyena dharmaṃ vadati sādhu vai
d bhāvena duṣṭā bhīmaṃ sā kiṃ kariṣyati rākṣasī
d bhajatāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ vīram apatyārthaṃ yadīcchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ hiḍimbe nātra saṃśayaḥ
c sthātavyaṃ tu tvayā dharme yathā brūyāṃ sumadhyame
d nityaṃ kṛtāhnikā snātvā kṛtaśaucā surūpiṇī
a snātaṃ kṛtāhnikaṃ bhadre kṛtakautukamaṅgalam
c bhīmasenaṃ bhajethās tvaṃ prāg astagamanād raveḥ
a ahaḥsu viharānena yathākāmaṃ manojavā
c ayaṃ tv ānayitavyas te bhīmasenaḥ sadā niśi
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d prāk saṃdhyāto vimoktavyo rakṣitavyaś ca nityaśaḥ
d evaṃ ramasva bhīmena yāvad garbhasya vedanam
d eṣa te samayo bhadre śuśrūṣyaś cāpramattayā
d nityānukūlayā bhūtvā kartavyaṃ śobhanaṃ tvayā
d yudhiṣṭhireṇaivam uktā kuntyā cāṅke 'dhiropitā
d bhīmārjunāntaragatā yamābhyāṃ ca puraskṛtā
d tiryag yudhiṣṭhire yāti hiḍimbā bhīmagāminī
d śālihotrasaro ramyam āsedus te jalārthinaḥ
d tat tatheti pratijñāya hiḍimbā rākṣasī tadā
d vanaspatitalaṃ gatvā parimṛjya gṛhaṃ yathā
d pāṇḍavānāṃ ca vāsaṃ sā kṛtvā parṇamayaṃ tathā
d ātmanaś ca tathā kuntyā ekoddeśe cakāra sā
d pāṇḍavās tu tataḥ snātvā śuddhāḥ saṃdhyām upāsya ca
d tṛṣitāḥ kṣutpipāsārtā jalamātreṇa vartayan
d śālihotras tadā jñātvā kṣudhārtān pāṇḍavāṃs tadā
d manasā cintayām āsa pānīyaṃ bhojanaṃ mahat
d tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve viśrāntāḥ pṛthayā saha
d yathā jatugṛhe vṛttaṃ rākṣasena kṛtaṃ ca yat
d kṛtvā kathā bahuvidhāḥ kathānte pāṇḍunandanam
d kuntī rājasutā vākyaṃ bhīmasenam athābravīt
d yathā pāṇḍus tathā mānyas tava jyeṣṭho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d ahaṃ dharmavidhānena mānyā gurutarī tava
d tasmāt pāṇḍuhitārthaṃ me yuvarāja hitaṃ kuru
d nikṛtā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa pāpenākṛtabuddhinā
d duṣkṛtasya pratīkāraṃ na paśyāmi vṛkodara
d tasmāt katipayāhena yogakṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati
d kṣemaṃ durgam imaṃ vāsaṃ vasiṣyāmo yathāsukham
d idam adya mahad duḥkhaṃ dharmakṛcchraṃ vṛkodara
d dṛṣṭvaiva tvāṃ mahāprājña anaṅgenābhicoditā
d yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca māṃ caiva varayām āsa dharmataḥ
d dharmārthaṃ dehi putraṃ tvaṃ sa naḥ śreyaḥ kariṣyati
d prativākyaṃ tu necchāmi hy āvābhyāṃ vacanaṃ kuru
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatheti tat pratijñāya hiḍimbā rākṣasī tadā
a         bhīmaseno 'bravīd idam
b śāsanaṃ te kariṣyāmi devaśāsanam ity api
b samakṣaṃ bhrātṛmadhye tu bhīmaseno 'bravīd idam
b śṛṇu rākṣasi satyena samayaṃ te vadāmy aham
b yāvatkālena bhavati putrasyotpādanaṃ śubhe
b tāvatkālaṃ gamiṣyāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
b viśeṣato matsakāśe mā prakāśaya nīcatām
b uttamastrīguṇopetā bhajethā varavarṇini
b gatāhani niveśeṣu bhojyaṃ rājārham ānayat
b sā kadā cid vihārārthaṃ hiḍimbā kāmacāriṇī
c bhīmasenam upādāya ūrdhvam ācakrame tataḥ
a śailaśṛṅgeṣu ramyeṣu devatāyataneṣu ca
c mṛgapakṣivighuṣṭeṣu ramaṇīyeṣu sarvadā
a kṛtvā ca paramaṃ rūpaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā
c saṃjalpantī sumadhuraṃ ramayām āsa pāṇḍavam
a tathaiva vanadurgeṣu puṣpitadrumasānuṣu
c saraḥsu ramaṇīyeṣu padmotpalayuteṣu ca
a nadīdvīpapradeśeṣu vaiḍūryasikatāsu ca
c sutīrthavanatoyāsu tathā girinadīṣu ca
d kānaneṣu vicitreṣu puṣpitadrumavalliṣu
d himavadgirikuñjeṣu guhāsu vividhāsu ca
d praphullaśatapatreṣu saraḥsv amalavāriṣu
a sagarasya pradeśeṣu maṇihemaciteṣu ca
c pattaneṣu ca ramyeṣu mahāśālavaneṣu ca
a devāraṇyeṣu puṇyeṣu tathā parvatasānuṣu
c guhyakānāṃ nivāseṣu tāpasāyataneṣu ca
a sarvartuphalapuṣpeṣu mānaseṣu saraḥsu ca
c bibhratī paramaṃ rūpaṃ ramayām āsa pāṇḍavam
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d gate bhagavati vyāse pāṇḍavā vigatajvarāḥ
d ūṣus tatra ca ṣaṇmāsān vaṭavṛkṣe yathāsukham
d śākamūlaphalāhārās tapaḥ kurvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d anujñātā mahārāja tataḥ kamalapālikā
d yathā ca sukṛtī svarge modate 'psarasā saha
d sa tathā paramaprītas tayā reme mahādyutiḥ
d śubhaṃ hi jaghanaṃ tasyāḥ suvarṇamaṇimekhalam
d na tatarpa mudā mṛdnan bhīmaseno muhur muhuḥ
d ramayantī tato bhīmaṃ tatra tatra manojavā
d sā reme tena saṃharṣād atṛpyantī muhur muhuḥ
d ahaḥsu vicarantī sā niśākāleṣu pāṇḍavam
d ānīya vai svake gehe darśayām āsa mātaram
d bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito nityaṃ svapate pāṇḍavas tadā
d kuntyāḥ paricarantī sā tasyāḥ pārśve 'vasan niśām
d kāmāṃś ca mukhavāsādīn ānayiṣyati bhojanam
d tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām ājagāma mahāvrataḥ
d pārāśaryo mahāprājño divyadarśī mahātapāḥ
d te 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ tadā
d tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sasnuṣā caiva mādhavī
a ramayantī tathā bhīmaṃ tatra tatra manojavā
b divyābharaṇavastrāṅgī divyasraganulepanā
b evaṃ bhrātṝn sapta māsān hiḍimbāvāsayad vane
b pāṇḍavān bhīmasenārthaṃ rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
b sukhaṃ sa viharan bhīmas tatkālaṃ paryaṇāmayat
b tato 'labhata sā garbhaṃ rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
b atṛptā bhīmasenena saptamāsopasaṃgatā
c prajajñe rākṣasī putraṃ bhīmasenān mahābalam
a virūpākṣaṃ mahāvaktraṃ śaṅkukarṇaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
c bhīmarūpaṃ sutāmroṣṭhaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ mahābalam
a maheṣvāsaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahāsattvaṃ mahābhujam
c mahājavaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahāmāyam ariṃdamam
d dīrghaghoṇaṃ mahoraskaṃ vikaṭodbaddhapiṇḍikam
a amānuṣaṃ mānuṣajaṃ bhīmavegaṃ mahābalam
c yaḥ piśācān atīvānyān babhūvāti sa mānuṣān
a bālo 'pi yauvanaṃ prāpto mānuṣeṣu viśāṃ pate
c sarvāstreṣu paraṃ vīraḥ prakarṣam agamad balī
a sadyo hi garbhaṃ rākṣasyo labhante prasavanti ca
c kāmarūpadharāś caiva bhavanti bahurūpiṇaḥ
a praṇamya vikacaḥ pādāv agṛhṇāt sa pitus tadā
c mātuś ca parameṣvāsas tau ca nāmāsya cakratuḥ
a ghaṭabhāsotkaca iti mātaraṃ so 'bhyabhāṣata
c abhavat tena nāmāsya ghaṭotkaca iti sma ha
a anuraktaś ca tān āsīt pāṇḍavān sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
b vikīrṇakeśo ghaṭate pitror agre yatas tataḥ
b purataḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca tena cāsau ghaṭotkacaḥ
c teṣāṃ ca dayito nityam ātmabhūto babhūva saḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d ghaṭotkaco mahākāyaḥ pāṇḍavān pṛthayā saha
d abhivādya yathānyāyam abravīc ca prabhāṣya tān
d kiṃ karomy aham āryāṇāṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ vadatānaghāḥ
d taṃ bruvantaṃ bhaimaseniṃ kuntī vacanam abravīt
d tvaṃ kurūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād bhīmasamo hy asi
d jyeṣṭhaḥ putro 'si pañcānāṃ sāhāyyaṃ kuru putraka
d pṛthayāpy evam uktas tu praṇamyedaṃ vaco 'bravīt
d yathā hi rāvaṇo loke indrajid vā mahābalaḥ
d varṣmavīryasamo loke viśiṣṭaś cābhavaṃ nṛṣu
a saṃvāsasamayo jīrṇa ity abhāṣata taṃ tataḥ
b hiḍimbā
b punar drakṣyasi rājyasthān ity abhāṣata tāṃ tadā
b yadā me tvaṃ smareḥ kānta riraṃsū rahasi prabho
b tadā tava vaśaṃ bhūya āgantāsmy āśu bhārata
b ity uktvā sā jagāmāśu bhāvam āsajya pāṇḍave
c hiḍimbā samayaṃ kṛtvā svāṃ gatiṃ pratyapadyata
d tatas tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve śālihotrāśrame tadā
d pūjitās tena vanyena tam āmantrya mahāmunim
a kṛtyakāla upasthāsye pitṝn iti ghaṭotkacaḥ
a         bhavatsmaraṇamātrataḥ
a mahatkṛcchre vane durge        
c āmantrya rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ pratasthe cottarāṃ diśam
a sa hi sṛṣṭo maghavatā śaktihetor mahātmanā
c karṇasyāprativīryasya vināśāya mahātmanaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a te vanena vanaṃ vīrā ghnanto mṛgagaṇān bahūn
c apakramya yayū rājaṃs tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
a matsyāṃs trigartān pāñcālān kīcakān antareṇa ca
c ramaṇīyān vanoddeśān prekṣamāṇāḥ sarāṃsi ca
a jaṭāḥ kṛtvātmanaḥ sarve valkalājinavāsasaḥ
c saha kuntyā mahātmāno bibhratas tāpasaṃ vapuḥ
a kva cid vahanto jananīṃ tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
b nityakarma prakurvanto vanyamūlaphalāśanāḥ
c kva cic chandena gacchantas te jagmuḥ prasabhaṃ punaḥ
d pathi dvaipāyanaṃ sarve dadṛśuḥ svaṃ pitāmaham
a brāhmaṃ vedam adhīyānā vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
c nītiśāstraṃ ca dharmajñā dadṛśus te pitāmaham
d śālihotraprasādena labdhvā prītim avāpya ca
a te 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ tadā
c tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
d vyāsaḥ
d tadāśramān nirgamanaṃ mayā jñātaṃ nararṣabhāḥ
d ghaṭotkacasya cotpattiṃ jñātvā prītir avardhata
 vyāsa uvāca
a mayedaṃ manasā pūrvaṃ viditaṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
c yathā sthitair adharmeṇa dhārtarāṣṭrair vivāsitāḥ
d vivāsitāś ca mātrā vai pāpair durmantraṇaiḥ sadā
a tad viditvāsmi saṃprāptaś cikīrṣuḥ paramaṃ hitam
c na viṣādo 'tra kartavyaḥ sarvam etat sukhāya vaḥ
d suhṛdviyogajaṃ karma purā kṛtam ariṃdamāḥ
d tasya siddhir iyaṃ prāptā mā śocata paraṃtapāḥ
d samāpte duṣkṛte caiva yūyaṃ caiva na saṃśayaḥ
d svarāṣṭre vihariṣyanto bhaviṣyatha sabāndhavāḥ
a samās te caiva me sarve yūyaṃ caiva na saṃśayaḥ
c dīnato bālataś caiva snehaṃ kurvanti bāndhavāḥ
a tasmād abhyadhikaḥ sneho yuṣmāsu mama sāṃpratam
c snehapūrvaṃ cikīrṣāmi hitaṃ vas tan nibodhata
a idaṃ nagaram abhyāśe ramaṇīyaṃ nirāmayam
c vasateha praticchannā mamāgamanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
d etad vai śālihotrasya tapasā nirmitaṃ saraḥ
d ramaṇīyam idaṃ toyaṃ kṣutpipāsāśramāpaham
d kāryārthinas tu ṣaṇmāsaṃ viharadhvaṃ yathāsukham
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ sa tān samāśvāsya vyāsaḥ pārthān ariṃdamān
c ekacakrām abhigataḥ kuntīm āśvāsayat prabhuḥ
d snuṣe mā roda mā rodety evaṃ vyāso 'bravīd vacaḥ
d punar eva ca dharmātmā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
d vyāsaḥ
d kuryān na kevalaṃ dharmaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tathā naraḥ
d sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ loke na kartā nāsti śobhane
d avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ vai puṇyapāpayoḥ
d duṣkṛtasya phalenaivaṃ prāptaṃ vyasanam uttamam
d tasmān mādhavi mānārhe mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
a jīvaputri sutas te 'yaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c pṛthivyāṃ pārthivān sarvān praśāsiṣyati dharmarāṭ
a dharmeṇa jitvā pṛthivīm akhilāṃ dharmavid vaśī
b pṛthivīm akhilāṃ jitvā sarvāṃ sāgaramekhalām
b sthāpayitvā vaśe sarvāṃ saparvatavanāṃ śubhām
c bhīmasenārjunabalād bhokṣyaty ayam asaṃśayaḥ
a putrās tava ca mādryāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ
c svarāṣṭre vihariṣyanti sukhaṃ sumanasas tadā
a yakṣyanti ca naravyāghrā vijitya pṛthivīm imām
c rājasūyāśvamedhādyaiḥ kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
a anugṛhya suhṛdvargaṃ dhanena ca sukhena ca
c pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam iha bhokṣyanti te sutāḥ
d snuṣā kamalapatrākṣī nāmnā kamalapālikā
d vaśavartinī tu bhīmasya putram eṣā janiṣyati
d tena putreṇa kṛcchreṣu bhaviṣyatha ca tāritāḥ
a evam uktvā niveśyainān brāhmaṇasya niveśane
c abravīt pārthivaśreṣṭham ṛṣir dvaipāyanas tadā
a iha māṃ saṃpratīkṣadhvam āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
c deśakālau viditvaiva vetsyadhvaṃ paramāṃ mudam
a sa taiḥ prāñjalibhiḥ sarvais tathety ukto narādhipa
c jagāma bhagavān vyāso yathākāmam ṛṣiḥ prabhuḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a ekacakrāṃ gatās te tu kuntīputrā mahārathāḥ
c ataḥ paraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha kim akurvata pāṇḍavāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ekacakrāṃ gatās te tu kuntīputrā mahārathāḥ
c ūṣur nāticiraṃ kālaṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane
a ramaṇīyāni paśyanto vanāni vividhāni ca
c pārthivān api coddeśān saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
a cerur bhaikṣaṃ tadā te tu sarva eva viśāṃ pate
b yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca kuntīṃ ca cintayanta upāsate
b bhaikṣaṃ carantas tu sadā jaṭilā brahmacāriṇaḥ
c babhūvur nāgarāṇāṃ ca svair guṇaiḥ priyadarśanāḥ
d nāgarāḥ
d darśanīyā dvijāḥ śuddhā devagarbhopamāḥ śubhāḥ
d bhaikṣārhā na ca rājyārhāḥ sukumārās tapasvinaḥ
d sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā bhaikṣaṃ nārhanti nityaśaḥ
d kāryārthinaś carantīti tarkayanta iti bruvan
d bandhūnām āgamān nityam upacintya tu nāgarāḥ
d bhojanāni ca pūrṇāni bhakṣyabhojyair akārayan
d maunavratena saṃyuktā bhaikṣaṃ gṛhṇanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d mātā ciragatān dṛṣṭvā śocantīti ca pāṇḍavāḥ
d tvaramāṇā nivartante mātṛgauravayantritāḥ
d naite yathārthato viprāḥ sukumārās tapasvinaḥ
d caranti bhūmau pracchannāḥ kasmāc cit kāraṇād iha
d duḥkhāśrupūrṇanayanā likhantyās te mahītalam
d bhikṣitvā dvijageheṣu cintayantaś ca mātaram
a nivedayanti sma ca te bhaikṣaṃ kuntyāḥ sadā niśi
b sarvasaṃpūrṇabhaikṣānnaṃ mātrā dattaṃ pṛthak pṛthak
c tayā vibhaktān bhāgāṃs te bhuñjate sma pṛthak pṛthak
a ardhaṃ te bhuñjate vīrāḥ saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
c ardhaṃ bhaikṣasya sarvasya bhīmo bhuṅkte mahābalaḥ
d na cāśito 'sau bhavati kalyāṇānnabhṛtaḥ purā
d sa vaivarṇyaṃ ca kārśyaṃ ca jagāmātṛptikāritam
d ājyabindur yathā vahnau mahati jvalite yathā
d tathārdhabhāgaṃ bhīmasya bhikṣānnasya nṛpottama
a tathā tu teṣāṃ vasatāṃ tatra rājan mahātmanām
c aticakrāma sumahān kālo 'tha bharatarṣabha
d bhīmo 'pi krīḍayitvā tu mitho brāhmaṇabandhuṣu
d kumbhakāreṇa saṃbandhaṃ lebhe pātraṃ bṛhat tadā
d sa dadāti mahat pātraṃ bhīmāya prahasann iva
d tasyādbhutaṃ karma kṛtvā mahan mṛdbhāram ādade
d tasya bhāraḥ śataguṇaḥ kumbhakāram atoṣayat
d cakre cakre ca mṛdbhāṇḍān satataṃ bhaikṣam āharan
d tad ādāya gataṃ dṛṣṭvā hasanti prahasanti ca
d bhakṣyabhojyāni vividhāny ādāya prakṣipanti ca
d evam eṣa sadā bhuktvā mātre vadati vai rahaḥ
d kumbhakāro 'dadāt pātraṃ mahat kṛtvā tu pātrakam
d prahasan bhīmasenāya vismitas tasya karmaṇā
d iti pṛṣṭaḥ sadā pauraiḥ kṣudhitaḥ kila pāṇḍavaḥ
a tataḥ kadā cid bhaikṣāya gatās te bharatarṣabhāḥ
c saṃgatyā bhīmasenas tu tatrāste pṛthayā saha
a athārtijaṃ mahāśabdaṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane
c bhṛśam utpatitaṃ ghoraṃ kuntī śuśrāva bhārata
a rorūyamāṇāṃs tān sarvān paridevayataś ca sā
c kāruṇyāt sādhubhāvāc ca devī rājan na cakṣame
a mathyamāneva duḥkhena hṛdayena pṛthā tataḥ
c uvāca bhīmaṃ kalyāṇī kṛpānvitam idaṃ vacaḥ
a vasāmaḥ susukhaṃ putra brāhmaṇasya niveśane
c ajñātā dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ satkṛtā vītamanyavaḥ
a sā cintaye sadā putra brāhmaṇasyāsya kiṃ nv aham
c priyaṃ kuryām iti gṛhe yat kuryur uṣitāḥ sukham
a etāvān puruṣas tāta kṛtaṃ yasmin na naśyati
c yāvac ca kuryād anyo 'sya kuryād abhyadhikaṃ tataḥ
a tad idaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsya duḥkham āpatitaṃ dhruvam
c tatrāsya yadi sāhāyyaṃ kuryāma sukṛtaṃ bhavet
 bhīma uvāca
a jñāyatām asya yad duḥkhaṃ yataś caiva samutthitam
c vidite vyavasiṣyāmi yady api syāt suduṣkaram
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tathā hi kathayantau tau bhūyaḥ śuśruvatuḥ svanam
c ārtijaṃ tasya viprasya sabhāryasya viśāṃ pate
a antaḥpuraṃ tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
c viveśa kuntī tvaritā baddhavatseva saurabhī
a tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tatra bhāryayā ca sutena ca
c duhitrā caiva sahitaṃ dadarśa vikṛtānanam
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a dhig idaṃ jīvitaṃ loke 'nalasāram anarthakam
c duḥkhamūlaṃ parādhīnaṃ bhṛśam apriyabhāgi ca
a jīvite paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite paramo jvaraḥ
c jīvite vartamānasya dvandvānām āgamo dhruvaḥ
a ekātmāpi hi dharmārthau kāmaṃ ca na niṣevate
c etaiś ca viprayogo 'pi duḥkhaṃ paramakaṃ matam
a āhuḥ ke cit paraṃ mokṣaṃ sa ca nāsti kathaṃ cana
c arthaprāptau ca narakaḥ kṛtsna evopapadyate
a arthepsutā paraṃ duḥkham arthaprāptau tato 'dhikam
c jātasnehasya cārtheṣu viprayoge mahattaram
d yāvanto yasya saṃyogā dravyair iṣṭair bhavanty uta
d tāvanto 'sya nikhanyante hṛdaye śokaśaṅkavaḥ
d tad idaṃ jīvitaṃ prāpya svalpakālaṃ mahābhayam
d tyāgo 'py ayaṃ mahān prāpto bhāryayā sahitena ca
a na hi yogaṃ prapaśyāmi yena mucyeyam āpadaḥ
c putradāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ prādraveyām anāmayam
a yatitaṃ vai mayā pūrvaṃ yathā tvaṃ vettha brāhmaṇi
c yataḥ kṣemaṃ tato gantuṃ tvayā tu mama na śrutam
a iha jātā vivṛddhāsmi pitā ceha mameti ca
c uktavaty asi durmedhe yācyamānā mayāsakṛt
a svargato hi pitā vṛddhas tathā mātā ciraṃ tava
c bāndhavā bhūtapūrvāś ca tatra vāse tu kā ratiḥ
d na bhojanaṃ viruddhaṃ syān na strī deśo nibandhanam
d sudūram api kāryārthe vrajed garuḍahaṃsavat
a so 'yaṃ te bandhukāmāyā aśṛṇvantyā vaco mama
c bandhupraṇāśaḥ saṃprāpto bhṛśaṃ duḥkhakaro mama
d upasthitaṃ tu kalyāṇi yatheṣṭam anubhūyatām
d brāhmaṇī
d mām eva preṣaya tvaṃ tu bakāya karam adya vai
d dvijaḥ
d tyāgo 'yaṃ mama saṃprāpto mama vā me sutasya vā
d tava vā tava putryāś ca atra vāsasya tat phalam
d na śṛṇoṣi vaco mahyaṃ tat phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhāmini
d athavāhaṃ na śakṣyāmi svayaṃ martuṃ sutaṃ mama
d evaṃ tyaktuṃ na śaknomi bhavatīṃ na sutām api
a athavā madvināśo 'yaṃ na hi śakṣyāmi kaṃ cana
c parityaktum ahaṃ bandhuṃ svayaṃ jīvan nṛśaṃsavat
a sahadharmacarīṃ dāntāṃ nityaṃ mātṛsamāṃ mama
c sakhāyaṃ vihitāṃ devair nityaṃ paramikāṃ gatim
a mātrā pitrā ca vihitāṃ sadā gārhasthyabhāginīm
c varayitvā yathānyāyaṃ mantravat pariṇīya ca
a kulīnāṃ śīlasaṃpannām apatyajananīṃ mama
c tvām ahaṃ jīvitasyārthe sādhvīm anapakāriṇīm
e parityaktuṃ na śakṣyāmi bhāryāṃ nityam anuvratām
a kuta eva parityaktuṃ sutāṃ śakṣyāmy ahaṃ svayam
c bālām aprāptavayasam ajātavyañjanākṛtim
d sutāṃ caināṃ na śakṣyāmi parityaktuṃ kathaṃ cana
d prārthaye 'haṃ parāṃ prītiṃ yasmin svargaphalāni ca
d dayitaṃ me kathaṃ bālam ahaṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
d yasya jātasya pitaro mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā divaṃ gatāḥ
d pitṝṇām ṛṇanirmukto yasya jātasya tejasā
d tam ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaputraṃ me kulanistārakaṃ bhuvi
d mama piṇḍodakanidhiṃ kathaṃ tyakṣyāmi putrakam
d kuta eva parityaktuṃ putrīṃ śakṣyāmy ahaṃ svayam
a bhartur arthāya nikṣiptāṃ nyāsaṃ dhātrā mahātmanā
c yasyāṃ dauhitrajāṃl lokān āśaṃse pitṛbhiḥ saha
e svayam utpādya tāṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
a manyante ke cid adhikaṃ snehaṃ putre pitur narāḥ
c kanyāyāṃ naiva tu punar mama tulyāv ubhau matau
a yasmiṃl lokāḥ prasūtiś ca sthitā nityam atho sukham
c apāpāṃ tām ahaṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
d medhāvinīm adoṣāṃ ca śuśrūṣum anahaṃkṛtām
d tām imāṃ me sutāṃ bālāṃ katham utsraṣṭum utsahe
d kāṅkṣamāṇāṃ ratiṃ caiva sukhāni ca bahūny api
d utpādayanty apatyāni dharmakāmārthahetave
a ātmānam api cotsṛjya tapsye pretavaśaṃ gataḥ
b svayaṃ ca na parityaktuṃ śaknomy etān ahaṃ yathā
c tyaktā hy ete mayā vyaktaṃ neha śakṣyanti jīvitum
a eṣāṃ cānyatamatyāgo nṛśaṃso garhito budhaiḥ
c ātmatyāge kṛte ceme mariṣyanti mayā vinā
a sa kṛcchrām aham āpanno na śaktas tartum āpadam
c aho dhik kāṃ gatiṃ tv adya gamiṣyāmi sabāndhavaḥ
e sarvaiḥ saha mṛtaṃ śreyo na tu me jīvitaṃ kṣamam
 brāhmaṇy uvāca
a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ prākṛteneva karhi cit
c na hi saṃtāpakālo 'yaṃ vaidyasya tava vidyate
a avaśyaṃ nidhanaṃ sarvair gantavyam iha mānavaiḥ
c avaśyabhāviny arthe vai saṃtāpo neha vidyate
a bhāryā putro 'tha duhitā sarvam ātmārtham iṣyate
c vyathāṃ jahi subuddhyā tvaṃ svayaṃ yāsyāmi tatra vai
a etad dhi paramaṃ nāryāḥ kāryaṃ loke sanātanam
c prāṇān api parityajya yad bhartṛhitam ācaret
a tac ca tatra kṛtaṃ karma tavāpīha sukhāvaham
c bhavaty amutra cākṣayyaṃ loke 'smiṃś ca yaśaskaram
a eṣa caiva gurur dharmo yaṃ pravakṣāmy ahaṃ tava
c arthaś ca tava dharmaś ca bhūyān atra pradṛśyate
a yadartham iṣyate bhāryā prāptaḥ so 'rthas tvayā mayi
c kanyā caiva kumāraś ca kṛtāham anṛṇā tvayā
a samarthaḥ poṣaṇe cāsi sutayo rakṣaṇe tathā
c na tv ahaṃ sutayoḥ śaktā tathā rakṣaṇapoṣaṇe
a mama hi tvadvihīnāyāḥ sarvakāmā na āpadaḥ
c kathaṃ syātāṃ sutau bālau bhaveyaṃ ca kathaṃ tv aham
a kathaṃ hi vidhavānāthā bālaputrā vinā tvayā
c mithunaṃ jīvayiṣyāmi sthitā sādhugate pathi
a ahaṃkṛtāvaliptaiś ca prārthyamānām imāṃ sutām
c ayuktais tava saṃbandhe kathaṃ śakṣyāmi rakṣitum
a utsṛṣṭam āmiṣaṃ bhūmau prārthayanti yathā khagāḥ
c prārthayanti janāḥ sarve vīrahīnāṃ tathā striyam
a sāhaṃ vicālyamānā vai prārthyamānā durātmabhiḥ
c sthātuṃ pathi na śakṣyāmi sajjaneṣṭe dvijottama
d strījanma garhitaṃ nātha loke duṣṭajanākule
d mātāpitror vaśe kanyā ūḍhā bhartṛvaśe tathā
d abhāve cānayoḥ putre svatantrā strī vigarhyate
d anāthatvaṃ striyo dvāraṃ duṣṭānāṃ vivṛtaṃ hi tat
d vastrakhaṇḍaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ hi yathā saṃkṛṣyate śvabhiḥ
d dṛṣṭvā tathābalā nātha prārthitaiśvaryagarvitaiḥ
a kathaṃ tava kulasyaikām imāṃ bālām asaṃskṛtām
c pitṛpaitāmahe mārge niyoktum aham utsahe
a kathaṃ śakṣyāmi bāle 'smin guṇān ādhātum īpṣitān
c anāthe sarvato lupte yathā tvaṃ dharmadarśivān
d ādvādaśābdaṃ bālo 'yaṃ duścaritraṃ cacāra ha
d mātāpitros tu tat pāpam ity āhur dharmavādinaḥ
d śikṣaye tat pitā mātā tat putraś ca caritrataḥ
a imām api ca te bālām anāthāṃ paribhūya mām
c anarhāḥ prārthayiṣyanti śūdrā vedaśrutiṃ yathā
a tāṃ ced ahaṃ na ditseyaṃ tvadguṇair upabṛṃhitām
c pramathyaināṃ hareyus te havir dhvāṅkṣā ivādhvarāt
c ko 'syāḥ kartā bhaved iti
c paśyantyā me haranty eva krośantyāś cāpi nistrapāḥ
c anāthatvāt sutāṃ vidvan
a saṃprekṣamāṇā putraṃ te nānurūpam ivātmanaḥ
c anarhavaśam āpannām imāṃ cāpi sutāṃ tava
a avajñātā ca lokasya tathātmānam ajānatī
c avaliptair narair brahman mariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
c hrīyamāṇām anāgasāḥ
c aśaktatvād anāthatvān
c mṛte tvayi mayāvaśyaṃ sahāgamanam iṣyate
c mṛte bhartari nārīṇāṃ sukhaleśaṃ na vidyate
a tau vihīnau mayā bālau tvayā caiva mamātmajau
c vinaśyetāṃ na saṃdeho matsyāv iva jalakṣaye
a tritayaṃ sarvathāpy evaṃ vinaśiṣyaty asaṃśayam
c tvayā vihīnaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ māṃ parityaktum arhasi
a vyuṣṭir eṣā parā strīṇāṃ pūrvaṃ bhartuḥ parā gatiḥ
c na tu brāhmaṇa putrāṇāṃ viṣaye parivartitum
d haridrāñjanapuṣpādisaumaṅgalyayutā satī
d maraṇaṃ yāti yā bhartus tad dattajalapāyinī
d bhartṛpādārpitamanāḥ sā yāti girijāpadam
d girijāyāḥ sakhī bhūtvā modate nagakanyayā
d mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ bhrātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
d amitasya hi dātāraṃ kā patiṃ nābhinandati
a parityaktaḥ sutaś cāyaṃ duhiteyaṃ tathā mayā
c bāndhavāś ca parityaktās tvadarthaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me
a yajñais tapobhir niyamair dānaiś ca vividhais tathā
c viśiṣyate striyā bhartur nityaṃ priyahite sthitiḥ
d āśramāś cāgnisaṃskārā japahomavratāni ca
d strīṇāṃ naite vidhātavyā vinā patim aninditam
d kṣamā śaucam anāhāram etāvad viditaṃ striyāḥ
a tad idaṃ yac cikīrṣāmi dharmyaṃ paramasaṃmatam
c iṣṭaṃ caiva hitaṃ caiva tava caiva kulasya ca
a iṣṭāni cāpy apatyāni dravyāṇi suhṛdaḥ priyāḥ
c āpaddharmavimokṣāya bhāryā cāpi satāṃ matam
d āpadarthe dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api
d ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api
d dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalārthaṃ hi bhāryā putro dhanaṃ gṛham
d sarvam etad vidhātavyaṃ budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
a ekato vā kulaṃ kṛtsnam ātmā vā kulavardhana
c na samaṃ sarvam eveti budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
d ubhayoḥ ko 'dhiko vidvānn ātmā caivādhikaḥ kulāt
d ātmano vidyamānatvād bhuvanāni caturdaśa
d vidyante dvijaśārdūla ātmā rakṣyaḥ sadā tvayā
d ātmany avidyamāne cet tasya nāstīha kiṃ cana
d etaj jagad idaṃ sarvam ātmanā na samaṃ kila
a sa kuruṣva mayā kāryaṃ tārayātmānam ātmanā
c anujānīhi mām ārya sutau me parirakṣa ca
d kiṃ cānyac chṛṇu me nātha yad vakṣyāmi hitaṃ tava
d śrutvāvadhāryatāṃ tan me tatas te tad dhitaṃ kuru
a avadhyāḥ striya ity āhur dharmajñā dharmaniścaye
c dharmajñān rākṣasān āhur na hanyāt sa ca mām api
a niḥsaṃśayo vadhaḥ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ saṃśayito vadhaḥ
c ato mām eva dharmajña prasthāpayitum arhasi
a bhuktaṃ priyāṇy avāptāni dharmaś ca carito mayā
b tvacchuśrūṣaṇasaṃbhūtā kīrtiś cāpy atulā mama
c tvatprasūtiḥ priyā prāptā na māṃ tapsyaty ajīvitam
a jātaputrā ca vṛddhā ca priyakāmā ca te sadā
c samīkṣyaitad ahaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyaṃ karomy ataḥ
a utsṛjyāpi ca mām ārya vetsyasy anyām api striyam
b labhasva kulajāṃ kanyāṃ dharmas te bhavitā punaḥ
b anāśramī na tiṣṭheta kṣaṇamātram api dvijaḥ
c tataḥ pratiṣṭhito dharmo bhaviṣyati punas tava
a na cāpy adharmaḥ kalyāṇa bahupatnīkatā nṛṇām
c strīṇām adharmaḥ sumahān bhartuḥ pūrvasya laṅghane
a etat sarvaṃ samīkṣya tvam ātmatyāgaṃ ca garhitam
b kuru vākyaṃ mama vibho nānyathā mānasaṃ kuru
c ātmānaṃ tāraya mayā kulaṃ cemau ca dārakau
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tayā bhartā tāṃ samāliṅgya bhārata
c mumoca bāṣpaṃ śanakaiḥ sabhāryo bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
d tato 'nantaram evāsya duhitā vaktum udyatā
d maivaṃ vada sukalyāṇi tiṣṭha gehe sumadhyame
d na svāṃ bhāryāṃ tyajet prājñaḥ putrān vāpi kadā cana
d viśeṣataḥ striyaṃ rakṣet puruṣo buddhimān iha
d tyaktvā tu puruṣo jīven na hātavyān imān sadā
d na vetti dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ mokṣaṃ ca tattvataḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tayor duḥkhitayor vākyam atimātraṃ niśamya tat
c bhṛśaṃ duḥkhaparītāṅgī kanyā tāv abhyabhāṣata
a kim idaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhārtau roravītho anāthavat
c mamāpi śrūyatāṃ kiṃ cic chrutvā ca kriyatāṃ kṣamam
a dharmato 'haṃ parityājyā yuvayor nātra saṃśayaḥ
c tyaktavyāṃ māṃ parityajya trātaṃ sarvaṃ mayaikayā
a ity artham iṣyate 'patyaṃ tārayiṣyati mām iti
c tasminn upasthite kāle tarataṃ plavavan mayā
a iha vā tārayed durgād uta vā pretya tārayet
c sarvathā tārayet putraḥ putra ity ucyate budhaiḥ
d punnāmno narakāt trāṇāt tanayaḥ putra ucyate
a ākāṅkṣante ca dauhitrān api nityaṃ pitāmahāḥ
c tān svayaṃ vai paritrāsye rakṣantī jīvitaṃ pituḥ
a bhrātā ca mama bālo 'yaṃ gate lokam amuṃ tvayi
c acireṇaiva kālena vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ
a tāte 'pi hi gate svargaṃ vinaṣṭe ca mamānuje
c piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇāṃ vyucchidyet tat teṣām apriyaṃ bhavet
a pitrā tyaktā tathā mātrā bhrātrā cāham asaṃśayam
c duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya mriyeyam atathocitā
a tvayi tv aroge nirmukte mātā bhrātā ca me śiśuḥ
c saṃtānaś caiva piṇḍaś ca pratiṣṭhāsyaty asaṃśayam
a ātmā putraḥ sakhā bhāryā kṛcchraṃ tu duhitā kila
c sa kṛcchrān mocayātmānaṃ māṃ ca dharmeṇa yojaya
a anāthā kṛpaṇā bālā yatrakvacanagāminī
c bhaviṣyāmi tvayā tāta vihīnā kṛpaṇā bata
a athavāhaṃ kariṣyāmi kulasyāsya vimokṣaṇam
c phalasaṃsthā bhaviṣyāmi kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
a athavā yāsyase tatra tyaktvā māṃ dvijasattama
c pīḍitāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi tad avekṣasva mām api
a tad asmadarthaṃ dharmārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca sattama
c ātmānaṃ parirakṣasva tyaktavyāṃ māṃ ca saṃtyaja
a avaśyakaraṇīye 'rthe mā tvāṃ kālo 'tyagād ayam
c tvayā dattena toyena bhaviṣyati hitaṃ ca me
a kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad vayaṃ svargate tvayi
c yācamānāḥ parād annaṃ paridhāvemahi śvavat
a tvayi tv aroge nirmukte kleśād asmāt sabāndhave
c amṛte vasatī loke bhaviṣyāmi sukhānvitā
d itaḥ pradāne devāś ca pitaraś ceti naḥ śrutam
d ity etad ubhayaṃ tāta niśāmya tava yad dhitam
d tad vyavasya tathāmbāyā hitaṃ svasya sutasya ca
d mātāpitroḥ punaḥ putrā bhavitāro guṇānvitāḥ
d na tu putrasya pitarau punar jātu bhaviṣyataḥ
a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ tasyā niśamya paridevitam
c pitā mātā ca sā caiva kanyā prarurudus trayaḥ
a tataḥ praruditān sarvān niśamyātha sutas tayoḥ
c utphullanayano bālaḥ kalam avyaktam abravīt
a mā rodīs tāta mā mātar mā svasas tvam iti bruvan
c prahasann iva sarvāṃs tān ekaikaṃ so 'pasarpati
a tataḥ sa tṛṇam ādāya prahṛṣṭaḥ punar abravīt
c anena taṃ haniṣyāmi rākṣasaṃ puruṣādakam
a tathāpi teṣāṃ duḥkhena parītānāṃ niśamya tat
c bālasya vākyam avyaktaṃ harṣaḥ samabhavan mahān
a ayaṃ kāla iti jñātvā kuntī samupasṛtya tān
c gatāsūn amṛteneva jīvayantīdam abravīt
 kunty uvāca
a kutomūlam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ jñātum icchāmi tattvataḥ
c viditvā apakarṣeyaṃ śakyaṃ ced apakarṣitum
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a upapannaṃ satām etad yad bravīṣi tapodhane
c na tu duḥkham idaṃ śakyaṃ mānuṣeṇa vyapohitum
d tathāpi tattvam ākhyāsye etad duḥkhasya saṃbhavam
d śakyaṃ vā yadi vāśakyaṃ śṛṇu bhadre yathātatham
a samīpe nagarasyāsya bako vasati rākṣasaḥ
b ito gavyūtimātre 'sti yamunāgahvare guhā
b tasyāṃ ghoraḥ sa vasati jighāṃsuḥ puruṣādakaḥ
b bako nāma sa nāmnā vai duṣṭātmā rākṣasādhamaḥ
c īśo janapadasyāsya purasya ca mahābalaḥ
d pralambakaḥ kāmarūpī rākṣaso vai mahābalaḥ
d tenopasṛṣṭā nagarī varṣam adya trayodaśam
a puṣṭo mānuṣamāṃsena durbuddhiḥ puruṣādakaḥ
c rakṣaty asurarāṇ nityam imaṃ janapadaṃ balī
a nagaraṃ caiva deśaṃ ca rakṣobalasamanvitaḥ
c tatkṛte paracakrāc ca bhūtebhyaś ca na no bhayam
d puruṣādakena raudreṇa bhakṣyamāṇā durātmanā
d anāthā nagarī nāthaṃ trātāraṃ nādhigacchati
d guhāyāṃ vasatas tatra bādhate satataṃ janam
d striyo bālāṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca yūnaś cāpi durātmavān
d atra mantraiś ca homaiś ca bhojanaiś ca sa rākṣasaḥ
d īḍito dvijamukhyaiś ca pūjitaś ca durātmavān
d yadā ca sakalān evaṃ prasūdayati rākṣasaḥ
d athainaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve samaye samayojayan
d māsmān kāmād vadhī rakṣo dāsyāmas te sadā vayam
d paryāyeṇa yathākāmam iha māṃsodanaṃ prabho
d annaṃ māṃsasamāyuktaṃ tilacūrṇasamanvitam
d sarpiṣā ca samāyukta vyañjanaiś ca vibhūṣitam
d srajaś citrās tilān piṇḍāṃl lājāpūpasurāsavān
d śṛtāśṛtān pānakumbhān sthūlamāṃsaṃ śṛtāśṛtam
d sarpiḥkumbhāṃś ca vividhān anyāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
d adya siddhaiḥ samāyuktais tilacūrṇaiḥ samākulān
d kulāt kulāc ca puruṣaṃ balīvardau ca kālakau
d prāpsyasi tvam asaṃkruddho rakṣobhāgaṃ prakalpitam
d tiṣṭheha samaye 'smākam ity ayācanta taṃ dvijāḥ
d bāḍham ity eva tad rakṣas tadvacaḥ pratyagṛhṇata
d paracakrān na bibhyaṃś ca rakṣaṇaṃ sa karoti ca
d tasmin bhāge vinirdiṣṭe cāsthitaḥ samayaṃ balī
a vetanaṃ tasya vihitaṃ śālivāhasya bhojanam
c mahiṣau puruṣaś caiko yas tad ādāya gacchati
a ekaikaś caiva puruṣas tat prayacchati bhojanam
c sa vāro bahubhir varṣair bhavaty asutaro naraiḥ
a tadvimokṣāya ye cāpi yatante puruṣāḥ kva cit
c saputradārāṃs tān hatvā tad rakṣo bhakṣayaty uta
a vetrakīyagṛhe rājā nāyaṃ nayam ihāsthitaḥ
b upāyaṃ taṃ na kurute yatnād api sa mandadhīḥ
c anāmayaṃ janasyāsya yena syād adya śāśvatam
a etadarhā vayaṃ nūnaṃ vasāmo durbalasya ye
c viṣaye nityam udvignāḥ kurājānam upāśritāḥ
d purātanasya vāsasya gṛhakṣetrādikasya ca
d parityāgaṃ necchamānā vasāmo nagare tataḥ
d ekacakrāpi vasatiḥ svavāco duṣparityajaḥ
d dīyamāne narakare satataṃ bakarākṣase
a brāhmaṇāḥ kasya vaktavyāḥ kasya vā chandacāriṇaḥ
c guṇair ete hi vāsyante kāmagāḥ pakṣiṇo yathā
a rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
b rājany asati loke 'smin kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
c trayasya saṃcaye cāsya jñātīn putrāṃś ca dhārayet
a viparītaṃ mayā cedaṃ trayaṃ sarvam upārjitam
c ta imām āpadaṃ prāpya bhṛśaṃ tapsyāmahe vayam
a so 'yam asmān anuprāpto vāraḥ kulavināśanaḥ
c bhojanaṃ puruṣaś caikaḥ pradeyaṃ vetanaṃ mayā
a na ca me vidyate vittaṃ saṃkretuṃ puruṣaṃ kva cit
c suhṛjjanaṃ pradātuṃ ca na śakṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
e gatiṃ cāpi na paśyāmi tasmān mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ
a so 'haṃ duḥkhārṇave magno mahaty asutare bhṛśam
c sahaivaitair gamiṣyāmi bāndhavair adya rākṣasam
e tato naḥ sahitan kṣudraḥ sarvān evopabhokṣyati
f duḥkhamūlam idaṃ bhadre mayoktaṃ praśnato 'naghe
 kunty uvāca
a na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhayād asmāt kathaṃ cana
c upāyaḥ paridṛṣṭo 'tra tasmān mokṣāya rakṣasaḥ
d naiva svayaṃ saputrasya gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
a ekas tava suto bālaḥ kanyā caikā tapasvinī
c na te tayos tathā patnyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
a mama pañca sutā brahmaṃs teṣām eko gamiṣyati
c tvadarthaṃ balim ādāya tasya pāpasya rakṣasaḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a nāham etat kariṣyāmi jīvitārthī kathaṃ cana
c brāhmaṇasyātitheś caiva svārthe prāṇair viyojanam
a na tv etad akulīnāsu nādharmiṣṭhāsu vidyate
c yad brāhmaṇārthe visṛjed ātmānam api cātmajam
a ātmanas tu mayā śreyo boddhavyam iti rocaye
c brahmavadhyātmavadhyā vā śreya ātmavadho mama
d brahmahatyā paraṃ pāpaṃ śreyān ātmavadho mama
a brahmavadhyā paraṃ pāpaṃ niṣkṛtir nātra vidyate
b prayoktā cānumantā ca hantā ceti trayaḥ samāḥ
c abuddhipūrvaṃ kṛtvāpi śreya ātmavadho mama
a na tv ahaṃ vadham ākāṅkṣe svayam evātmanaḥ śubhe
c paraiḥ kṛte vadhe pāpaṃ na kiṃ cin mayi vidyate
a abhisaṃdhikṛte tasmin brāhmaṇasya vadhe mayā
c niṣkṛtiṃ na prapaśyāmi nṛśaṃsaṃ kṣudram eva ca
a āgatasya gṛhe tyāgas tathaiva śaraṇārthinaḥ
c yācamānasya ca vadho nṛśaṃsaṃ paramaṃ matam
a kuryān na ninditaṃ karma na nṛśaṃsaṃ kadā cana
c iti pūrve mahātmāna āpaddharmavido viduḥ
a śreyāṃs tu sahadārasya vināśo 'dya mama svayam
c brāhmaṇasya vadhaṃ nāham anumaṃsye kathaṃ cana
 kunty uvāca
a mamāpy eṣā matir brahman viprā rakṣyā iti sthirā
c na cāpy aniṣṭaḥ putro me yadi putraśataṃ bhavet
a na cāsau rākṣasaḥ śakto mama putravināśane
c vīryavān mantrasiddhaś ca tejasvī ca suto mama
a rākṣasāya ca tat sarvaṃ prāpayiṣyati bhojanam
c mokṣayiṣyati cātmānam iti me niścitā matiḥ
a samāgatāś ca vīreṇa dṛṣṭapūrvāś ca rākṣasāḥ
c balavanto mahākāyā nihatāś cāpy anekaśaḥ
a na tv idaṃ keṣu cid brahman vyāhartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
c vidyārthino hi me putrān viprakuryuḥ kutūhalāt
a guruṇā cānanujñāto grāhayed yaṃ suto mama
c na sa kuryāt tayā kāryaṃ vidyayeti satāṃ matam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu pṛthayā sa vipro bhāryayā saha
c hṛṣṭaḥ saṃpūjayām āsa tad vākyam amṛtopamam
a tataḥ kuntī ca vipraś ca sahitāv anilātmajam
c tam abrūtāṃ kuruṣveti sa tathety abravīc ca tau
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kariṣya iti bhīmena pratijñāte tu bhārata
c ājagmus te tataḥ sarve bhaikṣam ādāya pāṇḍavāḥ
d bhīmasenaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā āpūrṇavadanaṃ tadā
d bubodha dharmarājas tu hṛṣitaṃ bhīmam acyutam
d harṣituṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan manasā cintayan guruḥ
d sa samīkṣya tadā rājañ śrotukāmo yudhāṃ patiḥ
a ākāreṇaiva taṃ jñātvā pāṇḍuputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c rahaḥ samupaviśyaikas tataḥ papraccha mātaram
a kiṃ cikīrṣaty ayaṃ karma bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
c bhavaty anumate kaccid ayaṃ kartum ihecchati
 kunty uvāca
a mamaiva vacanād eṣa kariṣyati paraṃtapaḥ
c brāhmaṇārthe mahat kṛtyaṃ moṣkāya nagarasya ca
d bakāya kalpitaṃ putra mahāntaṃ balim uttamam
d bhīmo bhunakti saṃpuṣṭam apy ekāhaṃ tapaḥsuta
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhavatyā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam
c parityāgaṃ hi putrasya na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥ
a kathaṃ parasutasyārthe svasutaṃ tyaktum icchasi
c lokavṛttiviruddhaṃ vai putratyāgāt kṛtaṃ tvayā
a yasya bāhū samāśritya sukhaṃ sarve svapāmahe
c rājyaṃ cāpahṛtaṃ kṣudrair ājihīrṣāmahe punaḥ
a yasya duryodhano vīryaṃ cintayann amitaujasaḥ
c na śete vasatīḥ sarvā duḥkhāc chakuninā saha
a yasya vīrasya vīryeṇa muktā jatugṛhād vayam
c anyebhyaś caiva pāpebhyo nihataś ca purocanaḥ
a yasya vīryaṃ samāśritya vasupūrṇāṃ vasuṃdharām
b bhoktum icchāmahe mātaḥ niḥsapatnā mahāmanaḥ
c imāṃ manyāmahe prāptāṃ nihatya dhṛtarāṣṭrajān
d karṇaṃ duḥśāsanaṃ caiva śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
a tasya vyavasitas tyāgo buddhim āsthāya kāṃ tvayā
c kaccin na duḥkhair buddhis te viplutā gatacetasaḥ
 kunty uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhira na saṃtāpaḥ kāryaḥ prati vṛkodaram
c na cāyaṃ buddhidaurbalyād vyavasāyaḥ kṛto mayā
d na ca śokena buddhir me viplutā gatacetanā
a iha viprasya bhavane vayaṃ putra sukhoṣitāḥ
b ajñātā dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ satkṛtā vītamanyavaḥ
c tasya pratikriyā tāta mayeyaṃ prasamīkṣitā
e etāvān eva puruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ yasmin na naśyati
f brāhmaṇārthe mahān dharmo jānatītthaṃ vṛkodare
f yāvac ca kuryād anyo 'sya kuryād bahuguṇaṃ tataḥ
a dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikrāntaṃ tadā jatugṛhe mahat
c hiḍimbasya vadhāc caiva viśvāso me vṛkodare
a bāhvor balaṃ hi bhīmasya nāgāyutasamaṃ mahat
c yena yūyaṃ gajaprakhyā nirvyūḍhā vāraṇāvatāt
a vṛkodarabalo nānyo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati
c yo 'bhyudīyād yudhi śreṣṭham api vajradharaṃ svayam
a jātamātraḥ purā caiṣa mamāṅkāt patito girau
c śarīragauravāt tasya śilā gātrair vicūrṇitā
d tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ svapnaṃ tu mayā gataniśe mahat
d bhuktvā bhīmo bakaṃ hatvā nāgaraiḥ parivāritaḥ
d hṛṣṭaḥ punar imaṃ vāsam āyāto 'laṃkṛtaḥ śubhaiḥ
a tad ahaṃ prajñayā smṛtvā balaṃ bhīmasya pāṇḍava
c pratīkāraṃ ca viprasya tataḥ kṛtavatī matim
a nedaṃ lobhān na cājñānān na ca mohād viniścitam
c buddhipūrvaṃ tu dharmasya vyavasāyaḥ kṛto mayā
a arthau dvāv api niṣpannau yudhiṣṭhira bhaviṣyataḥ
c pratīkāraś ca vāsasya dharmaś ca carito mahān
a yo brāhmaṇasya sāhāyyaṃ kuryād artheṣu karhi cit
c kṣatriyaḥ sa śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyād iti me śrutam
a kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyasyaiva kurvāṇo vadhamokṣaṇam
c vipulāṃ kīrtim āpnoti loke 'smiṃś ca paratra ca
a vaiśyasyaiva tu sāhāyyaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kṣatriyo yudhi
c sa sarveṣv api lokeṣu prajā rañjayate dhruvam
a śūdraṃ tu mokṣayan rājā śaraṇārthinam āgatam
c prāpnotīha kule janma sadravye rājasatkṛte
a evaṃ sa bhagavān vyāsaḥ purā kauravanandana
c provāca sutarāṃ prājñas tasmād etac cikīrṣitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a upapannam idaṃ mātas tvayā yad buddhipūrvakam
c ārtasya brāhmaṇasyaivam anukrośād idaṃ kṛtam
e dhruvam eṣyati bhīmo 'yaṃ nihatya puruṣādakam
f sarvathā brāhmaṇasyārthe yad anukrośavaty asi
f manvādimunibhiḥ proktaṃ vedavidbhir mahātmabhiḥ
f gavārthe brāhmaṇasyārthe sadyaḥ prāṇān parityajet
f mucyate brahmahatyāyā goptāro brāhmaṇasya ca
f āgantā nagaraṃ caiva tasmāt pāpād vimucyate
a yathā tv idaṃ na vindeyur narā nagaravāsinaḥ
c tathāyaṃ brāhmaṇo vācyaḥ parigrāhyaś ca yatnataḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhireṇa saṃmantrya brāhmaṇārtham ariṃdama
d kuntī praviśya tān sarvān sāntvayām āsa bhārata

a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyām annam ādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
c bhīmaseno yayau tatra yatrāsau puruṣādakaḥ

d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
d brāhmaṇaṃ samupāgamya vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
d āpadas tvāṃ mocayeyaṃ saputraṃ brāhmaṇapriya
d mā bhaiṣī rākṣasāt tasmān māṃ dadātu baliṃ bhavān
d iha mām āśitaṃ kartuṃ prayatasva dvijottama
d athātmānaṃ pradāsyāmi tasmai ghorāya rakṣase
d tvaradhvaṃ kiṃ vilambadhvaṃ mā ciraṃ kurutānaghāḥ
d vyavasyeyaṃ mama prāṇair yuṣmān rakṣitum adya vai
d evam uktas tu bhīmena brāhmaṇo bharatarṣabha
d suhṛdāṃ tat samākhyāya dadāv annaṃ susaṃskṛtam
d piśitodanam ājahrur athāsmai puravāsinaḥ
d saghṛtaṃ sopadaṃśaṃ ca sūpair nānāvidhaiḥ saha
d tad aśitvā bhīmaseno māṃsāni vividhāni ca
d modakāni ca mukhyāni citrodanacayān bahūn
d tato 'pibad dadhighaṭān subahūn droṇasaṃmitān
d tasya bhuktavataḥ paurā yathāvat samupārjitam
d upajahrur bhūtabhāgaṃ samṛddhamanasas tadā
d tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ savyañjanadadhiplutam
d samāruhyānnasaṃpūrṇaṃ śakaṭaṃ sa vṛkodaraḥ
d prayayau tūryanirghoṣaiḥ pauraiś ca parivāritaḥ
d ātmānam eṣo 'nnabhṛto rākṣasāya pradāsyati
d taruṇo 'pratirūpaś ca dṛḍha audariko yuvā
d vāgbhir evaṃprakārābhiḥ stūyamāno vṛkodaraḥ
d cucoda sa balīvardau yuktau sarvāṅgakālakau
d vāditrāṇāṃ praṇādena tatas taṃ puruṣādakam
d abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa tatra manujair vṛtaḥ
d saṃprāpya sa ca taṃ deśam ekākī samupāyayau
d puruṣādabhayād bhītas tatraivāsīj janavrajaḥ
d sa gatvā dīrgham adhvānaṃ dakṣiṇām abhito diśam
d yathopadiṣṭam uddeśe dadarśa viṭapadrumam
d keśamajjāsthimedobhir bāhūrucaraṇair api
d ārdraiḥ śuṣkaiś ca saṃkīrṇam abhito 'tha vanaspatim
d gṛdhrakaṅkabalacchannaṃ gomāyugaṇasaṃkulam
d ugragandham acakṣuṣyaṃ śmaśānam iva dāruṇam
d taṃ praviśya mahāvṛkṣaṃ cintayām āsa vīryavān
d yāvan na dṛśyate rakṣo bakas tu baladarpitaḥ
d ācitaṃ vividhair bhojyair annair girinibhair idam
d śakaṭaṃ sūpasaṃpūrṇaṃ yāvad drakṣyati rākṣasaḥ
d tāvad eva hi bhokṣye 'haṃ durlabhaṃ vai punar bhavet
d viprakīryeta sarvaṃ hi prayuddhe mayi rakṣasā
d abhojyaṃ ca śavaṃ spṛṣṭvā nigṛhīte bake bhavet
d sa tv evaṃ bhīmakarmā tu bhīmaseno 'bhilakṣya ca
d upaviṣṭaḥ śanair annaṃ prabhuṅkte sma paraṃ varam
d te tataḥ sarvato 'paśyan drumān āruhya nāgarāḥ
d nārakṣo balim aśnīyād evaṃ bahu ca mānavāḥ
d bhuṅkte brāhmaṇarūpeṇa bako 'yam iti cābruvan
d sa taṃ hasati tejasvī tadannam upayujya ca
a āsādya tu vanaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ pāṇḍavo balī
c ājuhāva tato nāmnā tadannam upayojayan
a tataḥ sa rākṣasaḥ śrutvā bhīmasenasya tad vacaḥ
c ājagāma susaṃkruddho yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
a mahākāyo mahāvego dārayann iva medinīm
b lohitākṣaḥ karālī ca lohitaśmaśrumūrdhajaḥ
b ākarṇād bhinnavaktraś ca śaṅkukarṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
c triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā saṃdaśya daśanacchadam
a bhuñjānam annaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
c vivṛtya nayane kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a ko 'yam annam idaṃ bhuṅkte madartham upakalpitam
c paśyato mama durbuddhir yiyāsur yamasādanam
a bhīmasenas tu tac chrutvā prahasann iva bhārata
c rākṣasaṃ tam anādṛtya bhuṅkta eva parāṅmukhaḥ
a tataḥ sa bhairavaṃ kṛtvā samudyamya karāv ubhau
c abhyadravad bhīmasenaṃ jighāṃsuḥ puruṣādakaḥ
a tathāpi paribhūyainaṃ nekṣamāṇo vṛkodaraḥ
c rākṣasaṃ bhuṅkta evānnaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ paravīrahā
a amarṣeṇa tu saṃpūrṇaḥ kuntīputrasya rākṣasaḥ
c jaghāna pṛṣṭhaṃ pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitaḥ
a tathā balavatā bhīmaḥ pāṇibhyāṃ bhṛśam āhataḥ
c naivāvalokayām āsa rākṣasaṃ bhuṅkta eva saḥ
d bhīmodaragatāḥ piṇḍāḥ sāntarālāḥ paraṃ śatam
d rakṣaḥpāṇiprahāreṇa saṃśliṣṭā ekapiṇḍavat
a tataḥ sa bhūyaḥ saṃkruddho vṛkṣam ādāya rākṣasaḥ
c tāḍayiṣyaṃs tadā bhīmaṃ punar abhyadravad balī
a tato bhīmaḥ śanair bhuktvā tadannaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c vāry upaspṛśya saṃhṛṣṭas tasthau yudhi mahābalaḥ
d sthitvā muhūrtaṃ viśramya vīrāsanam upāśritaḥ
d bhrāmayantaṃ mahāvṛkṣam āyāntaṃ bhīmadarśanam
d dṛṣṭvotthāyāhave vīraḥ siṃhanādaṃ vyanādayat
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d bhujavegaṃ tathā sphoṭaṃ kṣveḍitaṃ ca mahāsvanam
d kṛtvāhvayata saṃkruddho bhīmaseno 'tha rākṣasam
d bahukālaṃ supuṣṭaṃ te śarīraṃ rākṣasādhama
d madbāhubalam āśritya na tvaṃ bhūyas tv aśiṣyasi
d adya madbāhuniṣpiṣṭo gamiṣyasi yamakṣayam
d adya prabhṛti svapsyanti viprakīrya nivāsinaḥ
d nirudvignāḥ purasyāsya kaṇṭake sūddhṛte mayā
d adya yuddhe śarīraṃ te kaṅkagomāyuvāyasāḥ
d mayā hatasya khādantu vikarṣantu ca bhūtale
d evam uktvā susaṃkruddhaḥ pārtho bakajighāṃsayā
d upadhāvad bakaś cāpi pārthaṃ pārthivasattama
d mahākāyo mahāvego dārayann iva medinīm
d virūparūpaḥ piṅgākṣo bhīmasenam abhidravat
d triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā daṣṭvā ca daśanacchadam
da uvācāśaniśabdena dhvaninā bhīṣayann iva
db dvipaccatuṣpanmāṃsaiś ca bahubhiś caudanācalaiḥ
d śakaṭānnaṃ tato bhuktvā rakṣasaḥ pāṇinā saha
d gṛhṇann eva mahāvṛkṣaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ parvatopamam
d bhīmaseno hasann eva bhuktvā tyaktvā ca rākṣasam
d pītvā dadhighaṭān pūrṇān ghṛtakumbhāñ śataṃ śatam
d tadrakṣaḥprahitaṃ vṛkṣaṃ mahāśākhaṃ vanaspatim
d gṛhītvā pāṇinaikena savyenodyamya cetaram
d rakṣovadanam udvīkṣya bhṛkuṭīvikaṭānanam
d darśayan rakṣase dantān prajahāsāśanisvanaḥ
a kṣiptaṃ kruddhena taṃ vṛkṣaṃ pratijagrāha vīryavān
c savyena pāṇinā bhīmaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
a tataḥ sa punar udyamya vṛkṣān bahuvidhān balī
c prāhiṇod bhīmasenāya tasmai bhīmaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d sarvān apohayad vṛkṣān svasya hastasthaśākhinā
a tad vṛkṣayuddham abhavan mahīruhavināśanam
c ghorarūpaṃ mahārāja bakapāṇḍavayor mahat
a nāma viśrāvya tu bakaḥ samabhidrutya pāṇḍavam
c bhujābhyāṃ parijagrāha bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
a bhīmaseno 'pi tad rakṣaḥ parirabhya mahābhujaḥ
c visphurantaṃ mahāvegaṃ vicakarṣa balād balī
d paribhrāmaṇavikṣepaparirambhāvapātanaiḥ
d utsarpaṇāvasarpais tāv anyonyaṃ pratyarundhatām
d utthāpanair unnayanaiś cālanaiḥ sthāpanair api
d jagrāha bhīmaḥ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhītvā cainam ākṣipat
d ākṣipto bhīmasenena punar evotthito hasan
d āliṅgyāpīḍya caivenaṃ nyahanad vasudhātale
d bhīmo vyasarjayac cainaṃ samāśvasihi cety api
d āsphoṭayām āsa balī uttiṣṭheti ca so 'bravīt
d samutpatya tataḥ kruddho rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahattaram
d virūpaḥ sahasā tasthau tarjayitvā vṛkodaram
d ahasad bhīmaseno 'tha rākṣasaṃ bhīmadarśanam
d bhīmasenas tu jagrāha grīvāyāṃ bhīmadarśanam
d bhujābhyāṃ jānunaikena pṛṣṭhe samabhipīḍayat
d tataḥ kruddho visṛjyainaṃ sa bhīmas tasya rakṣasaḥ
d svāṃ kaṭīm īṣad utkṣipya bāhū caiva parāmṛśat
d tasya bāhū samādāya tvaramāṇo vṛkodaraḥ
d utkṣipya cāvadhūyainaṃ pātayan balavān bhuvi
d taṃ tu vāmena pādena kruddho bhīmaparākramaḥ
d urasy enaṃ samājaghne bhīmas tu patitaṃ bhuvi
d sa saṃkruddhaḥ samutpatya bhīmam abhyahanad bhṛśam
d vyāttānano dīptajihvo bāhum udyamya dakṣiṇam
d tenābhidrutya kruddhena bhīmo mūrdhni samāhataḥ
d muṣṭinā jānunā caiva vāmapārśve samāhataḥ
d evaṃ nihanyamānaḥ san rākṣasena balīyasā
d roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
d tataḥ kruddhaḥ samutpatya bhīmo jagrāha rākṣasam
d tāv anyonyaṃ pīḍayantau puruṣādavṛkodarau
d mattāv iva mahānāgāv anyonyaṃ vicakarṣatuḥ
d bāhuvikṣepaśabdaiś ca bhīmarākṣasayos tadā
d vetrakīyapurī sarvā vitrastā samapadyata
d tayor vegena mahatā tatra bhūmir akampata
d pādapān vīrudhaś caiva cūrṇayām āsatuś ca tau
d samāgatau ca tau vīrāv anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇau
d aśmabhiḥ pādavegaiś ca cūrṇayām āsatus tadā
d atha taṃ loḷayitvā tu bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
d agṛhṇāt parirabhyainaṃ bāhubhyāṃ bharatarṣabha
d jānubhyāṃ parijagrāha bhīmaseno bakaṃ balāt
d visphurantaṃ mahākāyaṃ vicakarṣa mahābalaḥ
d vikṛṣyamāṇo bhīmena karṣaṃś ca yudhi pāṇḍavam
d samayujyata tīvreṇa śrameṇa puruṣādakaḥ
a sa kṛṣyamāṇo bhīmena karṣamāṇaś ca pāṇḍavam
c samayujyata tīvreṇa śrameṇa puruṣādakaḥ
a tayor vegena mahatā pṛthivī samakampata
c pādapāṃś ca mahākāyāṃś cūrṇayām āsatus tadā
a hīyamānaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ samīkṣya bharatarṣabha
c niṣpiṣya bhūmau pāṇibhyāṃ samājaghne vṛkodaraḥ
a tato 'sya jānunā pṛṣṭham avapīḍya balād iva
c bāhunā parijagrāha dakṣiṇena śirodharām
d jānuny āropya tatpṛṣṭhaṃ mahāśabdaṃ babhañja ha
d nikṣipya bhūmau pāṇibhyāṃ dharaṇyāṃ niṣpipeṣa ha
a savyena ca kaṭīdeśe gṛhya vāsasi pāṇḍavaḥ
c tad rakṣo dviguṇaṃ cakre nadantaṃ bhairavān ravān
a tato 'sya rudhiraṃ vaktrāt prādurāsīd viśāṃ pate
c bhajyamānasya bhīmena tasya ghorasya rakṣasaḥ
d brāhmaṇa uvāca
d jñānasāgara uvāca
d tataḥ sā vavṛdhe bālā yājñasenī dvijottama
d krameṇa yauvanaṃ prāptā manmathānaladīpikā
d dṛṣṭvā tām anavadyāṅgīṃ drupado hṛṣṭamānasaḥ
d yadṛcchayā saṃcarantīm āsthāne samabhāṣata
d arjunāya dadāmīti hṛdayaṃ vyāvṛṇot tadā
d śrutvā drupadarājasya vacanaṃ vyathitas tadā
d mantrī vasuprado nāma śanair idam abhāṣata
d kuntyā saha maheṣvāsāḥ pāṇḍavā rājasattama
d dagdhā jatugṛhe suptā duryodhanadhiyā rahaḥ
d arjunāya kathaṃ dadyāḥ pāñcālīṃ pṛṣatātmajām
d tasya vākyaṃ tu nṛpatiḥ śrutvā pravyathito 'bhavat
d vyathitaṃ drupadaṃ dṛṣṭvā purodhā jñānasāgaraḥ
d jānāmi śakunād rājan na dagdhās tety abhāṣata
d hṛṣṭo 'tha nṛpatiḥ prāha draṣṭavyās te kathaṃ dvija
d svayaṃvareṇa draṣṭāsi tat kuruṣva narādhipa
d tac chrutvā sarvapāñcālāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
d tataḥ saṃghoṣayām āsa duhituś ca svayaṃvaram
d phālgune māsi saptamyām itaḥ saptamite 'hani
d mañcāṃś ca kārayām āsa rājayogyān bahūn nṛpa
d merumandarasaṃkāśān svarṇaratnaparicchadān
d drupadaś ca dhanuś citraṃ durānāmaṃ kṣitīśvaraiḥ
d kārayām āsa śulkārtham arjunasya didṛkṣayā
d matsyayantraṃ ca kṛtavān dūre varṇapariṣkṛtam
d anena dhanuṣā yo vai śareṇemaṃ jalecaram
d pātayiṣyati yo jāyāṃ pāñcālīṃ svāṃ kariṣyati
d itas tad utsavadinaṃ samīpe vartate dvijāḥ
d rājāno rājaputrāś ca pṛthivyāṃ ye vilāsinaḥ
d prayānti ca tathā viprāḥ sūtamāgadhabandinaḥ
d ahaṃ tadutsavaṃ draṣṭuṃ yāmi dravyārjanāya ca
d bhavatāṃ gamane buddhiḥ prayatadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ
d iti vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutam
d brāhmaṇaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d śrutvā jatugṛhe vṛttaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sapurohitāḥ
d pāñcālarājaṃ drupadam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
d dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ sahāmātyā mantrayitvā parasparam
d pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya matiṃ cakruḥ suduṣkarām
d duryodhanena prahitaḥ purocana iti śrutaḥ
d vāraṇāvatam āsādya kṛtvā jatugṛhaṃ mahat
d tasmin gṛhe suviśvastān pāṇḍavān pṛthayā saha
d ardharātre mahārāja dagdhavān sa purocanaḥ
d agninā tu svayam api dagdhaḥ kṣudro nṛśaṃsavat
d etac chrutvā tu saṃhṛṣṭo dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sabāndhavaḥ
d śrutvā tu pāṇḍavān dagdhān dhṛtarāṣṭro 'mbikāsutaḥ
d alpaśokaḥ prahṛṣṭātmā śaśāsa viduraṃ tadā
d pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāprājña kuru piṇḍodakakriyām
d etāvad uktvā karuṇo dhṛtarāṣṭras tu māriṣaḥ
d adya pāṇḍur mṛtaḥ kṣattaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśane
d aho vidhivaśād eva gatās te yamasādanam
d ity uktvā prārudat tatra dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sasaubalaḥ
d śrutvā bhīṣmeṇa vidhivat kṛtavān aurdhvadehikam
d pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśāya kṛtaṃ karma durātmanā
d evaṃ kāryasya kartā tu na dṛṣṭo na śrutaḥ purā
d etad vṛttaṃ mahārāja pāṇḍavān prati naḥ śrutam
d śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ yajñaseno mahāmatiḥ
d yathā tajjanakaḥ śoced aurasasya vināśane
d tathātapyata pāñcālaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ vināśane
d samāhūya prakṛtayaḥ sahitāḥ sarvabāndhavaiḥ
d kāruṇyād eva pāñcālaḥ provācedaṃ vacas tadā
d aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho vīryaṃ ca śikṣitam
d cintayāmi divārātram arjunaṃ prati bāndhavāḥ
d bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito mātrā so 'dahyata hutāśane
d kim āścaryam ito loke kālo hi duratikramaḥ
d mithyāpratijño lokeṣu kiṃ vadiṣyāmi sāṃpratam
d antargatena duḥkhena dahyamāno divāniśam
d yājopayājau satkṛtya yācitau tu mayānaghāḥ
d bhāradvājasya hantāraṃ devīṃ cāpy arjunasya vai
d lokas tad veda yac caiva tathā yājena naḥ śrutam
d yājena putrakāmīyaṃ hutvā cotpāditāv ubhau
d dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca kṛṣṇā ca mama tuṣṭikarāv ubhau
d kiṃ kariṣyāmi te naṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pṛthayā saha
d ity evam uktvā pāñcālaḥ śuśoca paramāturaḥ
d dṛṣṭvā śocantam atyarthaṃ pāñcālaṃ cedam abravīt
d purodhāḥ satvasaṃpannaḥ samyag vidyāviśeṣavān
d vṛddhānuśāsane yuktāḥ pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
d tādṛśā na vinaśyanti naiva yānti parābhavam
d mayā dṛṣṭam idaṃ satyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ manujādhipa
d brāhmaṇaiḥ kathitaṃ satyaṃ vedeṣu ca mayā śrutam
d bṛhaspatimatenātha paulomyāpi purā śrutam
d naṣṭa indro bisagranthyām upaśrutyā visarjitaḥ
d upaśrutir mahārāja pāṇḍavārthe mayā śrutā
d yatra vā tatra jīvanti pāṇḍavās te na saṃśayaḥ
d mayā dṛṣṭāni liṅgāni ihaivaiṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d yan nimittam ihāyānti tac chruṇuṣva narādhipa
d svayaṃvaraḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kanyādāne pradarśitaḥ
d svayaṃvaras tu nagare ghuṣyatāṃ rājasattama
d yatra vā nivasantas te pāṇḍavāḥ pṛthayā saha
d dūrasthā vā samīpasthāḥ svargasthā vāpi pāṇḍavāḥ
d śrutvā svayaṃvaraṃ rājan sameṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
d tasmāt svayaṃvaro rājan ghuṣyatāṃ mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥ
d śrutvā purohitenoktaṃ pāñcālaḥ prītimāṃs tadā
d ghoṣayām āsa nagare draupadyās tu svayaṃvaram
d puṣyamāse tu rohiṇyāṃ śuklapakṣe śubhe tithau
d divasaiḥ pañcasaptatyā bhaviṣyati svayaṃvaraḥ
d devagandharvayakṣāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
d svayaṃvaraṃ draṣṭukāmā gacchanty eva na saṃśayaḥ
d tava putrā mahātmāno darśanīyā viśeṣataḥ
d yadṛcchayā tu pāñcālī gacched vā madhyamaṃ patim
d ko hi jānāti lokeṣu prajāpatividhiṃ śubham
d tasmāt saputrā gacchethā brāhmaṇi yadi rocate
d nityakālaṃ subhikṣās te pāñcālās tu tapodhane
d yajñasenas tu rājāsau brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
d brahmaṇyā nāgarāḥ sarve brāhmaṇāś cātithipriyāḥ
d nityakālaṃ pradāsyanti āgantṝṇām ayācitam
d ahaṃ ca tatra gacchāmi mamaibhiḥ saha śiṣyakaiḥ
d ekasārthāḥ prayātāsmo brāhmaṇyā yadi rocate
d etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ brāhmaṇo virarāma ha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 tataḥ sa bhagnapārśvāṅgo naditvā bhairavaṃ ravam
 śailarājapratīkāśo gatāsur abhavad bakaḥ
a tena śabdena vitrasto janas tasyātha rakṣasaḥ
c niṣpapāta gṛhād rājan sahaiva paricāribhiḥ
d tatas tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ mahābalam
d bākāḥ paramasaṃtrastā bhīmaṃ śaraṇam āyayuḥ
d bakasya paricārakāḥ
d ārāmodyānacaityasthāḥ kṣudradevālayāśritāḥ
d bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā śauryarāśiṃ
a tān bhītān vigatajñānān bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
c sāntvayām āsa balavān samaye ca nyaveśayat
a na hiṃsyā mānuṣā bhūyo yuṣmābhir iha karhi cit
c hiṃsatāṃ hi vadhaḥ śīghram evam eva bhaved iti
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tāni rakṣāṃsi bhārata
c evam astv iti taṃ prāhur jagṛhuḥ samayaṃ ca tam
d sagaṇas tu bakabhrātā prāṇamat pāṇḍavaṃ tadā
d tatpuropavanodyānacaityārāmān visṛjya te
d bibhītakakapitthārkaplakṣaśālmalikānanam
d prapedire bhayatrastā bhīmasādhvasakātarāḥ
d yamunātīram utsṛjya prapede pitṛkānanam
a tataḥ prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi tatra saumyāni bhārata
c nagare pratyadṛśyanta narair nagaravāsibhiḥ
a tato bhimas tam ādāya gatāsuṃ puruṣādakam
b niṣkarṇanetraṃ nirjihvaṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ kaṇṭhapīḍanāt
b kurvantaṃ bahudhā ceṣṭāṃ sa narādam akarṣata
b sa eva rākṣaso nūnaṃ punar āyāti naḥ purīm
b sabālavṛddhāḥ puruṣā iti bhītāḥ pradudruvuḥ
b ācchidya bāhū pādau ca śiraś ca sa vṛkodaraḥ
b dvāreṣu caturṣu kṣiptvā punar āgāt sa mārutiḥ
c dvāradeśe vinikṣipya jagāmānupalakṣitaḥ
d dṛṣṭvā bhīmabaloddhūtaṃ bakaṃ vinihataṃ tadā
d jñātayo 'sya bhayodvignāḥ pratijagmus tatas tataḥ
a tataḥ sa bhīmas taṃ hatvā gatvā brāhmaṇaveśma tat
b balīvardau ca śakaṭaṃ brāhmaṇāya nyavedayat
b tūṣṇīm antargṛhaṃ gacchety abhidhāya dvijottamam
b mātṛbhrātṛsamakṣaṃ ca gatvā śayanam etya ca
c ācacakṣe yathāvṛttaṃ rājñaḥ sarvam aśeṣataḥ
d aśito 'smy adya janani tṛptir me daśavārṣikī
a tato narā viniṣkrāntā nagarāt kālyam eva tu
c dadṛśur nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ rudhirokṣitam
a tam adrikūṭasadṛśaṃ vinikīrṇaṃ bhayāvaham
b dṛṣṭvā saṃhṛṣṭaromāṇo babhūvus tatra nāgarāḥ
c ekacakrāṃ tato gatvā pravṛttiṃ pradaduḥ pare
a tataḥ sahasraśo rājan narā nagaravāsinaḥ
c tatrājagmur bakaṃ draṣṭuṃ sastrīvṛddhakumārakāḥ
d dadṛśus te bakaṃ sarve viśiraḥpāṇipādakam
d niḥśṛṅgavṛkṣaṃ nirgulmaṃ vinikīrṇaṃ giriṃ yathā
a tatas te vismitāḥ sarve karma dṛṣṭvātimānuṣam
b vismayotphullanayanās tarjanyāsaktanāsikāḥ
c daivatāny arcayāṃ cakruḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate
a tataḥ pragaṇayām āsuḥ kasya vāro 'dya bhojane
c jñātvā cāgamya taṃ vipraṃ papracchuḥ sarva eva tat
a evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu bahuśo rakṣamāṇaś ca pāṇḍavān
c uvāca nāgarān sarvān idaṃ viprarṣabhas tadā
a ājñāpitaṃ mām aśane rudantaṃ saha bandhubhiḥ
c dadarśa brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cin mantrasiddho mahābalaḥ
d adya te rākṣaso vāraḥ pūrvedyur jñāpito mama
d grāmasādhāraṇenaiva sūcakena puraukasaḥ
a paripṛcchya sa māṃ pūrvaṃ parikleśaṃ purasya ca
c abravīd brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha āśvāsya prahasann iva
a prāpayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tasmai idam annaṃ durātmane
c mannimittaṃ bhayaṃ cāpi na kāryam iti vīryavān
a sa tadannam upādāya gato bakavanaṃ prati
c tena nūnaṃ bhaved etat karma lokahitaṃ kṛtam
a tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve kṣatriyāś ca suvismitāḥ
c vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca muditāś cakrur brahmamahaṃ tadā
a tato jānapadāḥ sarve ājagmur nagaraṃ prati
c tad adbhutatamaṃ draṣṭuṃ pārthās tatraiva cāvasan
d śrutvā bakavadhaṃ yas tu vācakaṃ pūjayen naraḥ
d tasya vaṃśe 'pi rājendra na rākṣasabhayaṃ bhavet
d naśyanti śatravas tasya upasargās tathaiva ca
d mahat puṇyam avāpnoti śrutvā bhīmaparākramam
d vetrakīyagṛhe sarve parivārya vṛkodaram
d vismayād abhyagacchanta bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam
d na vai na saṃbhavet sarvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu mahātmasu
d iti satkṛtya taṃ paurāḥ parivavruḥ samantataḥ
d ayaṃ trātā hi naḥ sarvān piteva paramārthataḥ
d asya śuśrūṣavaḥ pādau paricarya upāsmahe
d paśumad dadhimac cānnaṃ paraṃ bhaktam upāharan
d tasmin hate te puruṣā bhītāḥ samanubodhanāḥ
d tataḥ saṃprādravan pārthāḥ saha mātrā paraṃtapāḥ
d āgacchann ekacakrāṃ te pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
d vaidikādhyayane yuktā jaṭilā brahmacāriṇaḥ
d avasaṃs te ca tatrāpi brāhmaṇasya niveśane
d mātrā sahaikacakrāyāṃ dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitāḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a te tathā puruṣavyāghrā nihatya bakarākṣasam
c ata ūrdhvaṃ tato brahman kim akurvata pāṇḍavāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatraiva nyavasan rājan nihatya bakarākṣasam
c adhīyānāḥ paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇasya niveśane
a tataḥ katipayāhasya brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
c pratiśrayārthaṃ tad veśma brāhmaṇasyājagāma ha
a sa samyak pūjayitvā taṃ vidvān viprarṣabhas tadā
c dadau pratiśrayaṃ tasmai sadā sarvātithivratī
a tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve saha kuntyā nararṣabhāḥ
c upāsāṃ cakrire vipraṃ kathayānaṃ kathās tadā
a kathayām āsa deśān sa tīrthāni vividhāni ca
c rājñāṃ ca vividhāś caryāḥ purāṇi vividhāni ca
a sa tatrākathayad vipraḥ kathānte janamejaya
c pāñcāleṣv adbhutākāraṃ yājñasenyāḥ svayaṃvaram
a dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cotpattim utpattiṃ ca śikhaṇḍinaḥ
c ayonijatvaṃ kṛṣṇāyā drupadasya mahāmakhe
a tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā loke tasya mahātmanaḥ
c vistareṇaiva papracchuḥ kathāṃ tāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
a kathaṃ drupadaputrasya dhṛṣṭadyumnasya pāvakāt
c vedimadhyāc ca kṛṣṇāyāḥ saṃbhavaḥ katham adbhutaḥ
a kathaṃ droṇān maheṣvāsāt sarvāṇy astrāṇy aśikṣata
b dhṛṣṭadyumno maheṣvāsaḥ kathaṃ droṇasya mṛtyudaḥ
c kathaṃ priyasakhāyau tau bhinnau kasya kṛtena ca
a evaṃ taiś codito rājan sa vipraḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ
c kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ draupadīsaṃbhavaṃ tadā
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a gaṅgādvāraṃ prati mahān babhūvarṣir mahātapāḥ
c bharadvājo mahāprājñaḥ satataṃ saṃśitavrataḥ
a so 'bhiṣektuṃ gato gaṅgāṃ pūrvam evāgatāṃ satīm
c dadarśāpsarasaṃ tatra ghṛtācīm āplutām ṛṣiḥ
a tasyā vāyur nadītīre vasanaṃ vyaharat tadā
c apakṛṣṭāmbarāṃ dṛṣṭvā tām ṛṣiś cakame tataḥ
a tasyāṃ saṃsaktamanasaḥ kaumārabrahmacāriṇaḥ
b paśyato yonisaṃsthānam anyāvayavasauṣṭhavam
c hṛṣṭasya retaś caskanda tad ṛṣir droṇa ādadhe
a tataḥ samabhavad droṇaḥ kumāras tasya dhīmataḥ
c adhyagīṣṭa sa vedāṃś ca vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
a bharadvājasya tu sakhā pṛṣato nāma pārthivaḥ
c tasyāpi drupado nāma tadā samabhavat sutaḥ
a sa nityam āśramaṃ gatvā droṇena saha pārṣataḥ
c cikrīḍādhyayanaṃ caiva cakāra kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ
a tatas tu pṛṣate 'tīte sa rājā drupado 'bhavat
c droṇo 'pi rāmaṃ śuśrāva ditsantaṃ vasu sarvaśaḥ
a vanaṃ tu prasthitaṃ rāmaṃ bharadvājasuto 'bravīt
c āgataṃ vittakāmaṃ māṃ viddhi droṇaṃ dvijarṣabha
 rāma uvāca
a śarīramātram evādya mayedam avaśeṣitam
c astrāṇi vā śarīraṃ vā brahmann anyataraṃ vṛṇu
 droṇa uvāca
a astrāṇi caiva sarvāṇi teṣāṃ saṃhāram eva ca
c prayogaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ dātum arhati me bhavān
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a tathety uktvā tatas tasmai pradadau bhṛgunandanaḥ
c pratigṛhya tato droṇaḥ kṛtakṛtyo 'bhavat tadā
a saṃprahṛṣṭamanāś cāpi rāmāt paramasaṃmatam
c brahmāstraṃ samanuprāpya nareṣv abhyadhiko 'bhavat
a tato drupadam āsādya bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
c abravīt puruṣavyāghraḥ sakhāyaṃ viddhi mām iti
 drupada uvāca
a nāśrotriyaḥ śrotriyasya nārathī rathinaḥ sakhā
c nārājā pārthivasyāpi sakhipūrvaṃ kim iṣyate
d yayor eva samaṃ vittaṃ yayor eva samaṃ śrutam
d tayor vivāhaḥ sakhyaṃ ca na tu puṣṭavipuṣṭayoḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a sa viniścitya manasā pāñcālyaṃ prati buddhimān
c jagāma kurumukhyānāṃ nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam
a tasmai pautrān samādāya vasūni vividhāni ca
c prāptāya pradadau bhīṣmaḥ śiṣyān droṇāya dhīmate
a droṇaḥ śiṣyāṃs tataḥ sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
c samānīya tadā vidvān drupadasyāsukhāya vai
d droṇaḥ
d guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ caiva tathaiva gurudakṣiṇām
a ācāryavetanaṃ kiṃ cid dhṛdi saṃparivartate
c kṛtāstrais tat pradeyaṃ syāt tad ṛtaṃ vadatānaghāḥ
d so 'rjunapramukhair uktas tathāstv iti gurus tadā
d tathety uktvā ca taṃ pārthaḥ pādau jagrāha buddhimān
d vidyāniṣkrayajaṃ vittaṃ kiṃ deyaṃ brūhi me guro
a yadā ca pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kṛtāstrāḥ kṛtaniśramāḥ
c tato droṇo 'bravīd bhūyo vetanārtham idaṃ vacaḥ
a pārṣato drupado nāma chatravatyāṃ nareśvaraḥ
c tasyāpakṛṣya tad rājyaṃ mama śīghraṃ pradīyatām
d dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca sahitāḥ pāñcālān pāṇḍavā yayuḥ
d yajñasenena saṃgamya karṇaduryodhanādayaḥ
d nirjitāḥ saṃnyavartanta tathānye kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
a tataḥ pāṇḍusutāḥ pañca nirjitya drupadaṃ yudhi
c droṇāya darśayām āsur baddhvā sasacivaṃ tadā
d mahendra iva durdharṣo mahendra iva dānavam
d mahendraputraḥ pāñcālaṃ jitavān arjunas tadā
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mahāvīryaṃ phalgunasyāmitaujasaḥ
d vyasmayanta janāḥ sarve yajñasenasya bāndhavāḥ
d nāsty arjunasamo vīrye rājaputra iti bruvan
 droṇa uvāca
a prārthayāmi tvayā sakhyaṃ punar eva narādhipa
c arājā kila no rājñaḥ sakhā bhavitum arhati
a ataḥ prayatitaṃ rājye yajñasena mayā tava
c rājāsi dakṣiṇe kūle bhāgīrathyāham uttare
d tatheti drupadenokte vacane dvijasattama
d saṃpūjya drupadaṃ droṇo preṣayām āsa tattvavit
d kanyākubje ca kāmpilye vasethās tvaṃ narottama
d brāhmaṇaiḥ sahito rājann ahicchatre vasāmy aham
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a asatkāraḥ sa sumahān muhūrtam api tasya tu
c na vyeti hṛdayād rājño durmanāḥ sa kṛśo 'bhavat
d evam ukto hi pāñcālyo bhāradvājena dhīmatā
d uvācāstravidāṃ śreṣṭho droṇaṃ brāhmaṇasattamam
d evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te bhāradvāja mahāmate
d sakhyaṃ tad eva bhavatu śaśvad yad abhimanyase
d evam anyonyam uktvā tau kṛtvā sakhyam anuttamam
d jagmatur droṇapāñcālyau yathāgatam ariṃdamau
d niśamya tasya vacanaṃ kṛtvā manasi durmanāḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a amarṣī drupado rājā karmasiddhān dvijarṣabhān
b droṇena vairaṃ drupado na suṣvāpa smaraṃs tadā
c anvicchan paricakrāma brāhmaṇāvasathān bahūn
a putrajanma parīpsan vai śokopahatacetanaḥ
c nāsti śreṣṭhaṃ mamāpatyam iti nityam acintayat
a jātān putrān sa nirvedād dhig bandhūn iti cābravīt
c niḥśvāsaparamaś cāsīd droṇaṃ praticikīrṣayā
a prabhāvaṃ vinayaṃ śikṣāṃ droṇasya caritāni ca
c kṣātreṇa ca balenāsya cintayan nānvapadyata
e pratikartuṃ nṛpaśreṣṭho yatamāno 'pi bhārata
a abhitaḥ so 'tha kalmāṣīṃ gaṅgākūle paribhraman
c brāhmaṇāvasathaṃ puṇyam āsasāda mahīpatiḥ
a tatra nāsnātakaḥ kaś cin na cāsīd avratī dvijaḥ
c tathaiva nāmahābhāgaḥ so 'paśyat saṃśitavratau
a yājopayājau brahmarṣī śāmyantau pṛṣatātmajaḥ
c saṃhitādhyayane yuktau gotrataś cāpi kāśyapau
a tāraṇe yuktarūpau tau brāhmaṇāv ṛṣisattamau
c sa tāv āmantrayām āsa sarvakāmair atandritaḥ
a buddhvā tayor balaṃ buddhiṃ kanīyāṃsam upahvare
c prapede chandayan kāmair upayājaṃ dhṛtavratam
a pādaśuśrūṣaṇe yuktaḥ priyavāk sarvakāmadaḥ
c arhayitvā yathānyāyam upayājam uvāca saḥ
a yena me karmaṇā brahman putraḥ syād droṇamṛtyave
b arjunasya tathā bhāryā bhaved vā varavarṇinī
c upayāja kṛte tasmin gavāṃ dātāsmi te 'rbudam
a yad vā te 'nyad dvijaśreṣṭha manasaḥ supriyaṃ bhavet
c sarvaṃ tat te pradātāhaṃ na hi me 'sty atra saṃśayaḥ
a ity ukto nāham ity evaṃ tam ṛṣiḥ pratyuvāca ha
c ārādhayiṣyan drupadaḥ sa taṃ paryacarat punaḥ
a tataḥ saṃvatsarasyānte drupadaṃ sa dvijottamaḥ
c upayājo 'bravīd rājan kāle madhurayā girā
a jyeṣṭho bhrātā mamāgṛhṇād vicaran vananirjhare
c aparijñātaśaucāyāṃ bhūmau nipatitaṃ phalam
